original: shes pa dang shes bya bral ba'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya bral ba'o zhes ston to //
translated: It is taught that one is free from consciousness and the object of consciousness.

original: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa ni lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus su bdag nyid lha ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du bsgom pa ni bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa ni lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus su bdag nyid lha ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du bsgom pa ni bsam par bya ste /
translated: Form, sound, and so forth are the goddesses, and at the time of union with them, one should contemplate oneself as the deity, that is, as Great Vajradhara.

original: des na bzhi po thob par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: des na bzhi po thob par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
translated: Thus it is taught that one will attain the four.

original: gal te ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyis sems brtan par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyis sems brtan par mi 'gyur na /
translated: If one's mind does not become stable through this very meditative concentration,

original: de'i tshe rigs ni ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul ni rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe rigs ni ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul ni rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: then one should practice the meditative concentration of total retention of the family and the meditative concentration of subsequent destruction.

original: de dag gi rnam par bsgom pa ni dbye ba rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: de dag gi rnam par bsgom pa ni dbye ba rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: It is taught that one should practice them by means of the divisions of their contemplation.

original: de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: yang na gzugs la sogs pa ni phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams te /
analyzed: yang na gzugs la sogs pa ni phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams te /
translated: Alternatively, form and so forth are external and internal entities.

original: de dag rnam gsum ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i nang na dbu ma'i lam gsum pa ste zung 'jug gi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de dag rnam gsum ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i nang na dbu ma'i lam gsum pa ste zung 'jug gi bdag nyid can no //
translated: Those three are the third middle path within the conventional and the ultimate, which has the nature of union.

original: de shes nas lha ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo'i ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni rab tu sbyor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de shes nas lha ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo'i ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni rab tu sbyor bar bya'o //
translated: Having understood that, the god should be applied to the samadhi of the nature of non-abiding nirvana.

original: ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi gal te gzugs la sogs pa la sems sbyar na de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi gal te gzugs la sogs pa la sems sbyar na de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid /
translated: If the mind is applied to form and so forth in that very samadhi, then the secret of all buddhas, which is Great Vajradhara himself,

original: snying po ni bstan par mi bya ba dang / 'dus pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying po ni bstan par mi bya ba dang / 'dus pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: the essence, which is not to be taught, and the assembly, which is to attain the nature of the Tathagata and so forth, will be obtained.

original: sgra dang gzugs la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi yul rnams longs spyod na lha ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku /
analyzed: sgra dang gzugs la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi yul rnams longs spyod na lha ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku /
translated: When enjoying external objects such as sound and form, the god is the body of non-abiding nirvana.

original: rtag tu ni dus gsum du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ni dus gsum du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should always meditate in the three times.

original: rigs kyi dbye ba ni gtsang ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi dbye ba ni gtsang ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The division of families is purity and so forth.

original: de rnams rnam par bsgom pa ni dbye ba spang ba'i yid la byed pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya ba ni shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams rnam par bsgom pa ni dbye ba spang ba'i yid la byed pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya ba ni shes par bya'o //
translated: The meditation on those is to be understood as the meditation by the mental attentions that abandon the divisions.

original: rigs dang rdzas la sogs pa'i dbye ba rtogs par mi bya ste zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
analyzed: rigs dang rdzas la sogs pa'i dbye ba rtogs par mi bya ste zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
translated: The divisions of type, substance, and so on are not to be realized. This is the stage of union.

original: yang na gzugs la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi dang / lcags kyu rnams so //
analyzed: yang na gzugs la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi dang / lcags kyu rnams so //
translated: Or else, form and so on are the nectars endowed with form and so on, and the hooks.

original: rnam gsum ni de rnams yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par byas la lha rnams ni phung po rnams la dbul par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam gsum ni de rnams yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par byas la lha rnams ni phung po rnams la dbul par bya'o //
translated: The threefold is consecrated by the three syllables, and the deities are to be offered to the aggregates.

original: phung po de nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro zhes bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: phung po de nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro zhes bsgom par bya'o //
translated: That very aggregate becomes the nature of Vairochana and so on. This is to be meditated on.

original: 'di @108b de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: 'di @108b de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: This is the stage of union.

original: zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bo ste gsang ba ni bstan par mi bya ba dang / snying po ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo dang / 'dus pa ni lnga po bsdus pas byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bo ste gsang ba ni bstan par mi bya ba dang / snying po ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo dang / 'dus pa ni lnga po bsdus pas byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o //
translated: This is the nature of the five nectars. Secret means not to be revealed. Essence means the nature of the consecration of the secret. Gathering means the collection of the five, which should be considered to be the nature of the bodhicitta.

original: de'i 'og tu gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i ngo bo bzung bar snod du gyur pa'i dmigs pa la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams lha nyid du bsgom pa ni de'i rnam par gyur pa'o zhes ston to //🔽yang na rigs kyi tshul du rnam par bsgom pas bsgom pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pas /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i ngo bo bzung bar snod du gyur pa'i dmigs pa la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams lha nyid du bsgom pa ni de'i rnam par gyur pa'o zhes ston to // yang na rigs kyi tshul du rnam par bsgom pas bsgom pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pas /
translated: Then, the consciousnesses of form, sound, and so on, which are the objects of the fit vessel, and so on, are cultivated as the deity.

original: go ku da ha na lnga bo bsgom par bya'o zhes tshig gi don to //
analyzed: go ku da ha na lnga bo bsgom par bya'o zhes tshig gi don to //
translated: Or else, the meaning of the words is that the cultivation of the five nectars is the cultivation of the five nectars in the manner of the families, consecrated by the seed syllables of the five tathagatas.

original: de ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: That is the accomplishment.

original: da ni rim pa gnyis kyi rjes su dran pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rim pa gnyis kyi rjes su dran pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the six recollections are to be explained as the nature of the five Tathagatas and of Great Vajradhara, in the two stages.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bsgom pa ni sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bsgom pa ni sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The recollection of the Buddha is the yoga of preparation, etc.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: The Buddha is Vairocana.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni de'i sa bon dang phyag mtshan yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa de'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa ni dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni de'i sa bon dang phyag mtshan yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa de'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa ni dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas bsam par bya'o //
translated: The recollection of him is the meditation on his mandala circle, born from the seed and insignia, which is to be contemplated by the divisions of the yoga of preparation, etc.

original: tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: This is the remainder of the verse.

original: de bzhin du chos rjes su dran pa ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos rjes su dran pa ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, the recollection of the Dharma is the meditation on the mandala of Amitabha.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams bsgom //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams bsgom //
translated: the meditation on body, speech, and mind

original: zhes pa ni sku la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba'i rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni sku la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba'i rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: is the mandala of Akshobhya, the vajra preceded by the emptiness of body, etc.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pas cho ga bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pas cho ga bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The recollection of that is the meditation on the creation stage according to the rite.

original: rigs ni rin chen gyi rigs te /
analyzed: rigs ni rin chen gyi rigs te /
translated: The family is the jewel family.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni de bzhin nyid dang zla ba dang sa bon la sogs pa'i rim pas bskyed par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni de bzhin nyid dang zla ba dang sa bon la sogs pa'i rim pas bskyed par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The recollection of that is the meditation on the creation stage by the process of suchness, moon, seed, and so forth.

original: de'i rjes la gdul bar dka' ba rnams stobs kyis 'gugs pa dang / dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rjes la gdul bar dka' ba rnams stobs kyis 'gugs pa dang / dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir /
translated: After that, in order to attract by power and to control those who are difficult to tame,

original: khro bo ni don yod grub pa ste /
analyzed: khro bo ni don yod grub pa ste /
translated: the wrathful one is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'byung bar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'byung bar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The recollection of that is the meditation on the arising by the process of the initial union and so forth.

original: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ni lha ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ni lha ste /
translated: After that, the deity is the body of Great Vajradhara, completely perfected by the atoms of all the tathagatas.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni dkyil 'khor lngas kun du bskor ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni dkyil 'khor lngas kun du bskor ba ste /
translated: The recollection of that is the complete circle of the five mandalas.

original: de lta bu'i @109a * //
analyzed: de lta bu'i @109a * //
translated: Such is the deity yoga.

original: sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ba bsgom na /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ba bsgom na /
translated: If one meditates on the yoga of meditative stabilization,

original: byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the creation stage.

original: yang na sangs rgyas ni dbang po lnga dang yul phrad par byas la /
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas ni dbang po lnga dang yul phrad par byas la /
translated: Alternatively, Buddha is the contact of the five sense organs with their objects.

original: rjes su dran pa ni yul re re de nyid la dbang po bskul par bya'i nyan thos bzhin du 'gags pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa ni yul re re de nyid la dbang po bskul par bya'i nyan thos bzhin du 'gags pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Recollection is the stimulation of the sense organs with respect to each object, but not their cessation as in the case of the śrāvakas.

original: de'i rjes la chos rjes su dran pa'i yul dang dbang po rnams lha ru byas te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la chos rjes su dran pa'i yul dang dbang po rnams lha ru byas te /
translated: After that, the objects and sense organs of recollection of the Dharma are made into deities.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: They should be meditated on as having the nature of the five tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin du sku gsung thugs byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i ngo bor bsdus te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sku gsung thugs byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i ngo bor bsdus te /
translated: In the same way, the body, speech, and mind are gathered into the essence of the bindu of bodhicitta.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rtse mor rjes su dran pa ni 'dzin pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rtse mor rjes su dran pa ni 'dzin pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Recollection at the tip of the vajra is meditating on the retention of the vajra.

original: de'i rjes la rigs ni sna gsum gyi rtse mor /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rigs ni sna gsum gyi rtse mor /
translated: After that, the family is at the tip of the three nāḍīs.

original: rjes su dran pa ni de bzhin du spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas de nyid du srog dang rtsol ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa ni de bzhin du spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas de nyid du srog dang rtsol ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Recollection is the meditation on prāṇa and āyāma in that very place by the process of emanating and gathering in that way.

original: de'i rjes la khro bo ni shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams rjes su dran pa ni phyi rol du spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la khro bo ni shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams rjes su dran pa ni phyi rol du spro bar bya'o //
translated: After that, the wrathful one is the recollection of the maṇḍalas that are very clear, which should be emanated externally.

original: de bzhin du lha ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du lha ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ste /
translated: Likewise, the deity is the body of Mahāvajradhara.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i ngo bor bsgoms na byang chub rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i ngo bor bsgoms na byang chub rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur te /
translated: The recollection of that is the meditation on the nature of not abiding in saṃsāra and nirvāṇa, which is the attainment of the state of Mahāvajradhara.

original: so sor sdud pa dang / bsam gtan dang / srog dang / rtsol ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams te rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa dang / bsam gtan dang / srog dang / rtsol ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams te rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The yoga is the withdrawal, meditative concentration, prāṇa and āyāma, retention, recollection, and samādhi.

original: yang na rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben par byas na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben par byas na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Alternately, if the body is made empty by the division of the one hundred families, the recollection of the buddhas is attained.

original: lus rnam par dag pa byung zhing de rjes la chos ni ngag ste /
analyzed: lus rnam par dag pa byung zhing de rjes la chos ni ngag ste /
translated: The body is purified, and after that, the Dharma is the speech.

original: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas de nyid rjes su dran par byas na dag rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas de nyid rjes su dran par byas na dag rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
translated: If one recollects that reality by the process of engagement and so forth, one enters into the purity of mind.

original: de'i rjes la sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo rnam pa gsum la stong pa dang snang ba gsum la sogs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje ni sems te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo rnam pa gsum la stong pa dang snang ba gsum la sogs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje ni sems te /
translated: After that, the three aspects of the nature of body, speech, and mind are the three emptinesses and appearances, and so forth.

original: de nyid rjes su dran par byas na sems rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran par byas na sems rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
translated: If one recollects that reality, one enters into the purity of mind.

original: de bzhin du rigs ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rigs ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis te /
translated: Similarly, the family is the twelve examples of illusion.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku bsgoms na bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku bsgoms na bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recollects that reality and meditates on the illusory body, one will attain the samādhi of self-consecration.

original: de'i rjes la chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang @109b chags pa bar pa rnams spang ba'i phyir khro bo ni de rnams 'jig par byed pas man ngag bzhi pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang @109b chags pa bar pa rnams spang ba'i phyir khro bo ni de rnams 'jig par byed pas man ngag bzhi pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: After that, in order to abandon attachment, nonattachment, and middling attachment, the wrathful one is the one who destroys them, the process of the fourth intimate instruction.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni phyi rol gyi dus mtshams la sogs pa'i dpe dang nang gi smig rgyu la sogs pa'i dpe rnams kyis rnam par dben pa byas na kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni phyi rol gyi dus mtshams la sogs pa'i dpe dang nang gi smig rgyu la sogs pa'i dpe rnams kyis rnam par dben pa byas na kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The recollection of that is the purification of the conventional truth, which is accomplished by means of the external examples such as the end of time and so forth and the internal examples such as the mirage and so forth.

original: de nas lha ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ste /
analyzed: de nas lha ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ste /
translated: Then, the deity is the body of Great Vajradhara, the essence of non-abiding nirvana.

original: de bsgoms na byang chub ni kun du 'od kyis la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin gyi go 'phang rnal 'byor pas thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bsgoms na byang chub ni kun du 'od kyis la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin gyi go 'phang rnal 'byor pas thob par 'gyur te /
translated: If one meditates on that, the yogi will attain the state of Vajradhara who abides in the enlightenment of the Totally Radiant.

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung 'jug gi rim pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung 'jug gi rim pa rnams so //
translated: The stages of the vajra repetition, the purification of the mind, the self-consecration, the manifest enlightenment, and the union.

original: gnyi ga'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis phyi rol gyi phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pas /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis phyi rol gyi phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pas /
translated: The yogis of both the generation and completion stages, by entering into union with an external mudra consort,

original: byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir bud med gzugs ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung te /
analyzed: byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir bud med gzugs ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung te /
translated: In order to attain enlightenment, one should obtain a woman who has the form of a maiden, and so on.

original: lo grangs bcu drug ces pa ni na so gzhon pas dga' ba nyams pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gzhon nu ma thob ste /
analyzed: lo grangs bcu drug ces pa ni na so gzhon pas dga' ba nyams pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gzhon nu ma thob ste /
translated: The sixteen years of age is the youth, because youth is the cause of obtaining the experience of passion.

original: bud med ni gar mkhan ma dang / khrus mkhan ma dang / smyig ma mkhan te rigs kyi dbye bas rnams gsum mo //
analyzed: bud med ni gar mkhan ma dang / khrus mkhan ma dang / smyig ma mkhan te rigs kyi dbye bas rnams gsum mo //
translated: The woman is of three types, according to the division of her family: dancer, washerwoman, and weaver.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is she like?

original: mdangs ni mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mdangs ni mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: She is radiant, meaning she is radiant.

original: bzang ba ni rigs kyi dbye bas dkar po la sogs pa'i mdog dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bzang ba ni rigs kyi dbye bas dkar po la sogs pa'i mdog dang ldan pa'o //
translated: She is beautiful, meaning she has a complexion of white and so on, according to the division of her family.

original: de ltar bud med thob nas dben pa'i le'u bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i rim pas thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor las gang yang rung ba'i gnas la mchod pa ni gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu brtsam pa ni spyod par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bud med thob nas dben pa'i le'u bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i rim pas thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor las gang yang rung ba'i gnas la mchod pa ni gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu brtsam pa ni spyod par bya'o //
translated: Having obtained such a woman, one should commence, that is, practice, the secret worship, the worship of the mandala in any place, according to the stage of Vajra Mind and so on, by the process stated in the fourth chapter on solitude.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How?

original: byin gyis brlab pa ni yi ge gsum ste /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa ni yi ge gsum ste /
translated: Blessing is the three syllables.

original: de dag gis bdag de nyid la dgod par byas pas so //
analyzed: de dag gis bdag de nyid la dgod par byas pas so //
translated: By means of them, one should establish oneself in reality.

original: yang na byin gyis brlabs pa gsum ni bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po rnam pa gsum ste /🔽de dag mnyam pa pos so zhes ston to //
analyzed: yang na byin gyis brlabs pa gsum ni bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po rnam pa gsum ste / de dag mnyam pa pos so zhes ston to //
translated: Alternatively, the three blessings are the three kinds of male and female organs.

original: dper na skyes pa gsum ni ri bong dang khyu mchog dang rta rnams so //
analyzed: dper na skyes pa gsum ni ri bong dang khyu mchog dang rta rnams so //
translated: The three males are the rabbit, the bull, and the horse.

original: ri dags mo dang rgod ma dang glang po ste bud med gsum mo //
analyzed: ri dags mo dang rgod ma dang glang po ste bud med gsum mo //
translated: The three females are the doe, the mare, and the cow.

original: de la sor mo bdun dang dgu dang bcu gnyis kyi tshad dang ldan pa'i rtags ni ri bong la sogs @110a * //
analyzed: de la sor mo bdun dang dgu dang bcu gnyis kyi tshad dang ldan pa'i rtags ni ri bong la sogs @110a * //
translated: The rabbit, etc., have the signs of seven, nine, and twelve fingerbreadths, respectively.

original: pa'o // chung ba dang bar pa dang rags pa'i rtags dang ldan pa ni ri dags mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pa'o // chung ba dang bar pa dang rags pa'i rtags dang ldan pa ni ri dags mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: The doe, etc., have small, medium, and large signs, respectively.

original: de'i phyir rang dang yul dang dus dang rtags mnyam por shes nas snyoms par zhugs par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang dang yul dang dus dang rtags mnyam por shes nas snyoms par zhugs par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, knowing the equality of oneself, the object, the time, and the signs, one should engage in union.

original: gzhan du na 'gal ba'i 'brel bas dga' ba zad par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: gzhan du na 'gal ba'i 'brel bas dga' ba zad par 'gyur ro ;
translated: Otherwise, the connection would be contradictory and the pleasure would be exhausted.

original: / yang na gal te mtshungs pa rnams rnyed par ma gyur na de'i tshe rgod ma la sogs pa'i byed pa'i sbyor bas rags pa dang chung ba la sogs pa mnyam por sbyor ba snyoms par zhugs pa brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: / yang na gal te mtshungs pa rnams rnyed par ma gyur na de'i tshe rgod ma la sogs pa'i byed pa'i sbyor bas rags pa dang chung ba la sogs pa mnyam por sbyor ba snyoms par zhugs pa brtsam par bya'o //
translated: Or else, if one does not find a suitable woman, then one should begin the practice of union with a mare, etc., by means of the application of the performance of the act, and by the application of the equipoise of the equality of the gross and subtle, etc.

original: gzhan yang bud med de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang bud med de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what kind of woman is it?🔽The supreme queen of the Tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo mchog / spyan ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa dang / sogs pa'i sgras ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis de nyid m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo mchog / spyan ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa dang / sogs pa'i sgras ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis de nyid m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: the yoginis of Lochana, etc., and the yoginis of Akshobhya, etc., should meditate on her as having the nature of Mamaki, etc.

original: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa bsam par bya'o zhes ston to ;
analyzed: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa bsam par bya'o zhes ston to ;
translated: Then one should think of the stage of generation.

original: / dbang po gnyis ni rus sbal ma dang zla ba ma ste rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: / dbang po gnyis ni rus sbal ma dang zla ba ma ste rtsa gnyis so //
translated: The two organs are the tortoise and the moon, that is, the two channels.

original: de dag mnyam sbyor ni lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: de dag mnyam sbyor ni lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas bskyod pa ste /
translated: Their union is the shaking by the mudra of the hand with the hook, etc.

original: de byas na sangs rgyas ni byang chub kyi sems kyi dngos grub ni zhu ba nyid //
analyzed: de byas na sangs rgyas ni byang chub kyi sems kyi dngos grub ni zhu ba nyid //
translated: Having done that, the Buddha, the Accomplishment of the Thought of Enlightenment,

original: thob par gyur pa ni dro ba'i reg pa rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: thob par gyur pa ni dro ba'i reg pa rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
translated: is attained, and one obtains the touch of warmth.

original: reg pa de nyid thob nas lce'i rtse mor bldag ste /
analyzed: reg pa de nyid thob nas lce'i rtse mor bldag ste /
translated: Having obtained that touch, one should kiss the tip of the tongue,

original: rdo rje bcing ba brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba brtsam par bya'o //
translated: and one should begin the Vajra Bond.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: yi ge h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje sems te /
analyzed: yi ge h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje sems te /
translated: The Vajra Mind born from the letter Hum,

original: de nyid kyi lte ba yi ge aom gyis mtshan par byas la padma yang yi ge h'um las skyes te dag gi dbang phyug gis bon gyis lte bar byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi lte ba yi ge aom gyis mtshan par byas la padma yang yi ge h'um las skyes te dag gi dbang phyug gis bon gyis lte bar byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: and the lotus also born from the letter Hum, should be consecrated by the seed of the Lord of the Speech at the center.

original: dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis de srid du lhan cig skyes pa mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis de srid du lhan cig skyes pa mtshon par bya'o //
translated: By the process of joy and so forth, one should indicate the Innate to that extent.

original: ji srid du sems rtse gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du sems rtse gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: To the extent that there is one-pointedness of mind.

original: de kho na nyid mtshon pas de'i rjes la gzhan gyi don bya ba'i phyi phat gyi sgras sangs thams cad kyi ngo bo byang chub kyi sems spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid mtshon pas de'i rjes la gzhan gyi don bya ba'i phyi phat gyi sgras sangs thams cad kyi ngo bo byang chub kyi sems spro bar bya'o //
translated: Then, after the demonstration of reality, one should emit the bodhicitta, the essence of all, with the sound of PHAT for the sake of others.

original: de'i dang bor ni 'od zer rnam pa lngas nye bar mtshon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los brgyan pa padma dang rdo rje bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i dang bor ni 'od zer rnam pa lngas nye bar mtshon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los brgyan pa padma dang rdo rje bsgom par bya ste /
translated: First of all, one should visualize the lotus and vajra adorned with the wheel of the mandala of the five Tathagata families, which are indicated by the five-colored light rays.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis so zhes tshig gi @110b lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis so zhes tshig gi @110b lhag ma'o //
translated: This is the remainder of the sentence, “by the yogas of Vairochana, etc.”

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas kyang padma dang rdo rje mi zla ba'i 'od nang du 'bar ba dang bcas pa ni dkar po'i 'od kyi tshogs spro ba dang / de bzhin du yid du 'od pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi sa gang ba'i phyir bde ba chen po'i ngo bo bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas kyang padma dang rdo rje mi zla ba'i 'od nang du 'bar ba dang bcas pa ni dkar po'i 'od kyi tshogs spro ba dang / de bzhin du yid du 'od pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi sa gang ba'i phyir bde ba chen po'i ngo bo bsam par bya'o //
translated: Even the yogi/nī of Great Vajradhara should visualize the lotus and vajra, blazing with the light of the moon, as the emission of the mass of white light, and likewise, the pleasing, which is the nature of great bliss, should be imagined as filled with the ground of bodhicitta.

original: de ltar byas na cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar byas na cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens if one does it that way?🔽The recollection of the Buddha, the yoga of the six-branched yoga,

original: sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba la sogs pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba la sogs pa //
translated: and so on,🔽are the powers of the seals of the six Tathagata families.

original: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs drug gi phyag rgya'i dngos grub ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams dang / yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub rnams dang / lus rnam par dben pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya na thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs drug gi phyag rgya'i dngos grub ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams dang / yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub rnams dang / lus rnam par dben pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya na thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The powers of the yoga of the six-branched yoga, and the powers of the yoga of the stage of completion, such as the isolation of the body, and so on, are attained when they are cultivated by the yogis of the stage of generation and the stage of completion, respectively.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ste /
analyzed: byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ste /
translated: Enlightenment is the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: de 'dod pa ni gzhan rnams la 'dod pa sngon du 'gro bas ster bas na byang chub 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de 'dod pa ni gzhan rnams la 'dod pa sngon du 'gro bas ster bas na byang chub 'dod pa ste /
translated: The desire for that is the desire for enlightenment, since it is preceded by the desire for the benefit of others.

original: gnyi ga'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so zhes ston to //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so zhes ston to //
translated: This is taught by both yogis.

original: des ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: des ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is what is explained by that verse.

original: gnyi ga'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
translated: This teaches that yogis and yoginis who enter into union with a consort will attain the spiritual power of the great seal.

original: de ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so//
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so//
translated: This is the nature, cause, effect, and action of the great seal.

original: la la na re /🔽sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor //
analyzed: la la na re / sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor //
translated: Some say:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig ni mdor bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig ni mdor bstan pa yin la /
translated: The words “one should apply mindfulness of the Buddha” and so on are the brief presentation.

original: de bzhin du de las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par bshad pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du de las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par bshad pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: The extensive explanation is “how should one meditate on mindfulness of the Buddha” and so on.

original: de ni mi rigs te gang gi phyir mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa dag rim pa dang grangs kyis bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te gang gi phyir mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa dag rim pa dang grangs kyis bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is illogical because the brief presentation and extensive explanation are explained in order and number.

original: dper na rab tu byed pa las ni rlung gi de kho na nyid dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid mdor bstan nas /
analyzed: dper na rab tu byed pa las ni rlung gi de kho na nyid dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid mdor bstan nas /
translated: For example, the treatise Differentiating the middle and extremes presents the reality of wind and the reality of mantra in brief and then explains them extensively.

original: rim pa de nyid rgyas par bshad par dang / yang bshad pa dag bstan to //
analyzed: rim pa de nyid rgyas par bshad par dang / yang bshad pa dag bstan to //
translated: The above is an extensive explanation of the stages of the six recollections, and also an explanation of the six recollections.

original: 'dir ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sogs pa gal te drug mdor bstan pa yin na de'i tshe phyi dus su bcu drug gis ji ltar rgyas par bshad par yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sogs pa gal te drug mdor bstan pa yin na de'i tshe phyi dus su bcu drug gis ji ltar rgyas par bshad par yin no //
translated: If the six recollections are taught in brief here, then how are they taught extensively in the future with sixteen?

original: gal te de'i nang nas drug rgyas par bshad na /
analyzed: gal te de'i nang nas drug rgyas par bshad na /
translated: If six are taught extensively from among them,

original: de'i tshe gzhan rnams la mdor bstan par mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe gzhan rnams la mdor bstan par mi rigs so //
translated: then it is unreasonable to teach the others in brief.

original: gal te de rnams rang dbang du bshad na @111a * //
analyzed: gal te de rnams rang dbang du bshad na @111a * //
translated: If they are taught independently,

original: de'i tshe drug po yang de bzhin du ston cig / nges pa gang yin /
analyzed: de'i tshe drug po yang de bzhin du ston cig / nges pa gang yin /
translated: then teach the six in the same way.

original: de ma bshad pas mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa'i rim pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ma bshad pas mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa'i rim pa ni ma yin no //
translated: What is certain is that since they are not taught, they are not the sequence of brief and extensive explanations.

original: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi dgongs pa gtso bo yin pas grangs ni ldan pa yin no zhes ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
analyzed: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi dgongs pa gtso bo yin pas grangs ni ldan pa yin no zhes ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
translated: However, since the intention of the Bhagavān’s speech is primary, it is sufficient to say that the number is complete.

original: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i rgyud las rjes su dran pa bcu drug bstan te /
analyzed: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i rgyud las rjes su dran pa bcu drug bstan te /
translated: Here, the Bhagavān taught the sixteen recollections from the tantra.

original: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / rdo rje dang / rigs dang / khro bo dang / dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / sems can dang / sngags kyi sku thams cad sku gsung thugs dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / rdo rje dang / rigs dang / khro bo dang / dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / sems can dang / sngags kyi sku thams cad sku gsung thugs dang /
translated: They are the recollection of the Buddha, the Dharma, the Vajra, the family, wrath, the commitments, the maṇḍala, the body, speech, mind, all sentient beings, the mantra body,

original: dam tshig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang / skye ba med pa dang // zhe sdang dang rigs la mchod pa dran pa ste bcu drug go //
analyzed: dam tshig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang / skye ba med pa dang // zhe sdang dang rigs la mchod pa dran pa ste bcu drug go //
translated: the commitments of the body, speech, and mind, the commitment of the perfection of wisdom, non-arising, and the worship of the family and wrath.

original: de nyid dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal pa mchog dang / las kyi rgyal ba mchog dang / bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
analyzed: de nyid dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal pa mchog dang / las kyi rgyal ba mchog dang / bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
translated: They are the first yoga, the supreme victor maṇḍala, the supreme victor activity, the creation stage, the completion stage, the vajra recitation, the purification of the mind, the self-consecration,

original: mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung 'jug dang / rang bzhin dang / rgyu dang / las dang / 'bras bu dang / rnal 'byor dang / sgrub pa rnams te tshig gi don to //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung 'jug dang / rang bzhin dang / rgyu dang / las dang / 'bras bu dang / rnal 'byor dang / sgrub pa rnams te tshig gi don to //
translated: The topics are: the cause, the result, the yoga, and the practice.

original: gang gis mos pa'i dbang gis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis mos pa'i dbang gis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the power of devotion, the yogis attain the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: nyan thos pa'i rigs can gyi phyogs su dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa bcu drug gi rnam par dag pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bcu drug gi rnam par shes pa de dag yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos pa'i rigs can gyi phyogs su dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa bcu drug gi rnam par dag pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bcu drug gi rnam par shes pa de dag yin no //
translated: For those of the Śrāvaka type, the sixteen aspects of mindfulness of inhalation and exhalation are purified, and for those of the Mahāyāna, those sixteen aspects of consciousness of the Bhagavān.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: There, there and so on explains that.

original: sangs rgyas ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid de /
translated: Buddha is the reality of emptiness.

original: de'i rjes su dran pa ni zhugs pa ste ;
analyzed: de'i rjes su dran pa ni zhugs pa ste ;
translated: The mindfulness of that is the engagement.

original: de bsgom pa ni bsam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de bsgom pa ni bsam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the meditation on that?

original: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad 'joms pas na bha ga ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad 'joms pas na bha ga ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: Since it conquers all afflictive obstructions and obstructions to omniscience, the bhaga is emptiness.

original: bha ga de la lingga bzhag pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams gzhug par byas la /
analyzed: bha ga de la lingga bzhag pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams gzhug par byas la /
translated: The liṅga is placed in that bhaga, and the aggregates, constituents, and sense-spheres are inserted.

original: sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'i rang @111b bzhin du bsgom pa ni bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'i rang @111b bzhin du bsgom pa ni bsam par bya'o //
translated: The buddha is the nature of the body of Great Vajradhara.

original: ba spu rnams ni rtsa bdun khri nyis stong gi bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bu ga ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: ba spu rnams ni rtsa bdun khri nyis stong gi bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bu ga ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: The pores are the nature of the seventy-two thousand channels. The body’s apertures are the foundation consciousness.

original: de'i rtse me ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bar ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams te /
analyzed: de'i rtse me ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bar ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams te /
translated: The tips of those channels are the mental consciousness, and the middle is the six active consciousnesses.

original: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas sprin ni stong pa nyid chen po ste /
analyzed: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas sprin ni stong pa nyid chen po ste /
translated: All of those are the cloud of buddhas, which is great emptiness.

original: de'i rang bzhin du spro ba ni shes par bya ste dang po sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du spro ba ni shes par bya ste dang po sbyor ba'o //
translated: One should understand that they are emanated as that nature.

original: de la chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The mindfulness of phenomena and so on.

original: chos ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug ste /🔽de nyid rjes su dran pa ni bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: chos ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug ste / de nyid rjes su dran pa ni bskyed pa ste /
translated: The Dharma is the lord of the mandala.🔽Recollection of that is the generation.

original: de bsgom pa ni bsam pa ste /
analyzed: de bsgom pa ni bsam pa ste /
translated: Meditation on that is the thought.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bha ga la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bha ga la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the bhaga, etc.

original: bha ga ni stong pa nyid de sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i rang gi sems skar ma dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: bha ga ni stong pa nyid de sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i rang gi sems skar ma dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: The bhaga is emptiness, one's mind like a cloudless sky, like a star.

original: lingga ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par gyur pa yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: lingga ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par gyur pa yi ge gsum mo //
translated: The liṅga is the three syllables, which are the symbol of the meditative concentration of Mahāvajradhara.

original: 'jug pa ni de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa rdo rje bsam zhing de las byung ba chos ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku bsgom par bya ba ni bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa rdo rje bsam zhing de las byung ba chos ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku bsgom par bya ba ni bskyed par bya'o //
translated: The entry is the vajra that arises from the transformation of that, and the Dharma that arises from that is the meditation on the form of Vajrasattva, etc. , the nature of all phenomena.

original: de bskyed nas ba spu rnams ni phung po rnams so //
analyzed: de bskyed nas ba spu rnams ni phung po rnams so //
translated: Having generated that, the pores are the aggregates.

original: bu ga ni khams rnams so //🔽rtse mo ni skye mched rnams so //
analyzed: bu ga ni khams rnams so // rtse mo ni skye mched rnams so //
translated: The cavities are the elements.🔽The tips are the sense bases.

original: par ni sgo rnams so //
analyzed: par ni sgo rnams so //
translated: The doors are the sense organs.

original: chos kyi sprin ni de dag pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du spro ba ni shes par bya ste /
analyzed: chos kyi sprin ni de dag pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du spro ba ni shes par bya ste /
translated: The cloud of dharma is the emanation of all those as the nature of the five transcendent ones, which should be understood.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du rtogs par bya ste /

original: dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog go //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog go //
translated: The mandala of supreme victory is the mandala of the victors.🔽With respect to that, etc.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams rjes su dran pa ni spro ba'i sbyor ba dang / de bzhin du sgom pa ni sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams rjes su dran pa ni spro ba'i sbyor ba dang / de bzhin du sgom pa ni sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: The vajra is the recollection of the mandala deities, the yoga of emanation, and likewise, the meditation is the consecration of the body, etc.

original: bha ga ni phyag rgya ma'i padmar lingga rdo rje ste sngags las skyes pa dang / sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bzhag pa ni zhugs te /
analyzed: bha ga ni phyag rgya ma'i padmar lingga rdo rje ste sngags las skyes pa dang / sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bzhag pa ni zhugs te /
translated: The bhaga is the lotus of the seal, and the linga is the vajra, which is generated from mantra and consecrated by mantra.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi sems te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo khyad par du le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i badzra dhri ga ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi tshul du bsgo ba ni padma'i lte bar dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor🔽sngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi sems te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo khyad par du le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i badzra dhri ga ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi tshul du bsgo ba ni padma'i lte bar dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor sngo bar bya'o //
translated: The commitment maṇḍala is placed in the center of the lotus.

original: de'i rjes la ba spu rnams kyi bu ga ni rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la ba spu rnams kyi bu ga ni rtsa ba'o //
translated: After that, the pores of the body hairs are the roots.

original: rtse mo ni @112a * //
analyzed: rtse mo ni @112a * //
translated: The tips are the

original: mtha'o // bar ni spu gnyi ga'i bar ro //
analyzed: mtha'o // bar ni spu gnyi ga'i bar ro //
translated: ends. The middle is between the two body hairs.

original: de rnams las rdo rje sprin ni dkyil 'khor pa'i tshogs te /
analyzed: de rnams las rdo rje sprin ni dkyil 'khor pa'i tshogs te /
translated: From those, the vajra clouds are the assembly of the maṇḍala.

original: ye shes sems ma'i zhal dang / dam tshig sems ma'i ba spu'i bu ga nas phyi rol du zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams la spro ba ni sngon du 'gro ba dang / sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro ba dgod par bya ste /
analyzed: ye shes sems ma'i zhal dang / dam tshig sems ma'i ba spu'i bu ga nas phyi rol du zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams la spro ba ni sngon du 'gro ba dang / sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro ba dgod par bya ste /
translated: The faces of the gnosis goddesses and the pores of the body hairs of the commitment goddesses emanate externally onto the seats of the moon and sun.

original: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
analyzed: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
translated: The supreme victor of activity is the supreme victor of activity.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Regarding that, “and so forth” means

original: rigs ni lus te de nyid rjes su dran pa ni bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: rigs ni lus te de nyid rjes su dran pa ni bskyed pa ste /
translated: The family is the body, and the recollection of that is the generation.

original: de bsgom pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtags pa'o //
analyzed: de bsgom pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtags pa'o //
translated: The meditation on that is the imagination of the Tathagata.

original: de yang ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: And how is that?

original: bha ga ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus la /
analyzed: bha ga ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus la /
translated: The bhaga is the body, which is the nature of the five aggregates.

original: lingga ni rtsa'i 'khor lo bzhag pa ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes te /
analyzed: lingga ni rtsa'i 'khor lo bzhag pa ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes te /
translated: The liṅga is the placement of the cakras, which should be known in the proper order.

original: sangs rgyas gzugs ni de nyid las 'byung ba'i 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i bdag nyid kyi khams gsum pa dang / rang gi bdag nyid bsgom pa ni shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs ni de nyid las 'byung ba'i 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i bdag nyid kyi khams gsum pa dang / rang gi bdag nyid bsgom pa ni shes par bya'o //
translated: The form of the Buddha is the three worlds, which are of the nature of the moving and unmoving, and should be known as the meditation on one's own nature.

original: rtsa'i 'khor lo de nyid ba spu rnams kyi bu ga la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: rtsa'i 'khor lo de nyid ba spu rnams kyi bu ga la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye bar 'gyur ba /
translated: That cakra itself is divided by the pores of the body and so forth.

original: rigs kyi sprin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du spro bar bya ba ni mos par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi sprin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du spro bar bya ba ni mos par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The cloud of the family is the nature of the Tathagata's family, which should be imagined, that is, generated, in the creation stage.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: There and so forth.

original: khro bo ni phung po la sogs pa ye shes kyi mes bsreg pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo ni phung po la sogs pa ye shes kyi mes bsreg pa'o //
translated: Wrath is the burning of the aggregates, etc. by the fire of intuition.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni 'byung ba ste /
translated: The recollection of that is the arising.

original: de bsgom pa ni yang dang yang du bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: de bsgom pa ni yang dang yang du bsgom pa ste /
translated: The cultivation of that is the repeated cultivation.

original: de ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bha ga ni sna'i rtse mor lingga'i thig le ste /
analyzed: bha ga ni sna'i rtse mor lingga'i thig le ste /
translated: The bhaga is the drop of the linga at the tip of the nose.

original: bzhag pa ni bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bzhag pa ni bsam par bya'o //
translated: It is placed, i.e., imagined.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: khro bo ni shin tu rno ba'i 'od zer rnams te //
analyzed: khro bo ni shin tu rno ba'i 'od zer rnams te //
translated: Wrath is the very sharp rays.

original: de'i dbang po ni thig le de nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dbang po ni thig le de nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The organ of that is the drop itself, which is to be cultivated.

original: de'i rjes la ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas khro bo'i sprin ni shin tu rno ba'i 'od zer rnams te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas khro bo'i sprin ni shin tu rno ba'i 'od zer rnams te /
translated: After that, the cloud of wrath is the very sharp rays, which illuminate the body.

original: lus po gsal bar byed pa spro bar bya ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: lus po gsal bar byed pa spro bar bya ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The emanation of that is the perfection stage.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dam tshig ni yi ge gsum ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dam tshig ni yi ge gsum ste /
translated: In that, etc. The pledge is the three syllables.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bzlas pa ste /
translated: The recollection of that is the repetition by the process of entry, etc.

original: de bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim gyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim gyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'o //
translated: The meditation on that is the emanation and gathering by the process of the four mandalas.

original: de yang ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: And how is that?

original: rdo rje ni yi ge h'um ngo //🔽padma ni yi ge a'a: 'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni yi ge h'um ngo // padma ni yi ge a'a: 'o //
translated: The vajra is the syllable hūṃ.🔽The lotus is the syllable āḥ.

original: ldan pa ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: ldan pa ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: The union is the syllable oṃ.

original: dbang po gnyis ni srog dang rtsol ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni srog dang rtsol ba'o //
translated: The two organs are the life-force and exertion.

original: sbyor ba ni @112b gnas pa'i rlung ste mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni @112b gnas pa'i rlung ste mnyam pa'o //
translated: The union is the wind of equipoise.

original: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rlung rnams kyis bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rlung rnams kyis bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite with the winds of exhalation and so on.

original: de bzhin du rang gi khu ba ni byang chub sems kyi ngo bo sngags rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi khu ba ni byang chub sems kyi ngo bo sngags rnams so //
translated: In the same way, one’s seminal fluid is the essence of bodhicitta, the mantras.

original: thig le ni de rnams kyi spyod pa tha mar gnas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang tsheg drag dag go //
analyzed: thig le ni de rnams kyi spyod pa tha mar gnas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang tsheg drag dag go //
translated: The drop is the vowels and consonants that follow the conduct of those, which is the final abiding.

original: sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rdo rje sems dpa' ni bdag po snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rdo rje sems dpa' ni bdag po snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa ste /
translated: The buddhas are the four mandalas, and Vajrasattva is the lord, Amitābha, and so on.

original: de rnams kyis mchod pa ni kha dog dmar po la sogs pa'i dbye bas g-yas pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyis mchod pa ni kha dog dmar po la sogs pa'i dbye bas g-yas pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis spro bar bya ste /
translated: Those offerings are to be emanated by way of the right and so forth in the divisions of red color and so forth.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of vajra repetition.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Therein, etc.

original: dkyil 'khor ni sems kyi 'khor lo ste rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni sems kyi 'khor lo ste rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: The mandala is the mind wheel, which is threefold.

original: rjes su dran pa ni snang ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas de nyid 'od gsal ba nyid du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa ni snang ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas de nyid 'od gsal ba nyid du byed pa'o //
translated: Recollection is the making of that very [mind wheel] clear light by way of the divisions of appearance, etc.

original: de bsgom pa ni yang dang yang du slob pa ste ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: de bsgom pa ni yang dang yang du slob pa ste ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: The cultivation of that is the repeated practice. How is it?

original: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste ;
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste ;
translated: The two organs are in equipoise.

original: zhes bya ba la dbang po gnyis ni snang ba dang snang ba ma ched pa'i ye shes dag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dbang po gnyis ni snang ba dang snang ba ma ched pa'i ye shes dag go //
translated: The two organs are the gnoses of appearance and the appearance of increase.

original: mnyam gzhag ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: mnyam gzhag ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The equipoise is the gnosis of the attainment of appearance.

original: rnam par shes pa gsum ste de rnams dang rang gi rang bzhin rnams te khu ba ni 'od gsal ba la'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gsum ste de rnams dang rang gi rang bzhin rnams te khu ba ni 'od gsal ba la'o //
translated: The three consciousnesses are those and their own natures. The seminal essence is in the clear light.

original: mkhas pa ni rnal 'byor pas 'bad pa ni nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa ni rnal 'byor pas 'bad pa ni nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: The wise one should gather the effort of the yogī.

original: dkyil 'khor ni de nyid 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni de nyid 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: The maṇḍala is the characteristic of entering into clear light.

original: dkyil ni snying po ste de len par byed pas na dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil ni snying po ste de len par byed pas na dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala is the essence, and since it takes that, it is the maṇḍala.

original: de bzhin du khams gsum brgyan par byed pas na dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khams gsum brgyan par byed pas na dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Likewise, since it adorns the three realms, the maṇḍala is Mahāvajradhara.

original: de nyid kyi tshul ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas thim pa'o zhes ston to /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshul ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas thim pa'o zhes ston to /
translated: The method of that is the dissolution by the stage of self-consecration, which is taught.

original: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of the purification of the mind.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In that, etc.

original: sku ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: sku ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: The body is like an illusion.

original: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni 'od gsal ba las gcig tu spro ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dran pa ni 'od gsal ba las gcig tu spro ba'o //
translated: The recollection of that is the single emission from clear light.

original: bsgom pa ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin //
translated: The meditation is the meditation of the stage of self-consecration.🔽The body of all buddhas

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: is the body of the vajra of body.

original: sku gang yin zhes pa ni ji ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi sku'o //
analyzed: sku gang yin zhes pa ni ji ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi sku'o //
translated: What is the body? It is the body that has the nature of an illusion.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gang zhig sku /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gang zhig sku /
translated: The body of all the buddhas is the body of the tathāgatas.

original: phung po lnga nye bar mtshon par gyur @113a * //🔽pas khams dang skye mched rnams kyis kyang rab tu ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis rgyas pa ni dper byas par bsgoms la /
analyzed: phung po lnga nye bar mtshon par gyur @113a * // pas khams dang skye mched rnams kyis kyang rab tu ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis rgyas pa ni dper byas par bsgoms la /
translated: Since the five aggregates are illustrated, the elements and sense bases are also.🔽The body of the buddhas is the nature of a body that is like a magical illusion and a rainbow.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku ni mig 'phrul dang 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ba'i sku'i rang bzhin bdag dang kyang gi sgras 'gro ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur cig pa'o zhes bdag nyid dang 'gro ba dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku ni mig 'phrul dang 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ba'i sku'i rang bzhin bdag dang kyang gi sgras 'gro ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur cig pa'o zhes bdag nyid dang 'gro ba dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
translated: One should meditate on oneself and all migrating beings as having the nature of an illusion.🔽The mantra is:🔽oṃ sarvatathāgata kāya-vāk-citta vajra-svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The stage of self-consecration.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In that way, etc.

original: gsung ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: gsung ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Speech is of four kinds:

original: mchog dang lta bar byed pa dang / bar ma dang gsal ba rnams so //
analyzed: mchog dang lta bar byed pa dang / bar ma dang gsal ba rnams so //
translated: supreme, revealing, intermediate, and clear.

original: de la rlung dang rnam par shes pa dag phrad cing gang zhig nang gi rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba tsam 'dod pa de ni mchog go //
analyzed: de la rlung dang rnam par shes pa dag phrad cing gang zhig nang gi rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba tsam 'dod pa de ni mchog go //
translated: The best is the one who asserts that the wind and consciousness merely come together and that internal conceptualization arises.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: bdag ni blo yi yul brtags shing //
analyzed: bdag ni blo yi yul brtags shing //
translated: I am the object of the mind’s examination.

original: yid ni smra bar 'dod pas sbyar //
analyzed: yid ni smra bar 'dod pas sbyar //

original: yid kyi lus kyi mi reg ste //
analyzed: yid kyi lus kyi mi reg ste //
translated: The mind does not touch the body,

original: des kyang rlung rab skul bar byed //🔽ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: des kyang rlung rab skul bar byed // ces 'byung ngo //
translated: but it stimulates the wind.

original: de'i rjes la rlung la zhon pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa de nyid rlung gi ngo bo gang gi tshe g-yon dang g-yas pa'i rtsa dag las rgyu zhing mi gsal ba nyid du 'gro bar 'dod pa de ni lta bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la rlung la zhon pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa de nyid rlung gi ngo bo gang gi tshe g-yon dang g-yas pa'i rtsa dag las rgyu zhing mi gsal ba nyid du 'gro bar 'dod pa de ni lta bar byed pa'o //
translated: After that, the conceptualization of consciousness riding on the wind, when it moves through the left and right channels and desires to go to the unclear state, that is seeing.

original: de'i rjes la rlung de nyid kyis gnas brgyad du reg ste yi ge phyi mo'i ngo bo nyid thob cing rna ba'i dbang pos cung zad nyan par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bar ma'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la rlung de nyid kyis gnas brgyad du reg ste yi ge phyi mo'i ngo bo nyid thob cing rna ba'i dbang pos cung zad nyan par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bar ma'o //
translated: After that, when that very wind touches the eight places, obtains the nature of the later letters, and becomes slightly heard by the ear faculty, that is the middle.

original: ji skad du nam mkha'i rlung las 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ji skad du nam mkha'i rlung las 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'byung ngo //
translated: Just as it is said that “the wind arises from space,” and so on, as before.

original: de bzhin du yi ge'i phyi mo de nyid yi ge dang ngag dang dag chen po la sogs pa'i dbye bas bgrangs shing chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / ji srid skad drug la sogs pa'i dbye bas nyan par gyur pa gang yin pa ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yi ge'i phyi mo de nyid yi ge dang ngag dang dag chen po la sogs pa'i dbye bas bgrangs shing chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / ji srid skad drug la sogs pa'i dbye bas nyan par gyur pa gang yin pa ni gsal ba'o //
translated: Similarly, the very same alphabet is enumerated by the divisions of letters, speech, great void, and so on, and the eighty-four thousand aggregates of Dharma, and however many are heard by the divisions of the six languages, and so on, that is the manifest.

original: dag kyang shes pa la rag lus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dag kyang shes pa la rag lus pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the void also depends on consciousness,

original: gsal ba ni chags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gsal ba ni chags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: the manifest is the nature of the consciousness of attachment.

original: bar pa ni chags pa bar pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bar pa ni chags pa bar pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The middle is the nature of the consciousness of middling attachment.

original: lta bar byed pa ni chags pa dang bral ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: lta bar byed pa ni chags pa dang bral ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The viewer is the nature of the consciousness of nonattachment.

original: mchog ni chags pa dang / chags pa dang bral ba dang / chags pa par pa dang / shes pa dang / shes bya rnams dang bral zhing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i snang ba @113b bzhi pa'i ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: mchog ni chags pa dang / chags pa dang bral ba dang / chags pa par pa dang / shes pa dang / shes bya rnams dang bral zhing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i snang ba @113b bzhi pa'i ngo bo yin no //
translated: The supreme is the nature of the fourth appearance, which is free from attachment, detachment, and the attached, and from cognition and the cognized, and is naturally radiant.

original: de lta bu'i snang ba bzhi'i gsung rjes su dran pa ni bzhi pa nyid du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i snang ba bzhi'i gsung rjes su dran pa ni bzhi pa nyid du byed pa'o //
translated: The recollection of the speech of such four appearances is made into the fourth.

original: de bsgom pa ni mngon du bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bsgom pa ni mngon du bya ba'o //
translated: The cultivation of that is the realization.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin //
analyzed: rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin //
translated: The speech of Vajradharma

original: zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni 'dod chags so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni 'dod chags so //
translated: Vajra is passion.

original: chos ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: chos ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
translated: Dharma is freedom from passion.

original: gsung gi des tshig ni 'dod chags bar pa'o //
analyzed: gsung gi des tshig ni 'dod chags bar pa'o //
translated: The speech of that is the middle passion.

original: phun sum tshogs pa de ni de rnams ril por 'dzin pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dag gis lhan cig skyes pa nyid du byed pa ste /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa de ni de rnams ril por 'dzin pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dag gis lhan cig skyes pa nyid du byed pa ste /
translated: That perfection is made into the very nature of the innate by means of the grasping of the whole and the engagement.

original: de ni bdag dang kyang gi sgras 'gro ba kun gyis de lta bu bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bdag dang kyang gi sgras 'gro ba kun gyis de lta bu bsgom par bya'o //
translated: That should be cultivated by oneself and by all beings, as indicated by the word and.

original: chos 'dzin ni nam mkha'i dbyings so //
analyzed: chos 'dzin ni nam mkha'i dbyings so //
translated: The dharmadhātu is the realm of space.

original: de dang 'dra ba ni de dang mnyam pa'o zhes tshig gi don te mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba ni de dang mnyam pa'o zhes tshig gi don te mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The like is the equality of that, that is, the meaning of the words. This is the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thugs ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i ngo bo /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thugs ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i ngo bo /
translated: Therein, mind is the essence of the nonduality of the conventional and the ultimate.

original: rjes su dran pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'og tu dran pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'og tu dran pa'o //
translated: Recollection is the memory following the samādhi of clear light.

original: bsgom pa ni de nyid mngon du bya'o//
analyzed: bsgom pa ni de nyid mngon du bya'o//
translated: Cultivation is the realization of that.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The wise one, O Lord of Secrets,

original: kun du bzang po ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: kun du bzang po ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The good is the samādhi of nonabiding nirvāṇa.

original: de nyid kyi thugs ni gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pa dang bral ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi thugs ni gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pa dang bral ba nyid do //
translated: That very mind is the freedom from duality and nonduality.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsang ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa dang / bdag po ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsang ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa dang / bdag po ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the secret is the ultimate truth, and the lord is the conventional truth.

original: de dag gnyis su med par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi blo ni dmigs pa'i shes rab gang la yod pa de ni blo ldan no //
analyzed: de dag gnyis su med par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi blo ni dmigs pa'i shes rab gang la yod pa de ni blo ldan no //
translated: The wise one is the one who has the wisdom of the object, the mind which has the characteristic of making those two non-dual.

original: de lta bu'i thugs ni bdag dang kyang gi sgras 'gro ba kun gyis 'gyur ba ni bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i thugs ni bdag dang kyang gi sgras 'gro ba kun gyis 'gyur ba ni bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Such a mind should be cultivated by oneself and by all beings, as indicated by the word “and”.

original: da ni don 'di bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni don 'di bshad pa yin te /
translated: Now this is the explanation of the meaning.

original: sgra dang grogs po dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sgra dang grogs po dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In regard to sound, friends, happiness, suffering, etc.,

original: rdo rje 'dzin bzhin du sems 'dra bar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin bzhin du sems 'dra bar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should cultivate the mind as similar to the vajra-holder.

original: zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
analyzed: zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of union.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i shes rab ma'o//
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i shes rab ma'o//
translated: In that, etc. The sentient being is the wisdom consort endowed with the qualities of the thought of awakening, etc.

original: rjes su dran pa ni thabs so //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa ni thabs so //
translated: Recollection is the means.

original: bsgom pa ni de dag yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni de dag yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
translated: Cultivation is the correct union of those two.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: sems can gyi sems gang yin zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems can gyi sems gang yin zhes bya ba la /
translated: What is the mind of the sentient being?

original: sku gsung thugs ni yi ge gsum gyis mtshan pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems ni yid du 'ong ba'i shes rab ma ste /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni yi ge gsum gyis mtshan pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems ni yid du 'ong ba'i shes rab ma ste /
translated: The body, speech, and mind are marked with the three syllables.🔽🔽The empowered mind is the wisdom woman who is pleasing.

original: sems @114a * //
analyzed: sems @114a * //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are marked with the three syllables, which is the consecration. The mind is the wisdom woman who is pleasing.

original: las byung ba'i ye shes kyi lha mo'o //
analyzed: las byung ba'i ye shes kyi lha mo'o //
translated: The mind-born is the goddess of intuition.

original: bdag gi zhes bya ba'i drug pa ni dang po'i don du ste /
analyzed: bdag gi zhes bya ba'i drug pa ni dang po'i don du ste /
translated: The sixth case, “of oneself,” is for the sake of the first case.

original: des na bdag kyang sems de dang 'dra ba ni de dang 'dra bar byas la byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: des na bdag kyang sems de dang 'dra ba ni de dang 'dra bar byas la byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: Therefore, “oneself” is like the mind, and one should consecrate oneself in the same way.

original: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ni dmigs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pa yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ni dmigs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pa yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
translated: “Like space” is the cause of non-objectifying intuition, and it is the correct union.

original: de nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par gyur te rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par gyur te rang bzhin no //
translated: By that alone, all buddhas, that is, tathāgatas, become the offering.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In that, etc.

original: sngags thams cad ni thabs shes rab ste de dag gi gang zhig gzugs ni padma dang rdo rje'i tshul te /
analyzed: sngags thams cad ni thabs shes rab ste de dag gi gang zhig gzugs ni padma dang rdo rje'i tshul te /
translated: All mantras are method and intuition, and their form is the mode of the lotus and the vajra.

original: de nyid kyang sku gsung thugs ni khrag dang chu dang sa bon rnams kyi gnas yin pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyang sku gsung thugs ni khrag dang chu dang sa bon rnams kyi gnas yin pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs so //
translated: That very [union] is the body, speech, and mind, because it is the abode of blood, water, and seed, [respectively].

original: rjes su dran pa de nyid sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa de nyid sbyor ba'o //
translated: That very recollection is the application.

original: bsgom pa ni lha'i rnam pa sngon du 'gro ba de nyid mnyes pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni lha'i rnam pa sngon du 'gro ba de nyid mnyes pa'o //
