translated: Cultivation is the delight in that very [union] preceded by the form of the deity.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The mantra is the vajra body.

original: sngags ni padma'o //
analyzed: sngags ni padma'o //
translated: The mantra is the lotus.

original: rdo rje ni lingga'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni lingga'o //
translated: The vajra is the liṅga.

original: sku ni de dag snga ma bzhin du tshad mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: sku ni de dag snga ma bzhin du tshad mnyam pa'o //
translated: The body is the equality of those two, as before.

original: gsung gi sku yang zhes pa ni de dag snang ba mtha' yas dang rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: gsung gi sku yang zhes pa ni de dag snang ba mtha' yas dang rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: The speech body is also that, [that is,] Amitābha and Vairocana.

original: de nyid rnam par bsgom pa ni de'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid rnam par bsgom pa ni de'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: The cultivation of that very [union] is the nature of that [union].

original: de bzhin du padma ni dmar po yin pa'i phyir snang ba mtha' yas dang / rdo rje ni sra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad bsams la /
analyzed: de bzhin du padma ni dmar po yin pa'i phyir snang ba mtha' yas dang / rdo rje ni sra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad bsams la /
translated: Similarly, one should imagine the lotus as Amitābha because it is red, and the vajra as Vairocana because it is hard.

original: bdag ces pa ni snga ma bzhin du thabs dang shes rab dag sems 'dra bar gyur pa ni sbyor bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag ces pa ni snga ma bzhin du thabs dang shes rab dag sems 'dra bar gyur pa ni sbyor bar bya'o //
translated: The “self” is the union of method and wisdom, as before.

original: de ltar byas nas sngags 'dzin pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: de ltar byas nas sngags 'dzin pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: Having done that, the mantra holder is the Great Vajradhara,

original: de dang 'dra ba'i rnal 'byor pa 'byung ba yin te rgyu'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i rnal 'byor pa 'byung ba yin te rgyu'o //
translated: and the yogi/nī who is like him/her arises, that is, is the cause.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In regard to “there” and so forth,

original: dam tshig ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor zhing bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor zhing bskyod pa'o //
translated: the pledge is the vajra and lotus in union and shaking.

original: rjes su dran pa ni de nyid du h'um dang phat la sogs pa'i sa bon bkod pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa ni de nyid du h'um dang phat la sogs pa'i sa bon bkod pa'o //
translated: Recollection is the placement of the seed syllables of hūṃ, phaṭ, and so forth in that place.

original: de nyid bsgom pa ni ji ltar zhe na /🔽khu ba phyung ste cho ga bzhin //
analyzed: de nyid bsgom pa ni ji ltar zhe na / khu ba phyung ste cho ga bzhin //
translated: How does one meditate on that?

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Ejaculation is in accordance with the rite.

original: dam tshig ni h'um dang phat kyi sa bon bkod pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni h'um dang phat kyi sa bon bkod pa'o //
translated: The pledge is the placement of the seed syllables of hūṃ and phaṭ.

original: khu ba phyung ba ni yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad las 'dzag pa byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni btung bar byed pa ni yi ge de nyid kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: khu ba phyung ba ni yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad las 'dzag pa byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni btung bar byed pa ni yi ge de nyid kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: The semen is the bodhicitta that drips from all the limbs and minor limbs. That is to be drunk, protected by that very syllable.

original: ji ltar @114b zhe na ;
analyzed: ji ltar @114b zhe na ;
translated: How?

original: cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni char rengs pa'i sa bon gyis so //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni char rengs pa'i sa bon gyis so //
translated: According to the rite is with the seed of the cloud.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'bras bu 'dod pa zhes pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pas so //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'dod pa zhes pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pas so //
translated: For the sake of the fruit, which will be explained below.

original: de ltar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ni nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshogs gsod pa ni de nyid du thim par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ni nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshogs gsod pa ni de nyid du thim par bya'o //
translated: Having done that, the assembly of tathāgatas, the assembly of buddhas abiding in the realm of space, is dissolved into that.

original: de'i rnal 'byor pas 'og nas bshad par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub ni 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba chen po'i dngos grub thob par gyur ba ste las so //
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor pas 'og nas bshad par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub ni 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba chen po'i dngos grub thob par gyur ba ste las so //
translated: The yogin there attains the power, the power of great bliss that is the nature of the result, which will be explained below.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In that regard, etc.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the gnosis of the dharmadhatu, thusness.

original: de nyid kyi dam tshig ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi dam tshig ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Its commitment is the vajra-like samadhi.

original: de rjes su dran pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rjes su dran pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: Its recollection is the realization of co-emergent suchness.

original: de nyid bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid bsgom pa ste /
translated: That itself is meditation.

original: thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab dag gis bsgom pa'i ngo bo shes rab dag go //
analyzed: thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab dag gis bsgom pa'i ngo bo shes rab dag go //
translated: Wisdom is the essence of meditation through the wisdoms of hearing and contemplation.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba // zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is naturally luminous.

original: chos thams cad ni g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba ste /
translated: Here, all phenomena are moving and unmoving.🔽Their natural luminosity is the essence of great bliss.

original: de rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni bde ba chen po'i ngo bo yin no zhes bsgoms pa dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni bde ba chen po'i ngo bo yin no zhes bsgoms pa dmigs par bya'o //
translated: That should be contemplated, visualized.

original: g-yo dang mi g-yo ba gang zhig 'di skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba de ni don dam par ma yin te /
analyzed: g-yo dang mi g-yo ba gang zhig 'di skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba de ni don dam par ma yin te /
translated: Whatever is moving or unmoving, that which is seen with the characteristics of arising and ceasing, that is not ultimately so.

original: gang gi phyir ma skyes pa ni thog ma nas ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma skyes pa ni thog ma nas ma skyes pa ste /
translated: Because that which is unborn is not born from the beginning.

original: de rnams gang las 'jig ste /
analyzed: de rnams gang las 'jig ste /
translated: From what would they cease?

original: skye ba yod na 'jig pa rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba yod na 'jig pa rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if there were birth, cessation would be known.

original: 'o na gal te de ltar yin na dga' ba la sogs pa yang nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: 'o na gal te de ltar yin na dga' ba la sogs pa yang nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: Now, if that is so, then joy and so on are also the nature of afflictions,

original: rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: because they possess discursive thought, they exist.

original: de las byung ba'i 'od gsal ba'i bde ba chen po yang /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'od gsal ba'i bde ba chen po yang /
translated: The great bliss of clear light that arises from them

original: de dang 'dra ba'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pas mi rtag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pas mi rtag pa'i phyir /
translated: is also impermanent because it is contaminated.

original: de kho na nyid ma yin no zhe na de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid ma yin no zhe na de ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not reality.

original: zag pa med pa zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags bar pa'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags bar pa'o //
translated: That is not so, because the so-called contaminated refers to attachment, freedom from attachment, and middling attachment.

original: de rnams dpyad na phyi dang nang dang gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de rnams dpyad na phyi dang nang dang gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin te /
translated: When those are analyzed, they do not exist as the nature of the external, the internal, or both.

original: ri bong gi rva bzhin du med pa'i phyir dang / nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du med pa ste /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva bzhin du med pa'i phyir dang / nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du med pa ste /
translated: Because they do not exist like the horns of a rabbit, they do not exist like a sky flower.

original: byis pa rnams kyis brtag @115a * //
analyzed: byis pa rnams kyis brtag @115a * //
translated: Children investigate.🔽

original: pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are investigated by the childish.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dbang po'i tshogs la 'dod chags med //
analyzed: dbang po'i tshogs la 'dod chags med //
translated: There is no attachment to the collection of sense organs.

original: don la med cing sems la med //
analyzed: don la med cing sems la med //
translated: There is no object, no mind.

original: gzhan la gnas min bdag la min //
analyzed: gzhan la gnas min bdag la min //
translated: It does not exist elsewhere, nor in itself.

original: yod pa de min med pa min //🔽ma rtogs pa yi 'brel pa yi //
analyzed: yod pa de min med pa min // ma rtogs pa yi 'brel pa yi //
translated: It is not existent, nor is it nonexistent.🔽From the confusion of the mind,

original: rgyu can sems kyi 'khrul pa las ;
analyzed: rgyu can sems kyi 'khrul pa las ;
translated: which has a cause that is not understood,

original: / gang yang sprin gyi bu ga las //
analyzed: / gang yang sprin gyi bu ga las //
translated: like lightning from a hole in a cloud,

original: thog dang 'dra ba skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: thog dang 'dra ba skye bar 'gyur //
translated: there arises what is like a thunderbolt.🔽In the same way, hatred, delusion,

original: de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang // nyon mongs rigs ni gang gzhan rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang // nyon mongs rigs ni gang gzhan rnams //
translated: and the other afflictions,

original: khams gsum la ni khyab pa ste //
analyzed: khams gsum la ni khyab pa ste //
translated: pervade the three realms,

original: rtog pa'i dug las yang dag byung //
analyzed: rtog pa'i dug las yang dag byung //
translated: arising from the poison of conceptual thought.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bas na rgyu med pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu ga la yod /
analyzed: de bas na rgyu med pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu ga la yod /
translated: Therefore, how can there be a contaminated effect without a cause?

original: 'o na de ltar yin na /🔽rdo rje padma sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'o na de ltar yin na / rdo rje padma sbyor ba yis //
translated: Well then, if that is so,🔽you desire enlightenment

original: khyod kyi byang chub 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: khyod kyi byang chub 'dod pa ste //
translated: through the union of vajra and lotus,

original: de yang rnam rtog dang bcas phyir //
analyzed: de yang rnam rtog dang bcas phyir //
translated: but that also has conceptual thought.

original: de nyid rnam rtog dang bcas 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid rnam rtog dang bcas 'gyur //
translated: That is associated with discursive thought.

original: zhe na / byang chub med ces pa ni /🔽thabs dang shes rab yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: zhe na / byang chub med ces pa ni / thabs dang shes rab yang dag 'byung //
translated: The statement, “There is no enlightenment”

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: is made in order to show that🔽the enlightenment of the example is not the enlightenment of the actual truth.

original: dpe'i mtshan nyid kyi byang chub ni bde ba ste /
analyzed: dpe'i mtshan nyid kyi byang chub ni bde ba ste /
translated: The enlightenment of the example is bliss.

original: de nyid byang chub ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid byang chub ma yin te /
translated: That is not enlightenment,

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is associated with discursive thought.

original: 'on kyang dpe las byung ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang dpe las byung ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub yin no //
translated: However, that which arises from the example is enlightenment.🔽The statement, “There is no realization”

original: 'o na de yang de rtsod pa ma yin nam zhe na mngon rtogs med ces pa ni /
analyzed: 'o na de yang de rtsod pa ma yin nam zhe na mngon rtogs med ces pa ni /
translated: is made in order to show that🔽the realization of the example is not the realization of the actual truth.

original: mngon rtogs ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: mngon rtogs ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa ste /
translated: Realization is the connection between cause and effect.

original: de ni der med pa yin te gang gi phyir dpe'i byang chub kyi dpe las byung ba'i byang chub me dang du ba bzhin du skyed par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni der med pa yin te gang gi phyir dpe'i byang chub kyi dpe las byung ba'i byang chub me dang du ba bzhin du skyed par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: That is not in the example, because the enlightenment of the example does not generate the enlightenment that arises from the example, like fire does not generate smoke.

original: 'on kyang de'i phyir dus su skyes pa'i lag pa'i rtsol ba med pa'i 'khor lo bzhin du de ni rang gi dang gis gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i phyir dus su skyes pa'i lag pa'i rtsol ba med pa'i 'khor lo bzhin du de ni rang gi dang gis gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: However, for that purpose, like a wheel without the exertion of the hands, it is generated by its own nature.🔽Or,🔽arising, abiding, manifesting,🔽attaining consciousness,

original: yang na / skye dang gnas dang gsal ba dang // 'gyur ba shes pa thob pa dang // sbyor ba gzhan nyid 'dzin rnams te //
analyzed: yang na / skye dang gnas dang gsal ba dang // 'gyur ba shes pa thob pa dang // sbyor ba gzhan nyid 'dzin rnams te //
translated: and holding other applications,

original: rgyu ni rnam pa bcu ru 'dod //
analyzed: rgyu ni rnam pa bcu ru 'dod //
translated: the cause is asserted to be of ten types.

original: ces bya ba 'byung ba'i phyir dpe'i bde ba ni gsal ba'i rgyu yin pa ste bum pa la sogs pa la mar me bzhin du'o //🔽'o na gal te de ltar yin na byang chub sems kyi thig le la brten te /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'byung ba'i phyir dpe'i bde ba ni gsal ba'i rgyu yin pa ste bum pa la sogs pa la mar me bzhin du'o // 'o na gal te de ltar yin na byang chub sems kyi thig le la brten te /
translated: Since it is said, the example bliss is the cause of manifestation, like a lamp for a pot, and so on.

original: lhan cig skyes par mtshon par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes par mtshon par 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then the connate [joy] would be indicated in dependence on the bindu of bodhicitta.🔽Since that is also the essence of the element, it is impermanent, and it would follow that the basis of that would also be impermanent.

original: de yang khams kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa yin te de nyid kyi gzhi can yang mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar @115b 'gyur ram zhe na de ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang khams kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa yin te de nyid kyi gzhi can yang mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar @115b 'gyur ram zhe na de ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: khams kyang med ces pa ni khams ni thig le'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: khams kyang med ces pa ni khams ni thig le'i ngo bo ste /
translated: The statement “the elements do not exist” means that the elements are the essence of the bindu.

original: de yang kun rdzob kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de kho na nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang kun rdzob kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de kho na nyid ma yin no //
translated: That is not reality because it is the nature of the relative.

original: 'on kyang de la brten nas don dam pa'i ngo bo gang zhig mtshon pa de ni rtag pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de la brten nas don dam pa'i ngo bo gang zhig mtshon pa de ni rtag pa nyid yin te /
translated: However, the essence of the ultimate, which is indicated in dependence on that, is permanent.

original: chos nyid gang yang mi 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos nyid gang yang mi 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of phenomena is indestructible.

original: gang gi phyir gzhi 'jig na gzhi can mi 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhi 'jig na gzhi can mi 'jig pa ste /
translated: When the basis is destroyed, the possessor of the basis is not destroyed.

original: shing bcad na bya rog bcad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing bcad na bya rog bcad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When a tree is cut, the crow is not cut.

original: de bas na lhan cig skyes pa ni mi 'jig pa'i ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: de bas na lhan cig skyes pa ni mi 'jig pa'i ngo bo yin no //
translated: Therefore, the connate [joy] is the essence of the indestructible.

original: 'on kyang dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pas de nyid 'byung ba bstan pa gang yin pa de ni 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pas de nyid 'byung ba bstan pa gang yin pa de ni 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: However, the arising of that, which is taught by the stages of joy and so on, is not an arising.

original: de ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it is naturally established.

original: 'on kyang las dang po pa'i byis pa rnams kyis thabs kyi khyad par gyis mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang las dang po pa'i byis pa rnams kyis thabs kyi khyad par gyis mtshon pa yin te /
translated: However, it is indicated by the distinctions of methods for the childish beginners.

original: sor mo zla ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: sor mo zla ba bzhin du'o //
translated: The fingers are like the moon.

original: de la sor mos zla ba skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la sor mos zla ba skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The fingers do not produce the moon,

original: des ni de nyid nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des ni de nyid nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they merely indicate it.

original: nye bar mtshon pa ni skyed par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa ni skyed par byed pa yin na /
translated: If indication were production,

original: bya rog dang khang bzangs nye bar mtshon pas skyed par byed pa nyid thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya rog dang khang bzangs nye bar mtshon pas skyed par byed pa nyid thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then crows and mansions would be produced by indication.

original: bsgom pa la slob pa ni glo bur ba'i dri ma sbyang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bsgom pa la slob pa ni glo bur ba'i dri ma sbyang ba'i phyir te /
translated: One who is training in meditation is for the purpose of purifying adventitious defilements,

original: de kho na nyid ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa kho na yin no //
translated: because reality is just naturally established.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
translated: The mind is naturally luminous.

original: dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba'o //
analyzed: dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba'o //
translated: Defilements are adventitious.

original: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin //🔽dag pa bzhin du dag par 'dod //
analyzed: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin // dag pa bzhin du dag par 'dod //
translated: Like water, gold, and space,

original: ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces 'byung ngo //
translated: it is held that the mind is pure by nature.

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo rang gi bde ba dang zhi ba'i ngo bo de kho na nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya ste 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo rang gi bde ba dang zhi ba'i ngo bo de kho na nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya ste 'bras bu'o //
translated: That is the essence of the perfection of wisdom, the reality of one's own bliss and peace, which the yogin should cultivate, the result.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: There, etc.

original: ma bskyed pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pas rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma bskyed pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pas rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o //
translated: Uncreated is turned away from the cultivation of the creation stage.

original: rjes su dran pa ni de nyid brtan par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa ni de nyid brtan par byed pa'o //
translated: Recollection is the stabilization of that.

original: bsgom pa ni yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor bsgom pa'o //
translated: Cultivation is the cultivation of the yoga of the six limbs.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba // zhes bya ba la /
translated: All is naturally radiant.

original: yul thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bor shes te /
analyzed: yul thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bor shes te /
translated: All objects are known to be of the nature of natural luminosity.

original: nam mkha' ni nam mkha' bzhin du mi gos pas yul de rnams la mig la sogs pa de rnams bskul te spyod par bya'o //🔽de'i @116a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni nam mkha' bzhin du mi gos pas yul de rnams la mig la sogs pa de rnams bskul te spyod par bya'o //🔽de'i @116a * //
translated: Like space, space is unstained. Those eyes, etc. are activated and employed in those objects.

original: rjes la mtshan ma ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bor shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rjes la mtshan ma ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bor shes par bya'o //
translated: The sign is the form and so forth, which is abandoned after having understood the nature of the Tathagata.

original: de nas mi 'gyur ba ni sngags kyi rnam par spangs pa'i thig le'i ngo bo tsam bsgoms te /🔽srog dang rtsol ba dag cing de'i rjes la thig le tsam de nyid rdo rje'i rtse mor 'dzin te /
analyzed: de nas mi 'gyur ba ni sngags kyi rnam par spangs pa'i thig le'i ngo bo tsam bsgoms te / srog dang rtsol ba dag cing de'i rjes la thig le tsam de nyid rdo rje'i rtse mor 'dzin te /
translated: Then, the unchanging is the essence of the bindu, which is abandoned after the mantra, and is meditated on as mere essence.

original: gnyis dang gnyis su med pa bral ba'i de kho na nyid mngon du byas te /
analyzed: gnyis dang gnyis su med pa bral ba'i de kho na nyid mngon du byas te /
translated: After that, the bindu is held at the tip of the vajra, and the reality that is free from the duality of the two is actualized.

original: de nas spro ba byas la nam mkha'i khams bdag dang 'dra ba'i lha'i sku rnams kyis khyab cing nye bar bsdus te /
analyzed: de nas spro ba byas la nam mkha'i khams bdag dang 'dra ba'i lha'i sku rnams kyis khyab cing nye bar bsdus te /
translated: Then, after emanation, the space is pervaded by the bodies of the deities that are similar to oneself.

original: shin tu gsal ba'i bden pa gnyis su dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can dang / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsgom par bya ste rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: shin tu gsal ba'i bden pa gnyis su dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can dang / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsgom par bya ste rnal 'byor ro //
translated: After that, the body of Mahāvajradhara, the essence of nonabiding nirvāṇa, which has the characteristic of the two truths that are extremely clear and inseparable, is meditated on.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The yoga is as follows:

original: zhe sdang gi rigs ni thams cad las phul du byung ba'i thugs kyi rigs so //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi rigs ni thams cad las phul du byung ba'i thugs kyi rigs so //
translated: The family of anger is the most excellent of all the families of mind.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni rigs gzhan rnams gzung ba'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni rigs gzhan rnams gzung ba'o //
translated: The word “etc.” includes the other families.

original: de bas na rigs lnga mchod pa ni gsang ba'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na rigs lnga mchod pa ni gsang ba'i mchod pa'o //
translated: Thus, the worship of the five families is the secret worship.

original: de nyid rdo rjes su dran pa ni rtag tu brtan pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rjes su dran pa ni rtag tu brtan pa'o //
translated: The recollection of the vajra is the constant firmness.

original: bsgom pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'i sems kyis nan tan to //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'i sems kyis nan tan to //
translated: The cultivation is the practice with an unerring mind.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: bud med sems ni rab tu brtan //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bud med sems ni rab tu brtan // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The mind of a woman is very firm.

original: lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa'i bud med ni rigs kyi lha mo ste /
analyzed: lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa'i bud med ni rigs kyi lha mo ste /
translated: A woman who is twelve years old is a goddess of the family.

original: thos pa la sogs pa'i rim pas sems brtan pa ni sems rtse gcig par gyur pa rnyed la /
analyzed: thos pa la sogs pa'i rim pas sems brtan pa ni sems rtse gcig par gyur pa rnyed la /
translated: By the stages of hearing, etc., the firm mind is the attainment of one-pointed mind.

original: rigs ni thugs la sogs pa'i rigs rnams kyi sbyor ba ni 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: rigs ni thugs la sogs pa'i rigs rnams kyi sbyor ba ni 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: The application of the families of mind, etc. is the sameness.

original: de lta bu'i dbye bas gar mkhan ma dang / khrus mkhan ma dang / gdol pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas thob cing bdag gi khu ba ni byang chub kyi sems spro bas lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'am /
analyzed: de lta bu'i dbye bas gar mkhan ma dang / khrus mkhan ma dang / gdol pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas thob cing bdag gi khu ba ni byang chub kyi sems spro bas lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'am /
translated: One should please the yoginīs by means of such divisions, by means of the divisions of the dancer, the washerwoman, the untouchable woman, and so on, and by means of the emission of one’s bodhicitta, one’s seminal essence, by means of the practice of the hook and so on,

original: bdud rtsi ri lu khar bcug pas mchod par bya ba mnyes par bya ste sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ri lu khar bcug pas mchod par bya ba mnyes par bya ste sgrub pa'o //
translated: or by placing the elixir pill in one’s mouth.

original: de ltar rjes su dran pa bcu drug bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rjes su dran pa bcu drug bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the sixteen recollections,

original: de'i sgom pa po'i 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i sgom pa po'i 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the result of the cultivation of those,

original: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “That” and so on.

original: 'di zhes bya ba'i rigs la gcig gi tshig ste /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba'i rigs la gcig gi tshig ste /
translated: The word “this” is a singular term.

original: des na rjes su dran pa bcu drug bsgom pa de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi sku gsung thugs thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na rjes su dran pa bcu drug bsgom pa de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi sku gsung thugs thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, those who cultivate the sixteen recollections will attain the body, speech, and mind that are the nature of the three tathāgatas.

original: @116b gal te de ltar yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor pa las 'di la khyad ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: @116b gal te de ltar yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor pa las 'di la khyad ji ltar zhe na /
translated: If that is so, what is the difference between this and the perfection of wisdom practitioner?

original: tshe 'di nyid ni mthong pa'i chos la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid ni mthong pa'i chos la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This very life is the present life.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni thabs ma tshang bas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis byang chub thob pa yin te /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni thabs ma tshang bas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis byang chub thob pa yin te /
translated: The practitioner of the perfections, due to the incompleteness of the means, attains enlightenment in three incalculable aeons.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dngos grub bstan nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dngos grub bstan nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bshad par bya ste /
translated: Having taught the powers of the practitioners of the creation stage, now the powers of the practitioners of the completion stage will be explained.

original: sku gsung thugs ni rigs gsum mam /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni rigs gsum mam /
translated: The body, speech, and mind are the three families,

original: khams gsum mam /
analyzed: khams gsum mam /
translated: or the three realms,

original: ye shes gsum mam /
analyzed: ye shes gsum mam /
translated: or the three intuitions,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'am /
translated: or passion and so on,🔽or the three syllables.

original: yi ge gsum yang dag par phyin ci ma log pa'i dngos grub ni mi snang ba'i mtshan nyid phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rnal 'byor ba des 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge gsum yang dag par phyin ci ma log pa'i dngos grub ni mi snang ba'i mtshan nyid phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rnal 'byor ba des 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The practitioner will attain the power of the great seal, which is characterized by invisibility, the power of the perfect and unerring body, speech, and mind.

original: de bzhin gang gzhan phra mo ni tshogs kyi dngos grub ste sa 'og gi dngos grub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gang gzhan phra mo ni tshogs kyi dngos grub ste sa 'og gi dngos grub bo //
translated: And likewise, the other subtle powers are the powers of the assembly, the powers of the underworld.

original: de bzhin du bshad pa'i sgras ni bar pa'i dngos grub ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du bshad pa'i sgras ni bar pa'i dngos grub ste /
translated: Likewise, the words “and so on” indicate the middling powers.

original: sman mchog dang dngul chu dang bcud kyis len dang / khams smra ba dang / sbyor ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sgom par smra ba dang / ro langs dang / ral gri dang / ri lu dang /
analyzed: sman mchog dang dngul chu dang bcud kyis len dang / khams smra ba dang / sbyor ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sgom par smra ba dang / ro langs dang / ral gri dang / ri lu dang /
translated: The supreme medicine, mercury, the elixir, the science of elements, the science of sex, the science of subjugation, the science of flying, the science of meditation, the science of zombies, the science of swords, the science of pills,

original: mig sman dang / sngags smra ba la sogs pa zhes pa ste ;
analyzed: mig sman dang / sngags smra ba la sogs pa zhes pa ste ;
translated: the science of eye-salve, the science of mantras, and so on.

original: de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: These are accomplished.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: bzlas pa tsam zhes pa ni sems rtse gcig par gyur pas so //
analyzed: bzlas pa tsam zhes pa ni sems rtse gcig par gyur pas so //
translated: “By mere recitation” means by the mind becoming one-pointed.

original: sku gsung thugs gsum po ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i gsum shes pa yang 'grub par 'gyur pa ste sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs gsum po ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i gsum shes pa yang 'grub par 'gyur pa ste sgrub pa'o //
translated: The “three bodies” are the knowledge of the past, present, and future.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sngags ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sngags ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: “All tathāgatas” and so on. The mantra is the elaborate mode of conduct.

original: spyod pa ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: The conduct is the unelaborate mode of conduct.

original: mchog ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ste /
analyzed: mchog ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ste /
translated: The supreme is the extremely unelaborate conduct.

original: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs ni sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs ni sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog ces bya'o //
translated: The collection of texts that teach that is called the supreme of mantra conducts.

original: rgyud 'grel las le'u bdun pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'grel las le'u bdun pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the sixteen topics of the seventh chapter from the commentary on the tantra.

original: le'u bdun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni sum brgya lnga bcu'o /
analyzed: le'u bdun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni sum brgya lnga bcu'o /
translated: The number of verses in the seventh chapter is three hundred and fifty.

original: // / spyod pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas gtsang pa dang mi gtsang pa'i rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i phyir gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba don du gnyer @117a * //
analyzed: // / spyod pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas gtsang pa dang mi gtsang pa'i rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i phyir gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba don du gnyer @117a * //
translated: In order to eliminate the concepts of pure and impure of the yogi who has attained conduct, the secret empowerment is sought.

original: ba ste de'i phyir le'u brgyad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ba ste de'i phyir le'u brgyad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach the eighth chapter,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: then, etc. is stated.

original: rin chen ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i khyad par gyi nor bu'o //
analyzed: rin chen ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i khyad par gyi nor bu'o //
translated: The jewel is the special gem that fulfills all hopes.

original: de nyid dpal ni mtshan ma gang la yod pa de ni rin chen dpal lo ;
analyzed: de nyid dpal ni mtshan ma gang la yod pa de ni rin chen dpal lo ;
translated: That glory which has that is the glory of the jewel.

original: / nam mkha'i mdzod nyid kyi dbang phyug nyid sbyor bas na bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: / nam mkha'i mdzod nyid kyi dbang phyug nyid sbyor bas na bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he is the lord of the sky-treasury itself.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni dbang phyug dam pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen bo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni dbang phyug dam pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen bo'o //
translated: The lord of all the Tathagatas is the supreme lord, the Great Vajradhara.

original: khyab 'jug dang lha chen dang tshangs pa la sogs pa gdul bar bya ba'i phyir dam pa'o//
analyzed: khyab 'jug dang lha chen dang tshangs pa la sogs pa gdul bar bya ba'i phyir dam pa'o//
translated: He is the supreme one for the sake of those to be trained, such as Vishnu, Mahesvara, and Brahma.

original: nyan thos pa la sogs pa la ston pa yin pa'i phyir dbang phyug go //
analyzed: nyan thos pa la sogs pa la ston pa yin pa'i phyir dbang phyug go //
translated: He is the lord because he is the teacher for the Sravakas and others.

original: bstod pa 'di ni mchog gis bstod pas gsol ba gdab ste /
analyzed: bstod pa 'di ni mchog gis bstod pas gsol ba gdab ste /
translated: This praise is a request with the highest praise.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste drug pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste drug pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Vajrasattva and so on. Vajrasattva is the Great Vajradhara, the nature of the sixth.

original: theg pa che zhes pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: theg pa che zhes pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle is the nature of mirror-like wisdom, the essence of Vairocana.

original: de bzhin du nam mkha' la spyod pa ni mdzod gang la yod pa de ni nam mkha'i spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du nam mkha' la spyod pa ni mdzod gang la yod pa de ni nam mkha'i spyod pa ste /
translated: Similarly, the one who moves in space is the one who has the treasury in space.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: The essence of the wisdom of equality is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: sems can gyi khams sbyong bar byed pa ni smin par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams sbyong bar byed pa ni smin par byed pa ste /
translated: The purification of the realm of sentient beings is the maturation of sentient beings.

original: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pas na /
analyzed: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pas na /
translated: The purification is the wisdom of discrimination, the essence of Amitābha, by teaching the Dharma of the outer, inner, and secret vehicles.

original: sbyang ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo snang ba mtha' yas te de'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: sbyang ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo snang ba mtha' yas te de'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The purification is the wisdom of discrimination, the essence of Amitābha.

original: kun ni chos kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: kun ni chos kyi ye shes so //
translated: All is the wisdom of phenomena.

original: bzang po ni thar pa gang las byung ba de ni kun du bzang po ste /
analyzed: bzang po ni thar pa gang las byung ba de ni kun du bzang po ste /
translated: The good is the universal good, which is the source of liberation.

original: mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The essence of that is Akṣobhya.

original: mchod pa ni dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / bza' bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid can de la bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: mchod pa ni dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / bza' bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid can de la bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: Worship is the protection of the vows and so on, and the supreme of the wisdoms of the performance of action is the best.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rgyal ba ni lnga po'i mchog ste gtso bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rgyal ba ni lnga po'i mchog ste gtso bo'o //
translated: For that very reason, the Victor is the best of the five, the principal one.

original: mchod pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid can bshad du gsol ba gdab pa ste rigs drug gi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'o //🔽de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa rnams so //
analyzed: mchod pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid can bshad du gsol ba gdab pa ste rigs drug gi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'o // de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa rnams so //
translated: The praise is to the Lord who is the essence of the six clans.

original: da ni rigs gsum gyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rigs gsum gyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
translated: Now, the request is to be made by way of the three clans,

original: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rigs @117b gsum gyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rigs @117b gsum gyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the three clans are the best of the clans of passion, hatred, and folly.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che ni thugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che ni thugs rdo rje'o //
translated: The great passion, hatred, and folly are the vajra of mind.

original: rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi ye shes te /
translated: The knowledge which is like a vajra, i.e., indivisible, is the knowledge of the Dharma.

original: de la 'gro ba zhugs par mdzad pas na rdo rje ye shes la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'gro ba zhugs par mdzad pas na rdo rje ye shes la zhugs pa'o //
translated: Since he causes beings to enter that, he is the one who has entered the vajra knowledge.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni 'dod pa'i gdugs te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni 'dod pa'i gdugs te /
translated: The realm of space is the canopy of desire.

original: de dang mtshungs pa ni 'dra ba ste chu'i ngo bo la bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa ni 'dra ba ste chu'i ngo bo la bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He is similar to that, i.e., like it, in that he abides in the nature of water.

original: rigs gsum las phul du byung ba'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: rigs gsum las phul du byung ba'i phyir mchog go //
translated: He is the best because he is the most excellent of the three clans.

original: rgyal ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi rigs can bskyed par bya ba'i phyir rgyal pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi rigs can bskyed par bya ba'i phyir rgyal pa bzhi'o //
translated: The four kings are for the sake of generating the family of body, speech, and mind of the Victor.

original: mchod pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur pa ste /
analyzed: mchod pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur pa ste /
translated: Worship is as will be explained below.

original: bshad du gsol zhes te thugs rdo rje 'dzin gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
analyzed: bshad du gsol zhes te thugs rdo rje 'dzin gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
translated: Please explain is the praise from the perspective of the mind-vajra-holder.

original: de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag go //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag go //
translated: That is the creation and completion stages.

original: thar pa'i lam ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: thar pa'i lam ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
translated: The path of liberation is the wisdom of discernment.

original: de nyid rab tu ston pa ni gsal bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rab tu ston pa ni gsal bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: The teaching of that is the making clear.

original: de bzhin du theg pa gsum ni phyi nang gsang ba dang theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi phung po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du theg pa gsum ni phyi nang gsang ba dang theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi phung po ste /
translated: Likewise, the three vehicles are the outer, inner, and secret, and the aggregates of Dharma of the three vehicles.

original: de nyid kyi lam ni a'a li k'a li ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi lam ni a'a li k'a li ste /
translated: The path of that is the vowels and consonants.

original: de dag ston par mdzad pas na theg pa gsum gyi lam la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ston par mdzad pas na theg pa gsum gyi lam la gnas pa'o //
translated: Since he is the one who teaches those, he is abiding in the path of the three vehicles.

original: ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir mchog kyang yin la /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir mchog kyang yin la /
translated: Since he is the nature of wisdom, he is supreme.

original: sangs rgyas skal mchog ni byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas skal mchog ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The good fortune of the Buddha is the thought of awakening.

original: des dag pa ni de'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des dag pa ni de'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which is purified is that which has the nature of that, and it is called that.

original: de bzhin du mi ni khams lnga ste de rnams kyi mchog ni sa bon te de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi ni khams lnga ste de rnams kyi mchog ni sa bon te de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Similarly, man is the five elements, and the seed of those is the supreme, and that is its nature.

original: na dang ra ni na ra ste na ni thabs so //
analyzed: na dang ra ni na ra ste na ni thabs so //
translated: Na and ra are nara, and na is the means.

original: ra ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: ra ni shes rab bo //
translated: Ra is wisdom.

original: de dag yang dag par sbyor bas ye shes kyi chu'i ngo bo ni mchog go //
analyzed: de dag yang dag par sbyor bas ye shes kyi chu'i ngo bo ni mchog go //
translated: By the correct union of those, the nature of the water of gnosis is supreme.

original: mchod pa bshad du gsol zhes pa ni rim pa gnyis kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: mchod pa bshad du gsol zhes pa ni rim pa gnyis kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: Please explain the offering is the nature of the two stages.

original: de ni gsung rdo rje 'chang gi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
analyzed: de ni gsung rdo rje 'chang gi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
translated: That is the praise from the perspective of Vāgīśvara.

original: byang chub sems ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
translated: The bodhicitta is the mirrorlike gnosis.

original: de nyid kyi rgyas pa ni yangs pa spyan lnga gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rgyas pa ni yangs pa spyan lnga gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: The expansion of that is the vastness, and that which has the five eyes is just so.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo ni rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo ni rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni /
translated: The wheel of dharma is the wheel with eight spokes. Turning the wheel is

original: phyag na 'dzin pas na chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'o //
analyzed: phyag na 'dzin pas na chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'o //
translated: holding it in the hand. Therefore, it is turning the wheel of dharma.🔽 🔽The vajra of mind is the gnosis of uniformity.

original: sku gsung thugs ni nad kyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams la zhi ba'i las mdzad pa'i phyir shin tu dag pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni nad kyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams la zhi ba'i las mdzad pa'i phyir shin tu dag pa'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are very pure because they perform the pacifying activity for sentient beings who are afflicted with disease.

original: rdo rje theg pa ni sngags kyi theg pa chen po la dang bo yin pa'i phyir tha mi dad pas de @118a * //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa ni sngags kyi theg pa chen po la dang bo yin pa'i phyir tha mi dad pas de @118a * //
translated: The Vajra Vehicle is the Great Vehicle of Mantra, because it is the first, and because it is not different.

original: nyid rdo rje theg pa ste tshe ni mar yin no zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: nyid rdo rje theg pa ste tshe ni mar yin no zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: That itself is the Vajra Vehicle, just as life is the life of a person.

original: khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa ni sku rdo rje 'dzin gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
analyzed: khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa ni sku rdo rje 'dzin gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
translated: Homage to you is the praise from the perspective of the Vajra Body Holder.

original: de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag go //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag go //
translated: That is the generation and completion stages.

original: bstod pa 'di nyid gnas nas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bstod pa 'di nyid gnas nas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: This very praise is from the abode, as the Bhagavān has said.

original: de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to explain that,

original: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: then the king Vajradhara

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on is stated.

original: rdo rje ni rtse dgu pa 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rtse dgu pa 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: Vajra is the nine-pointed one, and because he holds it, he is Vajradhara.

original: rgyal bo ni gtso bo'o //
analyzed: rgyal bo ni gtso bo'o //
translated: King is the principal one.

original: thams cad nam mkha'i ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spro rang mdzad pas na thams cad nam mkha'o //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha'i ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spro rang mdzad pas na thams cad nam mkha'o //
translated: All is space, since the Tathagatas emanate from it.

original: mi 'gyur che ba ni bdun khri nyis stong sngags kyi dbye ba gsungs pas na mi 'gyur che'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur che ba ni bdun khri nyis stong sngags kyi dbye ba gsungs pas na mi 'gyur che'o //
translated: Great unchanging is the great unchanging, since it is said to be the division of seventy-two thousand mantras.

original: thams cad dbang bskur ba ni rjes su gzung bas na thams cad dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad dbang bskur ba ni rjes su gzung bas na thams cad dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: All consecration is all consecration, since it is the consecration of all.

original: kun gyi don ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: kun gyi don ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
translated: All meaning is mundane and supramundane, such as peace and so forth, and power, fearlessness, and so forth.

original: don de rnams mdzad pas na kun gyi don no //
analyzed: don de rnams mdzad pas na kun gyi don no //
translated: Since it is the meaning of all, it is all meaning.

original: kun ni sangs rgyas lnga ste de rnams kyi dbang po ste bdag po'o //
analyzed: kun ni sangs rgyas lnga ste de rnams kyi dbang po ste bdag po'o //
translated: All is the five Buddhas, and their lord is the great lord of the realm of phenomena.

original: rdo rje rin chen ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen po ste de nyid 'dzin pa ni lha mo'i gzugs la longs spyod pas na rdo rje rin chen 'dzin no //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen po ste de nyid 'dzin pa ni lha mo'i gzugs la longs spyod pas na rdo rje rin chen 'dzin no //
translated: Vajra-jewel-holder is the holder of the vajra-jewel, since he enjoys the form of the goddess by holding her.

original: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das mchod pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang ster bar byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de nyid kyi phyir mchog ni gsang ba dang rdo rje gsum ni sku gsung thugs te /🔽de rnams kyi mi phyed pa ste gnyis su med pa nyid du gnas pa ni de nyid byed pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das mchod pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang ster bar byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de nyid kyi phyir mchog ni gsang ba dang rdo rje gsum ni sku gsung thugs te / de rnams kyi mi phyed pa ste gnyis su med pa nyid du gnas pa ni de nyid byed pa'o //
translated: And for that very reason, the supreme is the three vajras of body, speech, and mind, and the performance of that very thing as indivisible, as nondual, is the performance of that.🔽And likewise, the supreme good fortune of body, speech, and mind is the performance of the good fortune of body, speech, and mind as free from the faults of inflation, etc.🔽And likewise, the Victor is the five aggregates, and the worship of the emergence of the Victor is the worship of the emergence of the Victor from those aggregates.

original: de bzhin du sku gsung thugs skal pa ni rgyas pa la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba nyid du byed pas na sku gsung thugs skal mchog dang / de bzhin du rgyal pa ni phung po lnga ste de rnams las byung bas na rgyal ba byung bar gyur pa'i mchod pa bshad pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o zhes tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du sku gsung thugs skal pa ni rgyas pa la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba nyid du byed pas na sku gsung thugs skal mchog dang / de bzhin du rgyal pa ni phung po lnga ste de rnams las byung bas na rgyal ba byung bar gyur pa'i mchod pa bshad pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o zhes tshig gi don to //
translated: This is the explanation of the worship of the Bhagavat, the meaning of the words.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
translated: This is the creation stage and the practice.

original: yang na rdo rje ni rengs pa'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: yang na rdo rje ni rengs pa'i rdo rje ste /
translated: Or else, the vajra is the vajra of paralysis.

original: de nyid padma'i nang du 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin to //
analyzed: de nyid padma'i nang du 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin to //
translated: Since he holds that very vajra in the lotus, he is the vajra-holder.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i ngo bo @118b nyid du mdzes pa ni rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i ngo bo @118b nyid du mdzes pa ni rgyal ba'o //
translated: The victor is beautiful in the nature of the drop of the thought of enlightenment.

original: thams cad ni ma mkha' ni nam mkha' lnga'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni ma mkha' ni nam mkha' lnga'o //
translated: All is the five space-s.

original: de rnams 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma'i nang du byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: de rnams 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma'i nang du byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Having consecrated them in the eight-petaled lotus,

original: gnas pa'i phyir thams cad nam mkha'o //
analyzed: gnas pa'i phyir thams cad nam mkha'o //
translated: since they abide there, all is space.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi las kyang /
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi las kyang /
translated: And in the Vajra-Amṛta Tantra:

original: bha ga'i dbus su nam mkha' gang /
analyzed: bha ga'i dbus su nam mkha' gang /
translated: Space is in the middle of the bhaga,

original: nam mkha' lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: nam mkha' lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with the five spaces.

original: lte ba ge sar dang bcas pa //
analyzed: lte ba ge sar dang bcas pa //
translated: The navel is the pistil-heart.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so on.

original: tsho ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: tsho ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
translated: The wheel is the gnosis of the dharma-dhātu.

original: de nyid g-yo bar mi 'gyur bas mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid g-yo bar mi 'gyur bas mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Since it does not move, it is the unchanging.

original: mi 'gyur ba yang yin la /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba yang yin la /
translated: It is unchanging,

original: chen po yang yin pas na mi 'gyur che'o ;
analyzed: chen po yang yin pas na mi 'gyur che'o ;
translated: and since it is great, it is the great unchanging.

original: / chen po kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems dang / mi 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: / chen po kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems dang / mi 'gyur ba ni /
translated: The great relative bodhichitta and the unchanging absolute bodhichitta.🔽🔽

original: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The great is the conventional awakening mind, and the unchanging is the ultimate awakening mind.

original: de dag gang la yod pa de ni mi 'gyur che'o //
analyzed: de dag gang la yod pa de ni mi 'gyur che'o //
translated: He who possesses those is the unchanging great.

original: thams cad ni rtsa'i 'khor lo bdun khri nyis stong ste /
analyzed: thams cad ni rtsa'i 'khor lo bdun khri nyis stong ste /
translated: All refers to the seventy-two thousand channel-wheels.

original: de rnams kyi sems ni rgyun rnams kyis dbang skur bar byed pas na thams cad dbang skur ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sems ni rgyun rnams kyis dbang skur bar byed pas na thams cad dbang skur ba'o //
translated: Since the mind in those is empowered by the currents, he is the one who empowers all.

original: kun ni dga' ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: kun ni dga' ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: All refers to joy and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi don ni bde ba ni chen po ste de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi don ni bde ba ni chen po ste de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of those is the great bliss, which is his nature.

original: kun ni rus sbal ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: kun ni rus sbal ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
translated: All refers to the four, tortoise, and so forth.

original: dbang po ni 'dod pa'i gdugs so //
analyzed: dbang po ni 'dod pa'i gdugs so //
translated: The organ is the desired parasol.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rtse mor ste de la rin chen ni yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam thig le 'dzin pas rdo rje rin chen 'dzin to //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rtse mor ste de la rin chen ni yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam thig le 'dzin pas rdo rje rin chen 'dzin to //
translated: The jewel is the drop the size of a mustard seed held at the tip of the vajra, and so he is the vajra holder of the jewel.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is empowered by the Tathagata lineage.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni btsun mo ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni btsun mo ste /
translated: The Tathagata is the queen.

original: de nyid las 'byung ba'i mchod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid las 'byung ba'i mchod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'o //
translated: The worship that arises from that is the worship of the Tathagatas.

original: rig pa dang phyir mi ldog pa dag las phul du byung ba'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: rig pa dang phyir mi ldog pa dag las phul du byung ba'i phyir mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because it is superior to the worship of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: rdo rje gsum ni g-yon dang g-yas dang dbus kyi rtsa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni g-yon dang g-yas dang dbus kyi rtsa rnams so //
translated: The three vajras are the left, right, and middle channels.

original: de dag mi phyed pa ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor bas ro gcig par gyur pa nyid du gnas pa ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag mi phyed pa ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor bas ro gcig par gyur pa nyid du gnas pa ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: Their indivisibility is the generation of the state of oneness through the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: de'i rjes la sku gsung thugs ni slob ma'i lus po la sogs pa /
analyzed: de'i rjes la sku gsung thugs ni slob ma'i lus po la sogs pa /
translated: After that, the body, speech, and mind are the disciple's body, etc.

original: skal mchog ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: skal mchog ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'o //
translated: The supreme good fortune is the attainment of the stage of non-conceptuality.

original: zla gsang thig le las kyang /
analyzed: zla gsang thig le las kyang /
translated: The Candrapradipa says:

original: de dus brtsams te de ni rnam mi rtog //
analyzed: de dus brtsams te de ni rnam mi rtog //
translated: From that time on, he is non-conceptual.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //🔽rgyal ba'i sgras ni sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su zhugs pa @119a * //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // rgyal ba'i sgras ni sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su zhugs pa @119a * //
translated: And so on.

original: ste / de las byung bas na rgyal ba 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ste / de las byung bas na rgyal ba 'byung ba'o //
translated: The word victorious refers to all the Buddhas, and the arising of the victorious is the arising from them.

original: des ni don 'di bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: des ni don 'di bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is the explanation of the meaning.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lha mo rnams rdo rje slob dpon dang lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi bdag nyid la zhugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lha mo rnams rdo rje slob dpon dang lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi bdag nyid la zhugs te /
translated: All the Tathagatas and goddesses enter into the Vajra Master and goddess's mouths,

original: rdo rje'i rtse mor bsdus la thig le'i ngo bos phyi rol du spros te skyes pa'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rtse mor bsdus la thig le'i ngo bos phyi rol du spros te skyes pa'o zhes ston to //
translated: and are gathered at the tip of the vajra, and emanated externally in the nature of the bindu.

original: de lta bu'i mchod pa rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa'i zhes tshig gi 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i mchod pa rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa'i zhes tshig gi 'brel pa'o //
translated: The connection of the words is: Such an offering is taught by the Vajra Holder.

original: de ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu dang sgrub pa rnams so //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu dang sgrub pa rnams so //
translated: That is, the nature, cause, action, result, and practice.

original: da ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba ji bzhin ster ba de bzhin bshad par bya ba'i phyir /🔽na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa //
analyzed: da ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba ji bzhin ster ba de bzhin bshad par bya ba'i phyir / na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa //
translated: Now, in order to explain the bestowal of initiation by the Vajra Master just as it is,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “A young maiden with wide eyes,” and so forth.

original: re zhig dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor bas dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis rang gi bdag nyid kyi lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bdag po nyid du bzhag cing de'i rjes su gzung bar
analyzed: re zhig dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor bas dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis rang gi bdag nyid kyi lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bdag po nyid du bzhag cing de'i rjes su gzung bar
translated: First, the yogī of the creation stage, by means of the three samādhis, such as the initial union, and so on, is established as the lord of the maṇḍala wheel of his thirty-two deities.

original: bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i thugs kyi sems can thams cad la dmigs te /
analyzed: bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i thugs kyi sems can thams cad la dmigs te /
translated: After that, in order to take care of all sentient beings with the mind of great compassion,

original: rim pa 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma byin gyis brlab par byas te /
analyzed: rim pa 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma byin gyis brlab par byas te /
translated: one should bless the pledge seal in this way.

original: de la re zhig mtshan nyid bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig mtshan nyid bshad pa yin te /
translated: Now, the characteristics are explained.

original: na chung gzhon nu zhes pa ni skye gnas mi zad pa 'am zad pa'i bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa thob nas /
analyzed: na chung gzhon nu zhes pa ni skye gnas mi zad pa 'am zad pa'i bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa thob nas /
translated: A young maiden is a girl who is twelve years old, whose birth canal is not worn out or worn down.

original: gzugs bzang pa ni mdangs dang gzhon pa dang gzhon pa dang rgyan rnams dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs bzang pa ni mdangs dang gzhon pa dang gzhon pa dang rgyan rnams dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Having obtained her, if she is beautiful, youthful, and has ornaments,

original: de med na lo grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa'o //
analyzed: de med na lo grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa'o //
translated: if she is not available, then one who is twenty-five years old.

original: de yang med na blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang med na blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: If she does not have these qualities, she is not to be taken.

original: bla ma rnams kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: bla ma rnams kyis gsungs so //
translated: This is what the gurus have said.

original: gal te lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa ma rnyed na de'i tshe dgos pa'i don du byol song dang 'dra ba rmongs pa'i rigs can las kyi phyag rgya ma rab tu brtag pa ni blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa ma rnyed na de'i tshe dgos pa'i don du byol song dang 'dra ba rmongs pa'i rigs can las kyi phyag rgya ma rab tu brtag pa ni blang bar bya'o //
translated: If a twenty-five year old woman cannot be found, then for the sake of necessity, one should take a woman of the animal class, who is like an animal, who is ignorant, and who is a karmamudra.

original: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud 'di la ting nge 'dzin gtso bor gyur pa ston pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud 'di la ting nge 'dzin gtso bor gyur pa ston pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: Because in this tantra of the Bhagavat, the Lord, meditative stabilization is taught as primary, not the substance.

original: de bas na slob dpon gyi bsgom pa'i stobs kyis dngos po sems po yang bems po ma yin par 'gyur pa ste phyag rgya ma smos ci dgos /
analyzed: de bas na slob dpon gyi bsgom pa'i stobs kyis dngos po sems po yang bems po ma yin par 'gyur pa ste phyag rgya ma smos ci dgos /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the master’s meditation, the substance, the mind, becomes non-material, not to mention the mudra.🔽For that very reason, some say that because all are absent, one should take an animal in actuality.

original: de nyid kyi phyir la la na re kun med pas byol song mngon du blang bar bya ste tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir la la na re kun med pas byol song mngon du blang bar bya ste tshig gi don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: de ni sgrub pa'o//
analyzed: de ni sgrub pa'o//
translated: This is the practice.

original: @119b phyag rgya ma blangs te gnas bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: @119b phyag rgya ma blangs te gnas bshad par bya ste /
translated: The place where the mudra is taken should be explained.

original: sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'am //
analyzed: sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'am //
translated: In a clean and secluded place,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: phub ma dang rde'u la sogs pa med pa gtsang pa'o //
analyzed: phub ma dang rde'u la sogs pa med pa gtsang pa'o //
translated: It is clean because it is free from chaff, pebbles, and so on.

original: skye bo med pas na rnam par dben pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo med pas na rnam par dben pa'o //
translated: It is secluded because it is free from people.

original: sa phyogs ni ri bo dang nags tshal dang / yul la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: sa phyogs ni ri bo dang nags tshal dang / yul la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'o //
translated: The place is any of the mountains, forests, countries, and so on.

original: rgyal ba'i gnas ni lha khang ngo //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i gnas ni lha khang ngo //
translated: The abode of the Victor is a temple.

original: gal te de nyid du yang kun rdzob dang bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir sems brtan par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de nyid du yang kun rdzob dang bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir sems brtan par mi 'gyur na /
translated: If even there the mind does not become firm due to the conventional and the need for protection,

original: de'i tshe zhi ba ni stong pa gang yin bzhi ba'i gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhi ba ni stong pa gang yin bzhi ba'i gnas te /
translated: then the abode of peace is any emptiness.

original: lha chen po'i khang pa 'am ma mo rnams kyi khang pa ste de la'o //
analyzed: lha chen po'i khang pa 'am ma mo rnams kyi khang pa ste de la'o //
translated: The abode of the great gods is the house of the mamos.

original: de la yang mu stegs pa'i gnas du //
analyzed: de la yang mu stegs pa'i gnas du //
translated: Even there, in the abode of the tirthikas,

original: pha rol rgol pa gang yang rung //
analyzed: pha rol rgol pa gang yang rung //
translated: any opponent

original: rtags kyi dbye pas rnam rnams rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: rtags kyi dbye pas rnam rnams rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i khyad par yin no //
translated: is a special emanation of Vajrasattva through the division of signs.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: pha rol rgol ba gang yang rung //
analyzed: pha rol rgol ba gang yang rung //
translated: Any opponent

original: rtags kyi dbye bas rnam par gnas //
analyzed: rtags kyi dbye bas rnam par gnas //
translated: It is well-established by the division of the signs.

original: de rnams 'dir ni smod mi bya /
analyzed: de rnams 'dir ni smod mi bya /
translated: One should not disparage them here,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa yin //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa yin // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: because they are emanations of Vajrasattva.

original: gnas de rnams su bshang gci la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga dang / chu la sogs pa ni chu dang ba yu la sogs pas byugs pas /
analyzed: gnas de rnams su bshang gci la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga dang / chu la sogs pa ni chu dang ba yu la sogs pas byugs pas /
translated: In those places, one should smear excrement, urine, and so forth, the five nectars, and water, and so forth, with water, cow dung, and so forth.

original: rtag pa ni dus thams cad du rgyal ba de nyid ;
analyzed: rtag pa ni dus thams cad du rgyal ba de nyid ;
translated: One should always worship the Victor,

original: rnam par snang mdzad mchod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad mchod pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to worship Vairocana.

original: zhes pa ni slob ma dang bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du mchod par bya ba'i phyir byug par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni slob ma dang bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du mchod par bya ba'i phyir byug par bya ste /
translated: In order to worship the disciple and oneself as the nature of Vairocana, one should smear.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
translated: The creation stage and the practice.

original: gnas de lta bu gnas byin gyis brlabs la der gnas pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis phyag rgya ma'i yan lag dgod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gnas de lta bu gnas byin gyis brlabs la der gnas pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis phyag rgya ma'i yan lag dgod par bya ba yin te /
translated: Having consecrated the place in that way, the vajra master who dwells there should arrange the limbs of the consort.

original: de bshad par bya ba'i phyir nu ma'i dbus su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bshad par bya ba'i phyir nu ma'i dbus su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to explain that, it is said, in the middle of the breasts, and so forth.

original: nu ma'i dbus ni snying gar yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: nu ma'i dbus ni snying gar yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The middle of the breasts is the heart, with the syllable hūṃ.

original: spyi gtsug mtha' ni spyi bor yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: spyi gtsug mtha' ni spyi bor yi ge aom mo //
translated: The end of the crown is the head, with the syllable oṃ.

original: bar ni nu ma dang spyi bo'i bar de mgrin par yi ge a'a:'o //
analyzed: bar ni nu ma dang spyi bo'i bar de mgrin par yi ge a'a:'o //
translated: The middle is between the breasts and the head, with the syllable āḥ at the throat.

original: rkang pa'i bar nas brla'i mtshams kyi bar te gsang ba'i gnas la yi ge h'a'o //
analyzed: rkang pa'i bar nas brla'i mtshams kyi bar te gsang ba'i gnas la yi ge h'a'o //
translated: The middle of the legs is between the knees and the secret place, with the syllable haṃ.

original: lte ba dang rked pa ni lte ba dang rked pa ste glo g-yas g-yon gnyis so //
analyzed: lte ba dang rked pa ni lte ba dang rked pa ste glo g-yas g-yon gnyis so //
translated: The navel and the waist are the right and left sides of the navel.

original: de dag gi gsang ba ni lte ba kho na ste dbus su gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi gsang ba ni lte ba kho na ste dbus su gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Their secret place is the navel itself, because it is located in the center.

original: de la yi ge sv'a'o //🔽de lta @120a * //
analyzed: de la yi ge sv'a'o // de lta @120a * //
translated: There is the syllable svā.

original: bu'i rgyal ba'i sras ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du skyes pa /
analyzed: bu'i rgyal ba'i sras ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du skyes pa /
translated: Such a bodhisattva is born with the nature of the five tathāgatas.

original: gang zhig rigs lnga ni yi ge aom la sogs pa'i sa bon lnga ste /
analyzed: gang zhig rigs lnga ni yi ge aom la sogs pa'i sa bon lnga ste /
translated: The five families are the five seed syllables of oṃ and so forth.

original: de rnams rab tu ni zla ba'i dkyil la sogs pa'i gdan gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis sku mdog dang / sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / rgod pa dang / drag po'i nga ro'i rang bzhin du dgod par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams rab tu ni zla ba'i dkyil la sogs pa'i gdan gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis sku mdog dang / sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / rgod pa dang / drag po'i nga ro'i rang bzhin du dgod par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Those are well-placed in the form of the Tathāgatas on the seats of moon maṇḍalas, etc., with their colors, grace, heroism, ferocity, hilarity, and the nature of a fierce roar.

original: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin la /
analyzed: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin la /
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i rim pas gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams kyis skye mched rnams dang lha mo spyan la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams kyis khams rnams dang / rdo rje ro langs ma la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis yan lag dang nyid lag dgod par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i rim pas gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams kyis skye mched rnams dang lha mo spyan la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams kyis khams rnams dang / rdo rje ro langs ma la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis yan lag dang nyid lag dgod par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, by the previously explained process, the sense-spheres are placed with the seed syllables of Rūpavajrā, etc., the elements are placed with the seed syllables of Locanā, etc., and the limbs and digits are placed with the seed syllables of Vajāveśa, etc.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: bdag dang lha mo la sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par byas shing slob ma la yang 'dus byas pa'i phyir bsgom par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: bdag dang lha mo la sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par byas shing slob ma la yang 'dus byas pa'i phyir bsgom par bshad par bya ste /
translated: One should explain the consecration of oneself and the goddess with the mantra, and also the meditation for the sake of the disciple’s assembly.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
translated: Abiding in the middle of the realm of space,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: re zhig dang po rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las byung ba'i rno ba'i me 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis slob ma thal bar byas la /
analyzed: re zhig dang po rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las byung ba'i rno ba'i me 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis slob ma thal bar byas la /
translated: First, the practitioner should burn the disciple to ashes with a mass of sharp flames arisen from the seed of the gnosis being in one’s heart.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa ni /
translated: Abiding in the middle of the realm of space

original: nam mkha'i dbus bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi ngo bor bsams te //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbus bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi ngo bor bsams te //
translated: is the nature of emptiness like the middle of space.

original: de'i 'og tu ye shes rgya mtsho ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bya ba byed pa yi ge gsum bsgoms te /
