analyzed: de'i 'og tu ye shes rgya mtsho ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bya ba byed pa yi ge gsum bsgoms te /
translated: After that, one should meditate on the three syllables that perform the activity of emanating and gathering the ocean of gnosis.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa zla ba bsams shing /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa zla ba bsams shing /
translated: One should imagine the moon arisen from the transformation of that.

original: de'i steng du yi ge gsum bkod la /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge gsum bkod la /
translated: One should arrange the three syllables on that moon.

original: bdag nyid ni slob ma'i bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus su gnas pa ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid ni slob ma'i bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus su gnas pa ste /
translated: One’s own nature is in the middle of the moon of the nature of the disciple.

original: khyad par ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In particular, one should meditate on the nature of Vairocana.

original: de'i rjes la bsdu ba dang kyang gi sgras spro ba yang bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la bsdu ba dang kyang gi sgras spro ba yang bya ste /
translated: After that, one should also perform the gathering in and the emanation with the word “also.”

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la sems can thams cad 'od zer gyis phyin par byas la /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la sems can thams cad 'od zer gyis phyin par byas la /
translated: Having caused all sentient beings to arrive at the buddhafield of Vairocana with light rays,

original: slar yang de rnams zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsdu par bya'o //
analyzed: slar yang de rnams zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsdu par bya'o //
translated: one should gather them back again with the peaceful vajra holder, the vajra master.

original: 'dod na zhes pa ni gal te 'dod pa mnyam por yod pa de'i tshe de'i slob ma yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi bsgom pa la zhugs par @120b bya'o ;
analyzed: 'dod na zhes pa ni gal te 'dod pa mnyam por yod pa de'i tshe de'i slob ma yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi bsgom pa la zhugs par @120b bya'o ;
translated: If one wishes, if there is an equal desire, then at that time the disciple also should engage in the meditation on Vairocana.

original: / slob ma de nyid la yang rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten zhes pa ni sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa gzhal yas khang pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: / slob ma de nyid la yang rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten zhes pa ni sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa gzhal yas khang pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Also for that disciple, one should meditate on the celestial mansion situated in the maṇḍala of the four precious substances, earth, and so on.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: 'od zer gyi phreng ba ni chos 'byung gi phyag rgya ste de nyid kyi gdan du gyur par rnam par brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer gyi phreng ba ni chos 'byung gi phyag rgya ste de nyid kyi gdan du gyur par rnam par brgyan pa'o //
translated: The garland of light rays is the mudra of the source of phenomena, which is the ornament that serves as the seat of the principal one.

original: yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Again, what is it like?

original: ye shes rgya mtsho ni /
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho ni /
translated: The ocean of wisdom is

original: dbus kyi gtso bo dang dus gsum gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo rnams te /
analyzed: dbus kyi gtso bo dang dus gsum gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo rnams te /
translated: the principal one in the center and the tathagatas abiding in the three times, the goddesses, bodhisattvas, and wrathful ones.

original: de dag gi gnas ni gzhir gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi gnas ni gzhir gyur pa'o //
translated: Their abode is the basis.

original: mkhas pa ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi bdag nyid ba spu'i bu gnas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'phel ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mkhas pa ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi bdag nyid ba spu'i bu gnas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'phel ba'i phyir /
translated: The wise one, who is the nature of the vajra master, in order to increase the accumulation of merit and wisdom in the pores of the body,

original: mchod pa'i sprin ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod pa'i phyir spro bar bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: mchod pa'i sprin ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod pa'i phyir spro bar bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: should emanate the cloud of offerings, the assembly of goddesses such as Rupavajra, in order to make offerings to the tathagatas abiding in the realm of space.

original: mchod bya rnams bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: mchod bya rnams bshad par bya ste /
translated: The objects of offering should be explained.

original: padma rnam pa lnga zhes pa ni rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: padma rnam pa lnga zhes pa ni rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The five kinds of lotus are the five Tathagatas of the families.

original: autpala rnam pa lnga ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: autpala rnam pa lnga ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa lnga'o //
translated: The five kinds of utpala are the five beginning with Rupavajrā.

original: me tog karni ka dang / ma li ka dang / yu ti ka dang / ka ra b'i ra rnams ni re re zhing rnam pa lnga yin pa'i phyir nyi shu'o//
analyzed: me tog karni ka dang / ma li ka dang / yu ti ka dang / ka ra b'i ra rnams ni re re zhing rnam pa lnga yin pa'i phyir nyi shu'o//
translated: The flowers karnikara, mallika, yutika, and karavira are each of five kinds, making twenty.

original: dz'a ti yang rnam pa gsum yin te bsdus nas nyi shu rtsa gsum mo //
analyzed: dz'a ti yang rnam pa gsum yin te bsdus nas nyi shu rtsa gsum mo //
translated: Jati is also of three kinds, making twenty-three.

original: de la dbye ba ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang / khro bo bcu dang / reg bya rdo rje ma ni bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa ste /
analyzed: de la dbye ba ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang / khro bo bcu dang / reg bya rdo rje ma ni bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa ste /
translated: Therein, the analysis is of the four goddesses beginning with Locanā, the eight Bodhisattvas, the ten Wrathful Ones, and Sparśavajrā embracing the Lord.

original: nam mkha' la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsams la lha de rnams mchod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nam mkha' la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsams la lha de rnams mchod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having visualized the mandala circle in the sky, one should imagine those deities in order to worship them.

original: rab tu brtag pa ni slob ma bsgom du gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu brtag pa ni slob ma bsgom du gzhug pa'o //
translated: The thorough analysis is the meditation of the disciples.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: yang na nam mkha'i dbyings ni 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: yang na nam mkha'i dbyings ni 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: Or else, the realm of space is clear light.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni de las cig car spro ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho ni 'ja' tshon lta bu spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni de las cig car spro ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho ni 'ja' tshon lta bu spro bar bya ste /
translated: The gnosis that abides in the center of that is the ocean of gnosis that is simultaneously emanated, which should be emanated like a rainbow.

original: slob ma de lta bu'i sgom pa byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: slob ma de lta bu'i sgom pa byed du gzhug go //
translated: The disciple should be caused to meditate in that way.

original: bdag nyid ni slob ma'i lus te /
analyzed: bdag nyid ni slob ma'i lus te /
translated: The self is the body of the disciple.

original: zla ba'i dbus gnas pa ni 'od zer gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa dang / snying gar yang de bzhin du snang ba'i ngo bo bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis bsgom @121a * //
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus gnas pa ni 'od zer gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa dang / snying gar yang de bzhin du snang ba'i ngo bo bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis bsgom @121a * //
translated: Abiding in the center of the moon is abiding in the center of the circle of light rays, and also meditating on the nature of light in the heart.

original: pa rdo rje 'dzin ni slob dpon gyis slob ma de nyid byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: pa rdo rje 'dzin ni slob dpon gyis slob ma de nyid byed du gzhug go //
translated: The vajra holder is the master who causes the disciple to meditate on the twelve examples of illusion.

original: de'i rjes la rin chen sna bzhi ni khams bzhi'i ngo bo mchod rten ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i mgrin pa la sogs par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rin chen sna bzhi ni khams bzhi'i ngo bo mchod rten ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i mgrin pa la sogs par gnas pa ste /
translated: After that, the four precious substances, which are the nature of the four elements, are the four maṇḍalas that abide in the throat, and so on.

original: 'od zer phreng ba ni dmar po dang dkar po dang ljang gu dang ser po'i 'od zer rnams kyis rnam par brgyan par bsams te /
analyzed: 'od zer phreng ba ni dmar po dang dkar po dang ljang gu dang ser po'i 'od zer rnams kyis rnam par brgyan par bsams te /
translated: The garland of light rays is imagined to be adorned with red, white, green, and yellow light rays.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho ni snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / dus gsum ni yi ge gsum ma 'jug pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho ni snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / dus gsum ni yi ge gsum ma 'jug pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The three times are the three syllables, a, a, and ham, which are the exhalation, etc.

original: de rnams kyi gnas ni gzhir gyur pa bsam pa ni shes par bya'o ;
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnas ni gzhir gyur pa bsam pa ni shes par bya'o ;
translated: The abode of those is the basis, which is to be known as the thought.

original: / bdag gi ba spu ni gdong gi sna ste /
analyzed: / bdag gi ba spu ni gdong gi sna ste /
translated: My hair is the face nose.

original: de nyid kyi bu ga ni g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna khung ngo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi bu ga ni g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna khung ngo //
translated: The pores of that are the left and right nostrils.

original: de dag las g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyig dang dal bus dman par gyur pa'i rim pas mchod pa'i sprin ni dmar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams spro ba ni sna'i rtse mor 'dzin par bya'o ;
analyzed: de dag las g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyig dang dal bus dman par gyur pa'i rim pas mchod pa'i sprin ni dmar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams spro ba ni sna'i rtse mor 'dzin par bya'o ;
translated: From those, the cloud of offerings, the red light rays, etc., are to be held at the tip of the nose, in the order of right, left, both, and slow.

original: / padma dang autpala rnams ni rlung bcu'o //
analyzed: / padma dang autpala rnams ni rlung bcu'o //
translated: The lotus and utpala are the ten winds.

original: de bzhin du dz'a ti ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dz'a ti ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Similarly, jati is threefold.

original: de rnams nye bar bsdus pas srog dang rtsol ba dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams nye bar bsdus pas srog dang rtsol ba dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: By the inclusion of those, there is life, exertion, and union,

original: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rlung gsum mo //
analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rlung gsum mo //
translated: which are the three winds of the nature of exhalation, etc.

original: karni ka ra la sogs pa bzhi po ni dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob par byed pa lha mo spyan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: karni ka ra la sogs pa bzhi po ni dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob par byed pa lha mo spyan la sogs pa'o //
translated: The four beginning with Karṇikāra are the goddesses Locanā, etc., who consecrate the maṇḍala.

original: de rnams bsams nas mchod pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can 'od gsal ba'i mchod pa byas te /
analyzed: de rnams bsams nas mchod pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can 'od gsal ba'i mchod pa byas te /
translated: Having visualized them, one should worship them with the worship of clear light, which has the nature of vajra repetition.

original: slob ma byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: slob ma byed du gzhug go //
translated: One should cause the disciple to do so.

original: de ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa dag go //
analyzed: de ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa dag go //
translated: This is the stage of self-consecration and vajra repetition.

original: yang na padma ni gsang ba'i padma'o //
analyzed: yang na padma ni gsang ba'i padma'o //
translated: Or else, the lotus is the secret lotus.

original: de yang rnam pa lnga ni nam mkha' lngas brgyan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa lnga ni nam mkha' lngas brgyan pa'i phyir /
translated: That also is fivefold, because it is adorned with the five spaces.

original: autpala dang 'dra bas ni autpala ni rdo rje ste /
analyzed: autpala dang 'dra bas ni autpala ni rdo rje ste /
translated: It is like an utpala, and the utpala is the vajra.

original: de yang shin tu shes nas dz'a ti zhes pa ni phyag rgya ma'i rigs te /
analyzed: de yang shin tu shes nas dz'a ti zhes pa ni phyag rgya ma'i rigs te /
translated: Having understood that very well, jāti is the class of the consort.

original: de yang rigs kyi dbye bas sme sha can dang / khrus mkhan dang / gar mkhan ma sta rnam pa gsum shes nas lha rnams ni lha mo de rnams la dbul ba ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rigs kyi dbye bas sme sha can dang / khrus mkhan dang / gar mkhan ma sta rnam pa gsum shes nas lha rnams ni lha mo de rnams la dbul ba ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Moreover, having known the three types of women, the outcaste, the washerwoman, and the dancer, one should offer them to the deities, having properly united the vajra and lotus.

original: yang na rigs dga' mo dang / rgod ma dang / glang mo ste bud med rnams kyi rigs rnam pa gsum shes nas /
analyzed: yang na rigs dga' mo dang / rgod ma dang / glang mo ste bud med rnams kyi rigs rnam pa gsum shes nas /
translated: Or else, having known the three types of women, the kṣatriya, the vaiśya, and the śūdra,

original: dbul bar bya ba ni de dang 'dra ba'i byed pa bcings pas @121b zhugs par bya'o /
analyzed: dbul bar bya ba ni de dang 'dra ba'i byed pa bcings pas @121b zhugs par bya'o /
translated: one should offer them, having entered into union with them, bound by the seal of their type.

original: karni ka ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: karni ka ni dga' ba'o //
translated: The karṇikāra is joy.

original: ma li ka ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: ma li ka ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
translated: The jasmine is supreme joy.

original: ka ra w'i ra ni dga' bral lo //🔽yu ti ka ni lhan cig skyes pa ste de dag bsam zhing mtshon la /
analyzed: ka ra w'i ra ni dga' bral lo // yu ti ka ni lhan cig skyes pa ste de dag bsam zhing mtshon la /
translated: The karavīra is the joy of separation.🔽The yūthika is the innate.

original: mchod pa rab tu brtag pa ni bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba la byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: mchod pa rab tu brtag pa ni bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba la byed du gzhug go //
translated: Having contemplated and indicated those, one should cause the worship to be imagined, which is the experience of great bliss.

original: de ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
translated: That is the nature, cause, action, and result.

original: de ltar bla ma dang phyag rgya ma dang slob ma'i 'dus byas nas mchod bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bstan par bya ste /🔽dpag tshad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ltar bla ma dang phyag rgya ma dang slob ma'i 'dus byas nas mchod bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bstan par bya ste / dpag tshad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus, having assembled the guru, the consort, and the disciples, one should meditate on the mandala to be worshipped.🔽One should draw the mandala, one hundred leagues in size, with the wheel, etc.🔽One hundred leagues is the size.

original: dpag tshad brgya ba rgya che ba 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo las skyes pa ste rtag pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya ba rgya che ba 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo las skyes pa ste rtag pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Wheel is the mandala born from the wheel, the eternal mandala.

original: de bsgom pa 'am bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bsgom pa 'am bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should draw it or meditate on it.

original: 'on kyang le'u bcu drug pa las gsungs pa'i cho gas brin khru bcu drug pa bri'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang le'u bcu drug pa las gsungs pa'i cho gas brin khru bcu drug pa bri'o //
translated: However, one should draw it sixteen cubits in size with the ritual taught in chapter sixteen.

original: de la rigs rnams zhes bya ba ni zhe sa'i don du mang po'i tshig ste /
analyzed: de la rigs rnams zhes bya ba ni zhe sa'i don du mang po'i tshig ste /
translated: The families is a plural word in the sense of a class.

original: des na 'bras bu rnam par snang mdzad dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu rnam par snang mdzad dgod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should place the result, Vairocana.

original: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i sgom pa'i spros pas so //
analyzed: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i sgom pa'i spros pas so //
translated: The wise one is the one who has the previously explained meditation.

original: de nas padma dang rdo rje la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma rnams so //
analyzed: de nas padma dang rdo rje la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma rnams so //
translated: Then, lotus, vajra, etc. are the signs of the Tathagata family.

original: de bzhin gyi sgras ni mig la sogs pa yang phyogs dang mtshams kyi dbye bas bsgom pa'am dgod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gyi sgras ni mig la sogs pa yang phyogs dang mtshams kyi dbye bas bsgom pa'am dgod pa'o //
translated: The word “also” indicates that the eyes, etc. are meditated on or arranged by way of the divisions of the directions and sub-directions.

original: gal te bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin na de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa'i bsam pa rgya che bas dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam ni khams gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du'o //
analyzed: gal te bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin na de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa'i bsam pa rgya che bas dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam ni khams gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du'o //
translated: If it is the mandala of meditation, then the yogin’s intention is vast, and the mandala of the three realms is as much as a million yojanas in extent, beginning from the peak of existence.

original: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: The glorious Tantra of the Union with All Buddhas says,

original: rnal 'byor thams cad bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: rnal 'byor thams cad bcom ldan 'das //
translated: All yogins are the Bhagavat,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Vajrasattva, the Tathagata.

original: khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa //
analyzed: khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa //
translated: The three realms without exception

original: de nyid kyi ni longs spyod yin //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ni longs spyod yin // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: are his very enjoyment.

original: yang gsungs pa /🔽kun du phyag dang zhabs ldan pa //
analyzed: yang gsungs pa / kun du phyag dang zhabs ldan pa //
translated: And it also says,🔽He has hands and feet everywhere,

original: kun du spyan dang zhabs dang dbu//
analyzed: kun du spyan dang zhabs dang dbu//
translated: eyes, faces, and ears everywhere.

original: kun du snyan ldan 'jig rten la /
analyzed: kun du snyan ldan 'jig rten la /
translated: He pervades all worlds

original: thams cad khyab nas zhugs pa'o //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: thams cad khyab nas zhugs pa'o //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: and enters into all things.

original: gal te bri ba'i dkyil 'khor yin na de'i tshe gru bzhi la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa dang shin tu mdzes pa ni rdul tshon gyis mdzes pa bsgom par bya ba'am /🔽dgod par bya'o zhes @122a * //
analyzed: gal te bri ba'i dkyil 'khor yin na de'i tshe gru bzhi la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa dang shin tu mdzes pa ni rdul tshon gyis mdzes pa bsgom par bya ba'am / dgod par bya'o zhes @122a * //
translated: If it is a mandala to be drawn, then it is endowed with good qualities such as being square, etc. and is very beautiful, which is to be contemplated or arranged as beautiful with colored powders.

original: tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: This is the remainder of the sentence.

original: dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas gsang ba dang phyi'i dbye bas mchod pa'i slob mas bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas gsang ba dang phyi'i dbye bas mchod pa'i slob mas bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
translated: Having completed the mandala, it is explained for the worship to be performed by the disciple, divided into secret and outer,

original: rin chen sna bzhi ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang / ro rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: rin chen sna bzhi ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang / ro rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
translated: the four kinds of jewels are the goddesses Rupavajra, Shabdavajra, Gandhavajra, and Rasavajra.

original: gsal ba ni reg bya rdo rje ma'o ;
analyzed: gsal ba ni reg bya rdo rje ma'o ;
translated: The clear one is Sparshavajra.

original: / rang bzhin dri ma med pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: / rang bzhin dri ma med pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma'o //
translated: The naturally stainless one is Dharmadhatuvajra.

original: de rnams kho na mchod rten ni sna tshogs pa'i bde ba'i phung po'o //
analyzed: de rnams kho na mchod rten ni sna tshogs pa'i bde ba'i phung po'o //
translated: Those very ones are the stupas, the heaps of various bliss.

original: de dag bsgoms nas rigs rnams ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams mchod pa'i phyir ni tshim par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag bsgoms nas rigs rnams ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams mchod pa'i phyir ni tshim par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Having contemplated them, the clans are the mandala deities, for the sake of worship, for the sake of satisfaction.

original: shes rab can ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa brjed mi ngas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa ni spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa brjed mi ngas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa ni spro bar bya'o //
translated: The wise one should meditate on the yoga of the one who does not forget the meditation of the creation stage.

original: phyi'i mchod pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: phyi'i mchod pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: The external worship should be explained.

original: 'dod pa lnga ni me tog la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga ni me tog la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five desires are flowers, etc.

original: yon tan ni rol mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan ni rol mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: The qualities are music, etc.

original: de dag gis mchod pa rgya mtsho ni mchod pa du ma brtsam pa ni dad pas phul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis mchod pa rgya mtsho ni mchod pa du ma brtsam pa ni dad pas phul bar bya'o //
translated: With those, the ocean of worship, the performance of many worships, should be offered with faith.

original: rin chen na bza' la sogs pa ni bum pa la gnas pa dang / 'ba' zhig pa'i na bza' rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen na bza' la sogs pa ni bum pa la gnas pa dang / 'ba' zhig pa'i na bza' rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: The worship with the jeweled garments, etc. , is with the garments that are placed in the vase and those that are alone.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By whom?

original: byang chub 'dod pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: byang chub 'dod pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: The one who desires enlightenment, the yogi who desires the secret empowerment.

original: rtag tu zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor brtsams nas de nyid rdzogs pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor brtsams nas de nyid rdzogs pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Always means from the beginning of the maṇḍala until it is completed.

original: mchod pa de dag dngos su med na yang yid kyis bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: mchod pa de dag dngos su med na yang yid kyis bsam par bya ste /
translated: If those worships are not actually present, they should be imagined mentally.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa'o //
translated: This is the maṇḍala worship.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: yang na / dpag tshad bye ba'i kho na tsam la //
analyzed: yang na / dpag tshad bye ba'i kho na tsam la //
translated: Again, “just a hundred thousand leagues”

original: zhes pa ni rigs brgya'i dbye bas 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni sku'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rigs brgya'i dbye bas 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni sku'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
translated: means that one should meditate on the wheel maṇḍala of the body maṇḍala, differentiated by the one hundred families.

original: de nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas dgod pa ni bzlas pa byas nas padma dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / autpala rnams ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
analyzed: de nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas dgod pa ni bzlas pa byas nas padma dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / autpala rnams ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
translated: Having performed the recitation, the lotus, vajra, sword, and utpala are the entering consciousness, afflicted mind consciousness,

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang / 'od gsal ba rnams te /
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang / 'od gsal ba rnams te /
translated: ālaya consciousness, and the clear light, respectively.

original: de dag rang bzhin snang ba'i rim pas bsgom pa ni sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag rang bzhin snang ba'i rim pas bsgom pa ni sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Those should be purified by the stage of the appearance of the nature.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: ma sa pa zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis dbye ba shes pas so //
analyzed: ma sa pa zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis dbye ba shes pas so //
translated: “Māyāsamaya” is the knowledge of the differentiation of the nature.

original: de'i rjes la de las langs te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la de las langs te /
translated: After that, having arisen from that,

original: cig car du gru bzhi ni @122b lha mo bzhis bskor ba dang / shin tu mdzes pa ni 'ja' tshon bzhin du snang ba dang / dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam zhes pa ni dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam gyi 'od kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsams te /
analyzed: cig car du gru bzhi ni @122b lha mo bzhis bskor ba dang / shin tu mdzes pa ni 'ja' tshon bzhin du snang ba dang / dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam zhes pa ni dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam gyi 'od kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsams te /
translated: The square is the four goddesses surrounding him, the very beautiful is the appearance like a rainbow, and the size of a million leagues is the body of Great Vajradhara endowed with a mass of light the size of a million leagues.

original: de nas rin chen sna bzhi ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags par pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ste /
analyzed: de nas rin chen sna bzhi ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags par pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ste /
translated: Then the four kinds of jewels are passion, nonpassion, passionlessness, and innate passion.

original: de rnams kyi rim pas mchod rten ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo bzhi pa bsams te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rim pas mchod rten ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo bzhi pa bsams te /
translated: The four stupas are the nature of the body of reality.

original: de nas kyang gsal ba ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa dang / rang bzhin dri ma med pa mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas kyang gsal ba ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa dang / rang bzhin dri ma med pa mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, the clarity is the body of Great Vajradhara, the nature of non-dwelling nirvana, the inseparable two truths, and the stainless nature.

original: rigs ni bram ze la sogs pa dang / gtsang ma la sogs pa ste de rnams mchod pa'i phyir zhes pa ni tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rigs ni bram ze la sogs pa dang / gtsang ma la sogs pa ste de rnams mchod pa'i phyir zhes pa ni tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: The castes are the brahmin and so on, the pure and so on, and they are for the sake of worship, because of the realization of non-difference.

original: gnas su bsgom pa ni spyod bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas su bsgom pa ni spyod bar bya'o //
translated: The place is to be meditated upon as the field of performance.

original: de ltar byas nas 'dod pa'i yon tan ni yul lngas mchod pa'i rgya mtsho ni dbang po rnams tshim par byas la /
analyzed: de ltar byas nas 'dod pa'i yon tan ni yul lngas mchod pa'i rgya mtsho ni dbang po rnams tshim par byas la /
translated: Having done that, the ocean of worship with the five objects of desire, the sense objects, is to satisfy the senses.

original: rin chen ni yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad kyi thig le spro ba dang / na bza' ni g-yogs pa rdo rje'i rtse mor byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'dzin pas /
analyzed: rin chen ni yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad kyi thig le spro ba dang / na bza' ni g-yogs pa rdo rje'i rtse mor byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'dzin pas /
translated: The jewel is the emission of the bindu the size of a mustard seed, and the clothing is the retention of the bindu of bodhicitta at the tip of the vajra.

original: mchod pa ni de rnam pa'i ngo bos nam mkha' yongs su gang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa ni de rnam pa'i ngo bos nam mkha' yongs su gang bar bya'o //
translated: Worship is to fill the sky with the essence of those aspects.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By whom?

original: byang chub 'dod pa zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i rnam pa thob par 'dod pas so //
analyzed: byang chub 'dod pa zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i rnam pa thob par 'dod pas so //
translated: By one who desires enlightenment, who desires to attain the aspect of the indivisibility of the two truths.

original: rtag tu ni yul dang dbang po dbyer med par byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa'i bsgom pa la rtsol ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas so zhes ston to //
analyzed: rtag tu ni yul dang dbang po dbyer med par byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa'i bsgom pa la rtsol ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas so zhes ston to //
translated: Always indicates that the yogi/nī who is endowed with effort in the cultivation of devotion to the Tathāgata has made the objects and the sense organs inseparable.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung 'jug gi rim pa dang / so sor sdud pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung 'jug gi rim pa dang / so sor sdud pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
translated: That is to say, the generation stage, vajra recitation, mind purification, self-consecration, manifest enlightenment, the stage of union, withdrawal, meditative concentration,

original: srog rtsol dang / 'dzin pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: srog rtsol dang / 'dzin pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: life-force control, retention, recollection, and meditative absorption.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mchod pa byas nas /
translated: Having thus made offerings to the maṇḍala wheel,

original: slob mas bla ma mchod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: slob mas bla ma mchod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order for the disciple to make offerings to the guru,

original: mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i mchog rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i mchog rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the guru] declares the five supreme offerings and so on.

original: lha dang bla ma'i zhabs tha mi dad pas lha ni bla ma'i zhabs so //
analyzed: lha dang bla ma'i zhabs tha mi dad pas lha ni bla ma'i zhabs so //
translated: Since the deity and the guru's feet are nondual, the deity is the guru's feet.

original: bla ma'i zhabs de dag mchod pa rnams pa lnga ni me tog la @123a * //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhabs de dag mchod pa rnams pa lnga ni me tog la @123a * //
translated: The five types of worship of those gurus are with the best flowers, etc.

original: sogs pa'i mchog rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i mchog rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship with the best flowers, etc.

original: rtag tu'i sgras ni gsol ba gdab pa sngon du 'gro ba ste dper na khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga dang tshig rkang gcig gis gsol ba gdab par byas la /
analyzed: rtag tu'i sgras ni gsol ba gdab pa sngon du 'gro ba ste dper na khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga dang tshig rkang gcig gis gsol ba gdab par byas la /
translated: The word “always” means preceded by supplication, for example, with the five verses beginning “You are the one who accomplishes Vajrasattva,” and with the single verse.🔽The supreme maiden explained above is the source of great bliss or the cause of generating the bodhicitta, and the best is the pure mind.

original: sngar bshad pa'i na chung mchog rin chen ni bde ba chen po'am byang chub kyi sems kyi 'byung gnas ni bskyed pa'i rgyu dang / mchog ni sems dag pa dang / rin chen sna tshogs ni sna tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa'am /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i na chung mchog rin chen ni bde ba chen po'am byang chub kyi sems kyi 'byung gnas ni bskyed pa'i rgyu dang / mchog ni sems dag pa dang / rin chen sna tshogs ni sna tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa'am /
translated: Adorned with various jewels is adorned with various ornaments or adorned with various good qualities.

original: sna tshogs pa'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo bla ma la dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo bla ma la dbul bar bya'o //
translated: One should offer to the guru, the essence of all buddhas.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgrub pa tshar ba ni rtog pa med pa'i go 'phang ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa tshar ba ni rtog pa med pa'i go 'phang ste /
translated: The completion of the practice is the state of non-conceptuality.

original: de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
translated: It is taught that it is for the sake of accomplishing that.

original: rin chen sna bdun ni btsun mo dang rta dang glang po la sogs pa yang dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen sna bdun ni btsun mo dang rta dang glang po la sogs pa yang dbul bar bya'o //
translated: The seven precious things are the queen, the horse, the elephant, and so forth, which are also to be offered.

original: de med na zhing 'di zhes pa ni khams gsum ma lus de rnams kyis yongs su gad bar bsams la dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de med na zhing 'di zhes pa ni khams gsum ma lus de rnams kyis yongs su gad bar bsams la dbul bar bya'o //
translated: If they are not there, then this field, the entire three realms, is to be imagined and offered by them.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: sbyin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni sbyin pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni sbyin pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: For the sake of giving, there are three kinds of giving:

original: des bla ma las gsang ba'i don du gnyer bas so //
analyzed: des bla ma las gsang ba'i don du gnyer bas so //
translated: By that, one should seek the secret meaning from the guru.

original: yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Again, what is it like?

original: dngos grub 'dod pa zhes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub 'dod pas so //
analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pa zhes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub 'dod pas so //
translated: One who desires power, who desires the power of non-conceptual wisdom.

original: shes rab can ni bsgom pa brjed mi ngas pas so //
analyzed: shes rab can ni bsgom pa brjed mi ngas pas so //
translated: The wise one, who does not forget the meditation.

original: nyin re zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor brtsam pa nas mchod pa rdzogs pa'i bar du bla ma la de dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: nyin re zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor brtsam pa nas mchod pa rdzogs pa'i bar du bla ma la de dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Every day, from the beginning of the maṇḍala until the completion of the offerings, one should offer that to the guru.

original: de ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: That is the accomplishment.

original: yang na mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni rlung lnga dang mchog rnams ni nye ba'i rlung lnga'o //
analyzed: yang na mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni rlung lnga dang mchog rnams ni nye ba'i rlung lnga'o //
translated: Or else, the five kinds of worship are the five winds, and the supreme ones are the five subsidiary winds.

original: lha rnams mnyes par bya ba ni de rnams 'od gsal ba la bzhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: lha rnams mnyes par bya ba ni de rnams 'od gsal ba la bzhugs par bya'o //
translated: The worship of the gods is to cause them to enter into clear light.

original: de bzhin du na chung ni kun gyi sa bon yin pa'i phyir kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du na chung ni kun gyi sa bon yin pa'i phyir kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the young girl is the fundamental consciousness, because it is the seed of everything.

original: rin chen 'byung gnas ni lta ba bzhi dang ldan pa nyon mongs pa can yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o ;
analyzed: rin chen 'byung gnas ni lta ba bzhi dang ldan pa nyon mongs pa can yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o ;
translated: The source of jewels is the afflicted mental consciousness, which possesses the four views.

original: / mchog ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: / mchog ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The supreme one is the engaging consciousness.

original: rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa ni rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa ni rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: The various jewels are the natures.

original: de rnams thams cad sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba la rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnams thams cad sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba la rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'i phyir /
translated: All of them are to be offered to the state of Great Vajradhara, because they are the nature of all buddhas, clear light.

original: dbul ba ni nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbul ba ni nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: That is the summary.

original: rin chen @123b sna bdun ni ro dang / khrag dang / sha dang / tshil dang / rus pa dang / glad pa dang / shu kra rnams so //
analyzed: rin chen @123b sna bdun ni ro dang / khrag dang / sha dang / tshil dang / rus pa dang / glad pa dang / shu kra rnams so //
translated: The seven precious substances are feces, blood, flesh, fat, bone, brain, and semen.

original: bdun po de dag gis zhing 'di yongs su bkang ba ni lus po ste /
analyzed: bdun po de dag gis zhing 'di yongs su bkang ba ni lus po ste /
translated: The field is filled with those seven substances, which is the body.

original: dbul ba ni de nyid du bzhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: dbul ba ni de nyid du bzhugs par bya'o //
translated: The offering is to remain in that very [body].

original: dngos grub 'dod pa ni 'od gsal ba'i dngos grub 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i phyir ni ye shes gsum dang lus de nyid du nye bar bsdu bar bya ste /
analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pa ni 'od gsal ba'i dngos grub 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i phyir ni ye shes gsum dang lus de nyid du nye bar bsdu bar bya ste /
translated: The desired power is the power of clear light, and in order to give that, the three wisdoms and that very body should be gathered.

original: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //🔽slob mas byas pa'i mchod pa'i 'og tu slob dpon gyi bya ba bshad pa'i phyir /🔽bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam bzhag la //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o // slob mas byas pa'i mchod pa'i 'og tu slob dpon gyi bya ba bshad pa'i phyir / bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam bzhag la //
translated: This is the stage of the purification of the mind.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: After the offering made by the disciple, in order to explain the actions of the master, [the Bhagavān] declares, “In the mudrā of the lord, equipoise,” and so on.

original: bdag po ni sngar bshad pa'i rim pas rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: bdag po ni sngar bshad pa'i rim pas rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: The lord is Great Vajradhara, as explained previously.

original: de nyid kyi phyag rgya ni sku'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyag rgya ni sku'o //
translated: His mudrā is the body.

original: de nyid sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus ni sngar bshad pa'i lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi dbus na bzhugs pa /
analyzed: de nyid sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus ni sngar bshad pa'i lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi dbus na bzhugs pa /
translated: He resides in the center of the mandala of buddhas, in the center of the thirty-two deities explained above.

original: mnyam gzhag pa ni cig car du dmigs te /
analyzed: mnyam gzhag pa ni cig car du dmigs te /
translated: He is contemplated simultaneously in equipoise.

original: reg pa ni reg bya rdo rje ma'i ngo bo phyag rgya ma ste /
analyzed: reg pa ni reg bya rdo rje ma'i ngo bo phyag rgya ma ste /
translated: Touch is the mudra, the nature of Sparshavajrā.

original: de dang sbyor ba dbul bar bya ba ni snyoms par zhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang sbyor ba dbul bar bya ba ni snyoms par zhugs par bya'o //
translated: One should unite with her, that is, one should enter into union.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: sangs rgyas ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang 'dod chags chen po ste 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang 'dod chags chen po ste 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas so //
translated: Buddha is the passion of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases, great passion, the abode of pure passion.

original: de la blo ni rang bzhin te de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la blo ni rang bzhin te de'i phyir ro //
translated: The mind is the nature of that.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the stage of generation.

original: yang na bdag po mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: yang na bdag po mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Or else, the lord is Akṣhobhya.

original: de nyid kyi phyag rgya ni yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyag rgya ni yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: His mudra is the syllable hūṃ.

original: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor bzhi ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor bzhi ste /
translated: The mandala of buddhas is the four mandalas.

original: de rnams kyi dbus su yi ge h'um de nyid mnyam gzhag pa ni yang dag par dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbus su yi ge h'um de nyid mnyam gzhag pa ni yang dag par dgod par bya'o //
translated: In the middle of those, that very syllable hūṃ should be placed, that is, correctly set down.

original: der lkog ma'i padmar mgo'o //
analyzed: der lkog ma'i padmar mgo'o //
translated: There, the head is in the throat lotus.

original: snying ga'i padmar ha'o //🔽lte ba'i padmar a'u'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i padmar ha'o // lte ba'i padmar a'u'o //
translated: The heart is in the heart lotus.🔽The navel is in the navel lotus.

original: gsang ba'i padmar zla phyed dang thig le'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i padmar zla phyed dang thig le'o //
translated: The secret is in the secret lotus.

original: de'i rjes la reg pa ni rlung ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la reg pa ni rlung ste /
translated: After that, the touch is the wind.

original: des sbyor ba ni yi ge h'um de nyid la sbyor ba dbul ba de nyid gcig pus bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: des sbyor ba ni yi ge h'um de nyid la sbyor ba dbul ba de nyid gcig pus bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: By that, the application is the application to that very syllable hūṃ.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa bon gyi yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa bon gyi yi ge aom mo //
translated: Buddha is the seed syllable of Vairocana, the syllable oṃ.

original: 'dod chags ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sa bon te yi ge a'a'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sa bon te yi ge a'a'o //
translated: Passion is the seed syllable of Amitābha, the syllable aḥ.🔽Mind is the single mind of those two.

original: blo zhes pa ni de dag gnyis la blo gcig gis yi ge h'um kho na bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: blo zhes pa ni de dag gnyis la blo gcig gis yi ge h'um kho na bzlas par bya ste /
translated: One should repeat the syllable hūṃ alone.

original: ci 'dod pa'i bzlas pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ci 'dod pa'i bzlas pa bstan pa'o //
translated: This teaches the repetition as desired.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
translated: Also, in the chapter on the rites,🔽it says:🔽Then, the lord of yogins

original: de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi //
translated: Then, the lord of yoga🔽

original: zhes bya ba @124a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba @124a * //
translated: up to:

original: nas / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: nas / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: By the illusion-like meditative stabilization,🔽.

original: bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed //
translated: all activities are accomplished.

original: ces bya ba 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces bya ba 'byung ngo //
translated: This is what occurs.

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of vajra repetition.

original: de'i rjes la ci bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rjes la ci bya'o zhe na /
translated: What should be done after that?

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa //
translated: Abiding in the middle of the realm of space,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni /
translated: The array of the maṇḍala abiding in the middle of the realm of space🔽is the maṇḍala of the tathāgatas, goddesses, bodhisattvas, and wrathful ones.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / lha mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon spros ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / lha mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon spros ste /
translated: Having meditated on the seed of the jñānasattva in one’s heart,

original: de nyid dgug cing nang du gzhug ste /
analyzed: de nyid dgug cing nang du gzhug ste /
translated: having summoned that [jñānasattva] and caused it to enter,

original: bdag gi lus ni rang gi gzugs so //
analyzed: bdag gi lus ni rang gi gzugs so //
translated: one’s body is one’s own form.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdul phra rab kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdul phra rab kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
translated: The tathāgatas are completely perfected with the atoms of all tathāgatas.

original: de'i rjes la bshad gci ni bdud rtsi yin te de nyid kyis bla ma ni rang gi kha mchod pa ni gang bar byas te bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
analyzed: de'i rjes la bshad gci ni bdud rtsi yin te de nyid kyis bla ma ni rang gi kha mchod pa ni gang bar byas te bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
translated: After that, the excrement and urine are the nectar, and with that very [nectar] the guru is worshipped and one's body is filled, which is the creation stage and the practice.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni glad pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni glad pa'o //
translated: The space element is the brain.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
translated: Arranging the mandala in its center is meditating on the moon mandala.

original: bdag gi lus ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid de /
analyzed: bdag gi lus ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid de /
translated: One's body is that moon mandala.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni cha bcu drug gi tshogs las byung ba bsgom ste /🔽de las byung ba'i bshad gci dang 'dra ba de'i ngo bo bsil ba'i bdud rtsi rnams kyis bla ma rang gi lus so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni cha bcu drug gi tshogs las byung ba bsgom ste / de las byung ba'i bshad gci dang 'dra ba de'i ngo bo bsil ba'i bdud rtsi rnams kyis bla ma rang gi lus so //
translated: Meditate on the tathāgatas arising from the assembly of the sixteen parts.

original: mchod pa ni tshim par byas te /
analyzed: mchod pa ni tshim par byas te /
translated: With the nectar that arises from that, which is similar to excrement and urine, the guru's body is worshipped and satisfied.

original: las rgyal pa mchog go //
analyzed: las rgyal pa mchog go //
translated: The action is supreme.

original: de nas sngar bshad pa'i bud med ni reg bya rdo rje ma'i ngo bo phyag rgya ma blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sngar bshad pa'i bud med ni reg bya rdo rje ma'i ngo bo phyag rgya ma blang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, the previously explained woman, who is the essence of Sparśavajrā, is the mudra to be taken.

original: ji lta bu zhe na bzhin bzangs ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dbang gis zhal gyi padma 'dzum pa'o //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na bzhin bzangs ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dbang gis zhal gyi padma 'dzum pa'o //
translated: What is it like? The good-faced one is the lotus face of the Lord, smiling by the power of supreme joy.

original: de bzhin du shin tu mdzes pa ni rengs pa dang dngul la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu mdzes pa ni rengs pa dang dngul la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
translated: Similarly, very beautiful is the one adorned with coral, silver, etc.

original: byin gyi rlabs kyi gnas ni sngar bshad pa'i sa bon las de nyid bsam pa ni /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs kyi gnas ni sngar bshad pa'i sa bon las de nyid bsam pa ni /
translated: The abode of consecration is the seed previously explained.🔽The arrangement of that in the limbs is the clear arrangement of that.

original: de'i yan lag rnams la gsal por bkod la de nyid mchod pa ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa rab tu brtag pa ni bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i yan lag rnams la gsal por bkod la de nyid mchod pa ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa rab tu brtag pa ni bya ba yin no //
translated: The worship of that is the imagination of the union of the two organs.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: yang na bud med ni bcom ldan 'das ma yi ge phyi mo ste /
analyzed: yang na bud med ni bcom ldan 'das ma yi ge phyi mo ste /
translated: Or else, the woman is the Bhagavatī, the mother of the alphabet,

original: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: having the nature of forty-nine letters.

original: de nyid zhi ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa'i phyir /🔽skal ba mchog dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid zhi ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa'i phyir / skal ba mchog dang ldan pa'o //
translated: She is the one who performs the actions of pacification, etc.🔽Therefore, she is endowed with supreme good fortune.

original: bzhin bzangs ni rdo rje @124b 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhin bzangs ni rdo rje @124b 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The good-faced one is the nature of Great Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin du mdzes pa ni thams cad las dkar po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du mdzes pa ni thams cad las dkar po'o //
translated: Similarly, the beautiful is white in all.

original: de thob pa ni bsgom zhing byin gyis brlab pa ni yan lag la dgod pa ste /
analyzed: de thob pa ni bsgom zhing byin gyis brlab pa ni yan lag la dgod pa ste /
translated: The attainment of that is the meditation and consecration, which is the placement of the limbs.

original: de nyid kyi gnas ni sngags kyi sku'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi gnas ni sngags kyi sku'o //
translated: The abode of that is the mantra body.

original: bsam pa ni de nyid sngags kyi sku la yan lag dang nying lag gi dbye bas yi ge phyi mo de dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ni de nyid sngags kyi sku la yan lag dang nying lag gi dbye bas yi ge phyi mo de dgod par bya'o //
translated: The thought is that one should place those syllables, by way of the divisions of the major and minor limbs, in the mantra body.

original: de la rim pa 'di yin te yi ge ka'i sde tshan ni lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo lnga la'o //🔽yi ge tsa'i sde tshan ni lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo lnga la'o //
analyzed: de la rim pa 'di yin te yi ge ka'i sde tshan ni lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo lnga la'o // yi ge tsa'i sde tshan ni lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo lnga la'o //
translated: The sequence there is as follows: The group of the letter ka is on the five fingers of the right hand.🔽The group of the letter ca is on the five fingers of the left hand.

original: yi ge ta'i sde tshan ni rkang pa g-yas pa'i sor mo lnga la'o //
analyzed: yi ge ta'i sde tshan ni rkang pa g-yas pa'i sor mo lnga la'o //
translated: The group of the letter ṭa is on the five toes of the right foot.

original: yi ge ta'i sde tshan ni rkang pa g-yon pa'i sor mo lnga la'o //
analyzed: yi ge ta'i sde tshan ni rkang pa g-yon pa'i sor mo lnga la'o //
translated: The group of the letter ṭa is on the five toes of the left foot.

original: yi ge pa'i sde tshan ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o / ya'i sde tshan ni bshad sgo'i shar la sogs pa la'o //🔽sha ni mig gnyis pa la'o //

translated: The group of the letter pa is on the five points of the vajra, and the group of the letter ya is on the eastern door and so forth.🔽The letter ṣa is on the two eyes.

original: sha ni rna ba gnyis pa la'o //
analyzed: sha ni rna ba gnyis pa la'o //
translated: The letter sa is on the two ears.

original: sa ni sna la'o //
analyzed: sa ni sna la'o //
translated: The syllable sa is in the nose.

original: ha ni kha la'o //
analyzed: ha ni kha la'o //
translated: The syllable ha is in the mouth.

original: ksha ni tshangs pa'i bu ga la'o //
analyzed: ksha ni tshangs pa'i bu ga la'o //
translated: The syllable kṣa is in the aperture of Brahmā.

original: dbyangs bcu drug ni snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na'o //
analyzed: dbyangs bcu drug ni snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na'o //
translated: The sixteen vowels are on a moon disc in the heart.

original: yang na gsang ba'i padmar sa'i khams kyi ngo bo yi ge aa la sogs pa bzhi'o //🔽lte ba'i padmar rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo aom la sogs pa'i yi ge bzhi'o //
analyzed: yang na gsang ba'i padmar sa'i khams kyi ngo bo yi ge aa la sogs pa bzhi'o // lte ba'i padmar rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo aom la sogs pa'i yi ge bzhi'o //
translated: Alternatively, in the secret lotus, the four syllables such as a are the essence of the earth element.🔽In the navel lotus, the four syllables such as oṃ are the essence of the wind element.

original: snying ga'i padmar chu'i khams kyi ngo bo li la sogs pa yi ge bzhi'o //🔽lkog ma'i padmar me'i khams kyi ngo bo /
analyzed: snying ga'i padmar chu'i khams kyi ngo bo li la sogs pa yi ge bzhi'o // lkog ma'i padmar me'i khams kyi ngo bo /
translated: In the heart lotus, the four syllables such as li are the essence of the water element.🔽In the throat lotus, the four syllables such as u are the essence of the fire element.

original: au la sogs pa yi ge bzhi'o //
analyzed: au la sogs pa yi ge bzhi'o //
translated: In the head lotus, the four syllables such as e are the essence of the space element.

original: de ltar dgod par bya la de nyid mchod pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar dgod par bya la de nyid mchod pa ni /
translated: Having thus arranged them, the worship of reality is

analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa byas te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //

analyzed: da ni slob ma'i bya ba yang bshad par bya ste /

translated: The vajra master emanates into the lotus and

translated: The wide-eyed one is the goddess's bodhicitta, which is taken up into the conch.

analyzed: de nyi brtan pa'i blo ldan pa ni /

analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i bdag nyid kyi blos /

analyzed: bza' bar bya ba ni blang bar bya zhing btung bar bya ste /
translated: should eat, that is, take up, and drink.

analyzed: ae ma'o bde ba chen po zhes lan gsum du brjod nas so //
translated: Saying Amazing! Great bliss! three times,

analyzed: de ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: that is the accomplishment.

original: 'bras bu bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu bstan par bya ste /

analyzed: tha ma la pa'i lus la sogs pa ldog cing /
translated: which are the ultimate body, speech, and mind.

analyzed: mchod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i nyid du byed pa'o //

analyzed: sngags rnams ni yi ge aom la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mantras are the syllables om and so on.

analyzed: dngos grub byed pa ni de rnams kyi sgo nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las grub par byed pa ste /
translated: The accomplishment of powers is the accomplishment of the actions of pacifying and so forth by means of those.

analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas /

original: sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: accomplishes all mantras,

analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gsang ba ni sba bar bya'o //

translated: the essence of the bodhicitta that arises from the vajra and lotus.🔽Wisdom is the five, and the vajra-holders are the tathagatas.

original: ye shes ni lnga dang / rdo rje can ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te ye shes kyi rang bzhin yang yin la /🔽rdo rje can yang yin la /🔽rdo rje can yang yin pas /
analyzed: ye shes ni lnga dang / rdo rje can ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te ye shes kyi rang bzhin yang yin la / rdo rje can yang yin la / rdo rje can yang yin pas /
translated: Wisdom is the nature of the vajra-holders,🔽and the vajra-holders are the nature of wisdom.

original: ye shes rdo rje can te /
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje can te /
translated: Therefore, they are the vajra-holders of wisdom.

original: bar gyi tshig mi mngon pa'i las 'dzin pa'i bsdu pa'o //
analyzed: bar gyi tshig mi mngon pa'i las 'dzin pa'i bsdu pa'o //
translated: The middle term is elided, as in the case of the compound “cowherd.”

original: de rnams kyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: The reality of those is the reality of the cowherds.

original: bshad gci dag gis nye bar mtshon pa'i bdud rtsi bshad gci'o //
analyzed: bshad gci dag gis nye bar mtshon pa'i bdud rtsi bshad gci'o //
translated: The nectar is illustrated by the feces and urine, and is the feces and urine.

original: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs ni bshad gci'i le'u zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs ni bshad gci'i le'u zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The collection of texts that teach that is called the chapter on feces and urine.

original: rgyud 'grel las le'u brgyad pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'grel las le'u brgyad pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the sixteen topics of the eighth chapter of the tantra and commentary.

original: le'u brgyad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o /
analyzed: le'u brgyad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o /
translated: The number of verses in the eighth chapter is two hundred and twenty-five.

original: // / gsang ba'i dbang thob nas rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid de'i dus su grub par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / gsang ba'i dbang thob nas rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid de'i dus su grub par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having obtained the secret empowerment, in order to accomplish the state of Great Vajradhara at that time,

original: drag shul gyi rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gtso bor gyur ba'i le'u dgu pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: drag shul gyi rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gtso bor gyur ba'i le'u dgu pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: the ninth chapter is taught, which is primarily the yoga of wrathful concentration.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: rdo rje ni chos kyi sku de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin to //
analyzed: rdo rje ni chos kyi sku de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin to //
translated: Vajra means the dharmakāya. Because he holds that, he is Vajradhara.

original: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus mdzes pas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus mdzes pas na rgyal po'o //
translated: The king is the Sambhogakaya, adorned with the major and minor marks of Buddhahood.

original: sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis nam mkha' ma lus par khyab par mdzad par na /
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis nam mkha' ma lus par khyab par mdzad par na /
translated: Since the Nirmanakaya pervades the entire realm of space,

original: thams cad nam mkha'o //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha'o //
translated: everything is space.

original: rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo bskor bas na mi 'gyur ba che'o //
analyzed: rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo bskor bas na mi 'gyur ba che'o //
translated: The great unchanging is the turning of the wheel of the twelve aspects.

original: slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab ma ste thams cad dbang bskur pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab ma ste thams cad dbang bskur pa'o //
translated: The consecration is the master, the secret, and the wisdom woman.

original: de rnams kyi spyod pa ni ji bzhin du nan tan no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi spyod pa ni ji bzhin du nan tan no //
translated: Their conduct is the practice of the four.

original: de nyid kyi mchog ni bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi mchog ni bzhi pa ste /
translated: The supreme of those is the fourth.

original: @125b de yang de bzhin gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: @125b de yang de bzhin gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: That is also the nature of suchness.

original: kun don ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs te /
analyzed: kun don ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs te /
translated: The purpose of all is the collection of karma of pacification and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi dbang phyug dam pa ni sprul par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbang phyug dam pa ni sprul par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The supreme lord of those is the emanation.

original: de lta bu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad pa'o //
translated: The mandala of such a Great Vajradhara is fully explained.

original: tshig gi 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: tshig gi 'brel ba'o //
translated: This is the connection of the words.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rdo rje gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: The three vajras are the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi mi phyed pa ni yon tan dang gtso bo'i dngos pos gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mi phyed pa ni yon tan dang gtso bo'i dngos pos gnas pa'o //
translated: Their indivisibility is their abiding in the nature of their qualities and preeminence.

original: dkyil 'khor ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala is the mandala of the five Tathagatas.

original: sku gsung thugs ni rnal 'byor pa'i lus la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni rnal 'byor pa'i lus la sogs pa ste /
translated: The body, speech, and mind are the body, etc. of the yogin.

original: de la longs spyod pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o go 'phang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi longs spyod kyi bde ba ster ba'o //
analyzed: de la longs spyod pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o go 'phang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi longs spyod kyi bde ba ster ba'o //
translated: The enjoyment of those is the bestowal of the bliss of enjoyment of the meditative concentration of the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: mchog ni thams cad skyong ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ni thams cad skyong ba'o //
translated: The supreme is the protection of all.

original: gsang ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i 'gal ba'i sgras bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i 'gal ba'i sgras bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: The secret is to be taught by the words of the prohibited, such as killing, etc.

original: sangs rgyas ye shes ni ye shes lnga ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes ni ye shes lnga ste /
translated: The wisdom of the Buddhas is the five wisdoms.

original: de rnams thob pa'i phyir sangs rgyas ye shes can no ;
analyzed: de rnams thob pa'i phyir sangs rgyas ye shes can no ;
translated: He is the possessor of the wisdom of the Buddhas because he attains those.

original: / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
translated: Abiding in the middle of the realm of space,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: etc.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni snying ga'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni snying ga'o //
translated: The realm of space is the heart.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni /
translated: The mandala of the Buddha, which is located in its center,

original: rab tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: rab tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: is the mandala that awakens.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine the mandala of the sun.

original: de'i steng du spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas yi ge gsum las byung ba'i rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i le'u dang po las bshad pa'i zhal dang phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ldan par bsgom zhing de nyid kyi lag tu rdo rje ni phyag mtshan gtso bo ste
analyzed: de'i steng du spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas yi ge gsum las byung ba'i rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i le'u dang po las bshad pa'i zhal dang phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ldan par bsgom zhing de nyid kyi lag tu rdo rje ni phyag mtshan gtso bo ste
translated: Upon that, one should meditate on the three syllables, which arise from the emanation and gathering of the three syllables, as the vajra Akṣobhya, with faces and hand implements and colors as explained in the first chapter, and the vajra in his hand is the principal hand implement.

original: / gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar byung ba bsgom par bya'o ;
analyzed: / gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar byung ba bsgom par bya'o ;
translated: One should meditate on the others as they occur.

original: / ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: / ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: 'od 'phro mang po ni m'a ma k'i ste des 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: 'od 'phro mang po ni m'a ma k'i ste des 'khyud pa'o //
translated: It is embraced by Māmakī, who has many light rays.

original: 'od zer sna lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs can gyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'od zer sna lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs can gyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: The five light rays are the members of the maṇḍala who belong to the five tathāgatas.

original: rab tu gang ba ni de dag gis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskor ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu gang ba ni de dag gis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskor ba'o //
translated: It is completely filled by them, which is to say, they surround it in sequence.

original: de'i rjes la m'a ma k'i dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas 'dod chags chen po'i sgras sangs rgyas ni nam mkha'i dbyings la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / dus gsum pa ni lus ngag yid kyis mi dge ba bcu byed pa'i sems can rnams khar zhugs te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la m'a ma k'i dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas 'dod chags chen po'i sgras sangs rgyas ni nam mkha'i dbyings la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / dus gsum pa ni lus ngag yid kyis mi dge ba bcu byed pa'i sems can rnams khar zhugs te /
translated: Then, by the union of the two, Mañjuśrī and Māmakī, the buddhas who dwell in the realm of space, the tathāgatas, and the sentient beings who are in the three times, who engage in the ten nonvirtues with body, speech, and mind, enter the mouth of the gnosis being.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i kha @126a * //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i kha @126a * //
translated: The gnosis being’s🔽mouth is the central channel.

original: las rtsa dbus ma nas lha mo'i padmar spros te /
analyzed: las rtsa dbus ma nas lha mo'i padmar spros te /
translated: The goddesses emanate from the lotus of the mother.

original: der yang rim pa bzhin du bsams la /
analyzed: der yang rim pa bzhin du bsams la /
translated: There, they are imagined in sequence.

original: rdo rje ni yi ge h'um las byung ba'i gsang ba'i rdo rjes phye mar brlag par ni 'jig par bya'o //🔽de'i tshe de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs ni mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i byed pa'i lus la sogs pa longs spyod ni rnam pa dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni yi ge h'um las byung ba'i gsang ba'i rdo rjes phye mar brlag par ni 'jig par bya'o // de'i tshe de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs ni mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i byed pa'i lus la sogs pa longs spyod ni rnam pa dang bcas pa ste /
translated: The vajra is the secret vajra arisen from the syllable hūṃ. The pulverization is the destruction.

original: rdo rjes phye mar brlag cing med par gyur pa ni stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes phye mar brlag cing med par gyur pa ni stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
translated: At that time, the bodies, speech, and minds of those sentient beings, the enjoyment of the body, etc., which is the cause of the heinous crimes, etc., is imagined to be destroyed by the vajra, to be pulverized and become nonexistent, to become emptiness.

original: de'i rjes la mchog ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang / gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can rnams kyi rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la mchog ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang / gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can rnams kyi rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: After that, the supreme is the consciousness of all the buddhas and of difficult to tame sentient beings.

original: de nyid bsam gtan ni yi ge gsum gyi rnam pa rtsa gsum la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par bsams te /
analyzed: de nyid bsam gtan ni yi ge gsum gyi rnam pa rtsa gsum la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par bsams te /
translated: That very concentration is the three syllables, which are imagined to abide in the three nāḍīs, respectively.🔽The mind is the two syllables ho, which abide in the two nāḍīs of Devī and Vasu.

original: thugs ni yi ge ho gnyis lha sbyin ma dang / nor rgyal ma'i rtsa gnyis po la gnas pas dag pa thob par gyur pa ni bskor ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: thugs ni yi ge ho gnyis lha sbyin ma dang / nor rgyal ma'i rtsa gnyis po la gnas pas dag pa thob par gyur pa ni bskor ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The attainment of purity is the meditation on the cakras.

original: rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus ;🔽/ zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus ; / zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the secret vajra.

original: bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i rdo rjes so //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i rdo rjes so //
translated: The secret vajra of oneself.

original: sems can thams cad ni yi ge lnga /🔽de dag bsad pa ni yi shes sems ma'i padma'i rtsa rnams la bskyod cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ni yi ge lnga / de dag bsad pa ni yi shes sems ma'i padma'i rtsa rnams la bskyod cing /
translated: All sentient beings are the five syllables.🔽Those are killed by moving the nāḍīs of the lotus of the gnosis mind into the path above that.

original: de nyid kyi steng gi lam nas zhal nas phyung ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi steng gi lam nas zhal nas phyung ste /
translated: They are extracted from the mouth.

original: dam tshig sems ma'i zhal du zhugs la de nyid kyi padma las dam tshig sems dpa'i rdo rjer phyin la de nyid kyi steng gi lam nas dam tshig sems dpa'i zhal nas phyung zhing nam mkha'i dbyings la thim ste /
analyzed: dam tshig sems ma'i zhal du zhugs la de nyid kyi padma las dam tshig sems dpa'i rdo rjer phyin la de nyid kyi steng gi lam nas dam tshig sems dpa'i zhal nas phyung zhing nam mkha'i dbyings la thim ste /
translated: The pledge being enters the mouth of the mind being, and from that lotus, having become the vajra of the pledge being, having emerged from the mouth of the pledge being through the path above, one should imagine that the mind being dissolves into the realm of space.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine the Tathagata Akshobhya with his retinue.

original: mi bskyod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu zhes pa ni mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams las rgyal ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sras ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu zhes pa ni mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams las rgyal ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sras ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The pure buddhafields of Akshobhya are the world systems of Abhirati, where the conquerors, the Tathagatas, and the sons, the Bodhisattvas, are born.

original: zhe sdang gi rigs ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig 'di ni bsgom pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: zhe sdang gi rigs ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig 'di ni bsgom pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: The family of anger is the family of Akshobhya. This is the stage of meditation on the pledge.

original: de kho na ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du shes par bya ba ni bsgom par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du shes par bya ba ni bsgom par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: One should know that reality just as it is, which is to be meditated upon, is the stage of generation. Just as it is means just as it is explained in the stage of generation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsang ba'i mdzod kyi nor bu'i thig le'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsang ba'i mdzod kyi nor bu'i thig le'i rgyud las /
translated: Therefore, the Tantra of the Drop of the Jewel of the Secret Treasury says:

original: bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas /
translated: The Bhagavat, the Victorious in the Three Worlds,

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs spros te lha chen po bsad @126b la slar yang gso bar bya ste thal bas g-yogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la thal ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gzhag go //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs spros te lha chen po bsad @126b la slar yang gso bar bya ste thal bas g-yogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la thal ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gzhag go //
translated: emanated the form of Vajra Humkara, and having killed the great god, he revived him again. He placed the Tathagata called Bhasmeśvara in the world realm covered with ashes.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyis snying rje chen pos dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa can gal te bsad na de'i tshe sdom pa nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyis snying rje chen pos dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa can gal te bsad na de'i tshe sdom pa nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: By this very meditative stabilization, if one kills one who harms the Three Jewels with great compassion, then at that time the vow is not impaired.

original: srog gcod pa ni yan lag lnga pa ste /
analyzed: srog gcod pa ni yan lag lnga pa ste /
translated: Killing is the fifth branch.

original: yan lag gcig med na yang srog gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yan lag gcig med na yang srog gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even if one branch is missing, killing does not occur.

original: 'on kyang snying rje chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du byed pa smos ci dgos /
analyzed: 'on kyang snying rje chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du byed pa smos ci dgos /
translated: But what need is there to mention that one who acts with great compassion makes the Tathagata himself?

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now the commitment of the family of delusion is explained.

original: rdo rje 'dzin ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Vajra-holder is Vajrasattva.

original: ye shes dang thar pa ni ye shes thar pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes dang thar pa ni ye shes thar pa ste /
translated: Knowledge and liberation are knowledge and liberation.
