original: de dag rab tu sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag rab tu sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: That which accomplishes them is just that.

original: dag pa kun gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dag pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa kun gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dag pa'o //
translated: It is pure by nature, because it is the nature of all purities.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri mas ma gos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri mas ma gos pa med pa'o //
translated: It is stainless, because it is not soiled by the stains of the afflictions such as desire.

original: byang chub spyod pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub spyod pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa ste /
translated: The conduct of enlightenment is the conduct of mantra.

original: de nyid la bya ba'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams zhugs par byed pa ni byang chub spyod pa rab zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la bya ba'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams zhugs par byed pa ni byang chub spyod pa rab zhugs pa'o //
translated: That very thing is the conduct of enlightenment, because it causes the practitioners of action tantra to engage in it.

original: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig bka' stsal to zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig bka' stsal to zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The commitment of that kind of Bhagavat is declared.

original: dam tshig ni ser sna can gyi sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: dam tshig ni ser sna can gyi sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i dam tshig go //
translated: The commitment is the commitment to tame the realm of beings who are miserly.

original: yang dag pa ni de kho na nyid thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa ni de kho na nyid thob par byed pa'o //
translated: The reality is that which causes the attainment of reality.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub ni rnam par snang mdzad nyid du byed pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub ni rnam par snang mdzad nyid du byed pa ste /
translated: The enlightenment of the buddhas is the creation of Vairochana himself.

original: de nyid sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: That is the accomplishment.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the realm of space, etc.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni lte ba ste /🔽de'i dbus su gnas pa'i yi ge gsum las byung ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni lte ba ste / de'i dbus su gnas pa'i yi ge gsum las byung ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni /
translated: The realm of space is the navel.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
translated: In its center, one should imagine a moon disk arisen from the three seed syllables located in the three places,

original: de'i steng du spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas yi ge gsum kho na las 'byung ba'i rim pas ji ltar bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / lha mo spyan dang bcas pa rnam par snang mdzad bsams te /
analyzed: de'i steng du spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas yi ge gsum kho na las 'byung ba'i rim pas ji ltar bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / lha mo spyan dang bcas pa rnam par snang mdzad bsams te /
translated: and on it, through the process of emanating and gathering, the three seed syllables themselves, one should imagine Vairochana together with the goddess Locana, arisen in the sequence of the previously explained colors, etc.,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ni snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyang bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ni snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyang bsgom pa ni /
translated: and all the buddhas, as before, the mandala deities,

original: rim pa ji bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa ji bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
translated: should be arranged in their proper sequence.

original: de'i rjes la rin chen kun ni kha dog lnga'i rin chen rnams so //
analyzed: de'i rjes la rin chen kun ni kha dog lnga'i rin chen rnams so //
translated: After that, all jewels are the five-colored jewels.

original: de rnams @127a * //
analyzed: de rnams @127a * //
translated: Those

original: kyi sbyor ba ni sku mdog de dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje gzugs khro bo'i rgyal po bcu'i sku bsams te /
analyzed: kyi sbyor ba ni sku mdog de dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje gzugs khro bo'i rgyal po bcu'i sku bsams te /
translated: The application of the syllable kṣa is the contemplation of the forms of the ten wrathful kings, the same color as the body, and vajra forms.

original: ye shes sems ma'i padma las snga ma bzhin du phyi rol du spros te /
analyzed: ye shes sems ma'i padma las snga ma bzhin du phyi rol du spros te /
translated: From the lotus of the gnosis being, they emanate externally as before.

original: ser sna can gyi bskyed pa'i mdzod la zhugs shing nyid kyi sku mdog dang mtshungs pa'i rin po che la sogs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas zhags pa dang lcags kyu dag gis 'dren cing rang gi mdzod la zhugs par bsams te /
analyzed: ser sna can gyi bskyed pa'i mdzod la zhugs shing nyid kyi sku mdog dang mtshungs pa'i rin po che la sogs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas zhags pa dang lcags kyu dag gis 'dren cing rang gi mdzod la zhugs par bsams te /
translated: They enter the treasury of the miserly, and with the application of the wind mandala, one should imagine that they are drawn in with the noose and the hook, and enter one’s own treasury.

original: khro bo'i sku de rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du de nyid du thim par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i sku de rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du de nyid du thim par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that those wrathful forms dissolve into that very place as before.

original: nor rnams thams cad ni rin po che la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: nor rnams thams cad ni rin po che la sogs pa ste ;
translated: All wealth is jewels and so forth.

original: de rnams rdo rje gsum ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku rnams kyis 'phrogs pa ni 'gugs par bsams la /
analyzed: de rnams rdo rje gsum ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku rnams kyis 'phrogs pa ni 'gugs par bsams la /
translated: One should imagine that they are stolen by the forms of the three vajras, the wrathful kings, and are drawn in.

original: de nas sems can de rnams nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba ni nor gyi bdag po dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar gyur cing /
analyzed: de nas sems can de rnams nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba ni nor gyi bdag po dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar gyur cing /
translated: Then, those sentient beings, filled with the ocean of wealth, become like the lord of wealth and the wish-fulfilling gem.

original: sangs rgyas sku'i sras dzambha la la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dra ba dang / thob pa'i skyes bu ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku'i sras dzambha la la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dra ba dang / thob pa'i skyes bu ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The beings who have attained the stage of a bodhisattva, like the Buddha's son Jambhala and so forth, become like Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: 'di ni gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi bsgom pa'i rim pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi bsgom pa'i rim pa shes par bya'o //
translated: This is the pledge of the family of delusion, which should be understood as the stage of meditation of the family of Vairocana.

original: rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las zhes pa ni gal te mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis sgom na de'i tshe skyon gang yang ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las zhes pa ni gal te mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis sgom na de'i tshe skyon gang yang ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The phrase all oceans of families means that if the yogas of Akṣobhya and so forth meditate, then there is no fault at all, that is the idea.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of generation.

original: 'on ji ltar nor gyi bdag po de rnams ni dzambha la la sogs pa dang 'dra bar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'on ji ltar nor gyi bdag po de rnams ni dzambha la la sogs pa dang 'dra bar gyur pa ste /
translated: But how do those lords of wealth become like Jambhala and so forth?

original: 'on kyang de rnams kyis ni dad pas sbyin pa ma btang bas stobs kyis blang ba'i rdzas de thob nas 'on kyang sems sdug bsngal ba dang ldan par gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de rnams kyis ni dad pas sbyin pa ma btang bas stobs kyis blang ba'i rdzas de thob nas 'on kyang sems sdug bsngal ba dang ldan par gyur te /
translated: But they do not give gifts out of faith. Having obtained goods by force, they are still miserable.

original: 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ji ltar yin /
translated: How is there a connection with the result?

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: gang zhig yid kyis bsams nas ni //
analyzed: gang zhig yid kyis bsams nas ni //
translated: Having thought with the mind,

original: slar yang mi des mi sbyin na //
analyzed: slar yang mi des mi sbyin na //
translated: if that person does not give again,

original: dngos po chung ba tsam gyis kyang //
analyzed: dngos po chung ba tsam gyis kyang //
translated: even with a small thing,

original: de ni yi dags nyid du 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs pa dang / dad pa yis ni sbyin par bya //
analyzed: de ni yi dags nyid du 'gyur // zhes gsungs pa dang / dad pa yis ni sbyin par bya //
translated: he will become a hungry ghost.

original: zhes gzhan las kyang gsungs so zhe na /
analyzed: zhes gzhan las kyang gsungs so zhe na /
translated: And it is said elsewhere:🔽Give with faith.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad las kyang thams cad du ma sbyin par len pa las thams cad du ldog par bya'i ser sna can @127b ni ma gtogs so zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad las kyang thams cad du ma sbyin par len pa las thams cad du ldog par bya'i ser sna can @127b ni ma gtogs so zhes gsungs so //
translated: The bodhisattva should give everything to everyone, but should not take anything from anyone, except the miser.

original: 'dir yang rigs pa ni gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sgo nas nor 'phrog pa de'i tshes bcu'i dbang phyug gi lag na thob pas nor gyi bdag po 'bras bu dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang rigs pa ni gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sgo nas nor 'phrog pa de'i tshes bcu'i dbang phyug gi lag na thob pas nor gyi bdag po 'bras bu dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the reasoning is this: When a yogin takes wealth by means of the wrathful king, the owner of the wealth is connected with the result, since it is obtained in the hand of the Lord of the Tenth Day.

original: rkun ma la sogs pas kyang 'phrog pa yang tshe phyi mar drug 'gyur du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rkun ma la sogs pas kyang 'phrog pa yang tshe phyi mar drug 'gyur du 'gyur te /
translated: Even if it is taken by thieves and so on, it becomes six times greater in the next life.🔽As it is said:

original: mes tshig pa dang chus khyer ba //
analyzed: mes tshig pa dang chus khyer ba //
translated: Burned by fire, carried away by water,

original: rgyal po rnams kyis gang phrogs te //
analyzed: rgyal po rnams kyis gang phrogs te //
translated: Whatever is taken by kings,

original: rang gi sbyin pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: rang gi sbyin pa gang yin pa //
translated: And whatever is given by oneself,

original: tshe phyi mar de drug 'gyur 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe phyi mar de drug 'gyur 'gyur //
translated: That becomes six times greater in the next life.

original: zhes smos pa na byang chub sems dpa'i lag na gnas pa smos ci dgos /
analyzed: zhes smos pa na byang chub sems dpa'i lag na gnas pa smos ci dgos /
translated: If that is so, what need is there to mention what remains in the hand of a bodhisattva?

original: bsam pa med do zhe na bsam pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: bsam pa med do zhe na bsam pas ci zhig bya /
translated: If it is said there is no intention, what is the use of intention?

original: ser sna can la bskal ba brgya stong gis sbyin pa'i bsam pa ni med de /
analyzed: ser sna can la bskal ba brgya stong gis sbyin pa'i bsam pa ni med de /
translated: For the miserly, the intention to give is not present for hundreds of thousands of eons.

original: de bas na yi dags nyid du rung ba'am /
analyzed: de bas na yi dags nyid du rung ba'am /
translated: Therefore, it is suitable to be a hungry ghost,

original: 'on te byang chub sems dpa' nyid du rung /
analyzed: 'on te byang chub sems dpa' nyid du rung /
translated: or perhaps it is suitable to be a bodhisattva.

original: gsad bya'i lag pa bcas nas ni //
analyzed: gsad bya'i lag pa bcas nas ni //
translated: If only I could give away my hands and feet

original: gtong ba yin na ci ma rung ;
analyzed: gtong ba yin na ci ma rung ;
translated: to those who need them,

original: / mi ngal bas ni dmyal ba las //
analyzed: / mi ngal bas ni dmyal ba las //
translated: without getting tired,🔽I could give away my hands and feet🔽to those who need them,

original: gtong ba yin na ci ma rung //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gtong ba yin na ci ma rung // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: without getting tired.

original: yang na rnal 'byor pas ni nor dgug cing de'i sdug bsngal bltas te yang de la sbyin zhing /
analyzed: yang na rnal 'byor pas ni nor dgug cing de'i sdug bsngal bltas te yang de la sbyin zhing /
translated: Or else, the yogī should attract wealth, see the suffering of that, and give it away again.

original: sbyin pa bstan pas 'dul te nor kun gtong ba la 'jug cing lam la gnas shing ser sna can ni sangs rgyas nyid la gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa bstan pas 'dul te nor kun gtong ba la 'jug cing lam la gnas shing ser sna can ni sangs rgyas nyid la gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Having been trained by the teaching of generosity, he should engage in giving away all wealth, and should establish the miser in the path and in buddhahood itself.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //🔽nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go // nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: This is enough of this excessive [discussion].

original: 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
translated: The pledge of the family of desire is now explained.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ye shes kyi lha mo'i padmo'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ye shes kyi lha mo'i padmo'o //
translated: The lotus of the goddess of pristine awareness in the realm of space.

original: de la snga ma bzhin du padma'i dkyil 'khor ni yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa /
analyzed: de la snga ma bzhin du padma'i dkyil 'khor ni yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa /
translated: As before, the lotus maṇḍala is generated from the transformation of the three syllables.

original: padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
analyzed: padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
translated: One should meditate on the maṇḍala of the lotus and moon.

original: de'i dbus su yi ge gsum las 'byung ba tshe dpag tu med pa dbyibs dang kha dog ji ltar ldan pa /
analyzed: de'i dbus su yi ge gsum las 'byung ba tshe dpag tu med pa dbyibs dang kha dog ji ltar ldan pa /
translated: In the middle of that, one should imagine the three syllables giving rise to Amitāyus, endowed with shape and color,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du bskor bar bsam mo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du bskor bar bsam mo //
translated: and all the buddhas, the members of the maṇḍala, surrounding him as before.

original: gang zhig bud med dang skyes pa'i rnam pa dkyil 'khor pa de rnams thams cad bud med lta bu ni gos dkar mo'i rigs can gyi lha mo rnams bsam mo //
analyzed: gang zhig bud med dang skyes pa'i rnam pa dkyil 'khor pa de rnams thams cad bud med lta bu ni gos dkar mo'i rigs can gyi lha mo rnams bsam mo //
translated: One should imagine that all those in the maṇḍala, whether in the form of a man or a woman, are like women, the goddesses of the family of Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: phyi rol du yang dam tshig bzhi ni /🔽sgo nga las skyes pa dang / drod gsher @128a * //
analyzed: phyi rol du yang dam tshig bzhi ni / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / drod gsher @128a * //
translated: Also externally, the four pledges are🔽the women born from eggs, born from heat and moisture,

original: las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa'i bud med rnams 'od zer gyi lcags kyus dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dbang du byas te /
analyzed: las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa'i bud med rnams 'od zer gyi lcags kyus dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dbang du byas te /
translated: born from a womb, and born supernaturally, summoned by the hook of light rays, and made to enter and be enthroned.

original: de'i sbyor bas gcig tu byas shing yang gos dkar mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rjes su chags pa'i sngags brjod bzhin pas de kun spyod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i sbyor bas gcig tu byas shing yang gos dkar mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rjes su chags pa'i sngags brjod bzhin pas de kun spyod par bya'o //
translated: By that union, having made one, and by the union with Pāṇḍaravāsinī, one should practice that, reciting the mantra of passion for all the Tathāgatas.

original: yang de kun spros te bde ba can gyi 'od dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: yang de kun spros te bde ba can gyi 'od dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Again, having expanded that, one should place it in the samādhi of Amitābha of Sukhāvatī.

original: 'di ni tshul mchog ste byang chub kyi lam 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis byang chub thob par byed pa'i bsam gtan no //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul mchog ste byang chub kyi lam 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis byang chub thob par byed pa'i bsam gtan no //
translated: This is the supreme method, the meditation that attains enlightenment by the method of passion, the path to enlightenment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad ni sems can gyi rigs rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad ni sems can gyi rigs rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: For that very reason, all the buddhas are the four types of sentient beings.

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum zhes bya ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i sgom pa ste de'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum zhes bya ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i sgom pa ste de'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'o //
translated: The meditation on Amitābha, called “the three nondual vajras,” is that which causes one to attain his state.

original: 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ste /
analyzed: 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ste /
translated: This is the pledge of the passion family.

original: gsung gi rigs kyi dam tshig bsngags pa rnams bor bas bsgom par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: gsung gi rigs kyi dam tshig bsngags pa rnams bor bas bsgom par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The pledge of the speech family is to abandon disparaging speech and to meditate on the creation stage.

original: las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig go //
translated: This is the pledge of the action family.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, the Bhagavān Vajra Holder

original: rdo rje ni bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: rdo rje ni bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: is the vajra holder because he holds the gnosis of successful deeds.

original: las thams cad pa yin pas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: las thams cad pa yin pas na rgyal po'o //
translated: He is the king because he is the one of all activities.

original: sngags thams cad ni brdzun gyi tshig ste /
analyzed: sngags thams cad ni brdzun gyi tshig ste /
translated: All mantras are false words.

original: de rnams kyi don ni ngo bo nyid med pa de sgrub pa ni ston pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi don ni ngo bo nyid med pa de sgrub pa ni ston pa'o //
translated: The meaning of those is the accomplishment of realitylessness.

original: ye shes ni chos thams cad yongs su shes pas bdag med pa ni thams cad stong pa nyid /
analyzed: ye shes ni chos thams cad yongs su shes pas bdag med pa ni thams cad stong pa nyid /
translated: Gnosis is the selflessness of all phenomena, which is the emptiness of everything.

original: 'byung ba ni bskyed par mdzad pa de la de skad ces bya'o //🔽gsungs ni 'di skad bka' stsal te /
analyzed: 'byung ba ni bskyed par mdzad pa de la de skad ces bya'o // gsungs ni 'di skad bka' stsal te /
translated: The arising is the creation.🔽He spoke thus:

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i man ngag gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i man ngag gsungs pa'o //
translated: He spoke the instructions that will be explained below.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni rtsa dbus ma ste de la gnas pa sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni rtsa dbus ma ste de la gnas pa sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The realm of space is the central channel, and the buddhas abiding there are the moon mandala.

original: de la sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis don yod grub pa bsams te /🔽sangs rgyas thams cad ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyang bsams la /
analyzed: de la sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis don yod grub pa bsams te / sangs rgyas thams cad ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyang bsams la /
translated: There, one should imagine Amoghasiddhi in the manner previously explained.🔽One should imagine all the buddhas, the members of the mandala, and all the three realms entering there, and the mandala members becoming one.

original: der khams gsum pa yang zhugs la dkyil 'khor pa yang gcig tu byas shing sku de kun ni sems can thams cad kyi sems te /
analyzed: der khams gsum pa yang zhugs la dkyil 'khor pa yang gcig tu byas shing sku de kun ni sems can thams cad kyi sems te /
translated: That body is the mind of all sentient beings, and one should imagine that it utters the four epitomes of the Dharma, which are:🔽all conditioned things are impermanent, all contaminated things are painful,

original: brdzun smra ba ni 'dus byas pa thams cad mi @128b rtag pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal ba /
analyzed: brdzun smra ba ni 'dus byas pa thams cad mi @128b rtag pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal ba /
translated: all phenomena are selfless, and nirvana is peace.🔽Or one should imagine that it utters the four epitomes of the Dharma, which are:🔽all phenomena are selfless,🔽all phenomena are empty,🔽all phenomena are signless, and

original: chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa stong pa zhi ba ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa stong pa zhi ba ste /
translated: all phenomena are wishless.

original: rton pa bzhi 'am /
analyzed: rton pa bzhi 'am /
translated: Or one should imagine that it utters the four epitomes of the Dharma, which are:🔽all phenomena are selfless,🔽all phenomena are empty,🔽all phenomena are wishless, and🔽all phenomena are unconditioned.🔽Or one should imagine that it utters the four epitomes of the Dharma, which are:🔽all phenomena are selfless,🔽all phenomena are empty,🔽all phenomena are signless,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i tshig gis dngos po thams cad brdzun pa nyid du rjod par byed pa bsam par bya'o //🔽'dis ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i tshig gis dngos po thams cad brdzun pa nyid du rjod par byed pa bsam par bya'o //🔽'dis ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
translated: all phenomena are wishless, and🔽all phenomena are unconditioned.

original: rgyal ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rgyal ba'i gnas ni dkyil 'khor pa ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rgyal ba'i gnas ni dkyil 'khor pa ste /
translated: The Victor is the Tathagata, and the Victor's abode is the mandala deities.

original: de'i bdag nyid gcig tu gnas pa 'di ltar bslu bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid gcig tu gnas pa 'di ltar bslu bar bya ste /
translated: They are to be deceived by abiding in the state of their identity.

original: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur slob tu gzhug go //
analyzed: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur slob tu gzhug go //
translated: One should train in the illusion-like nature of phenomena.

original: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi dri ma med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi dri ma med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: All buddhas are the stainless realm of phenomena, the nature of all beings.

original: nam mkha'i ni ngag gi lam gyi byang chub bo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ni ngag gi lam gyi byang chub bo //
translated: Space is the enlightenment of the path of speech.

original: sngags ni sgrub po rnams te /
analyzed: sngags ni sgrub po rnams te /
translated: Mantras are the practitioners.

original: ye shes blo can ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'dod pa rnams kyis gsang ba ni blang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes blo can ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'dod pa rnams kyis gsang ba ni blang bar bya ba'o //
translated: Those with the wisdom of non-dual wisdom should take up the secret.

original: dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs ni don yod grub pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig ni bsgom pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs ni don yod grub pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig ni bsgom pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: The family of summoning commitments is the commitment of the Amoghasiddhi family, the stage of meditation.

original: spro ba ni shes par bya'o //
analyzed: spro ba ni shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know the emanation.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the stage of generation.

original: rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
translated: The commitment of the Ratna family should be explained.

original: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: Then, the king Vajradhara,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus, etc.

original: rdo rje ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: The vajra is the intuition of sameness.

original: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin to //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin to //
translated: Since he holds that, he is the vajra-holder.

original: nam mkha' mdzod nyid kyis mdzes pas na rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' mdzod nyid kyis mdzes pas na rgyal ba'o //
translated: He is the victor because he is beautiful with the sky treasury.

original: rdo rje gsum mi phyed pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum mi phyed pas na /
translated: Since the three vajras are indivisible,

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum mo //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum mo //
translated: they are the three indivisible vajras.

original: rgyal ba ni rgyal ba ste de nyid kyi gnas ni 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: rgyal ba ni rgyal ba ste de nyid kyi gnas ni 'byung gnas so //
translated: The victor is the victor. His abode is the source.

original: dngos grub ni tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i skyon gyis rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du byed pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ni tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i skyon gyis rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du byed pa'o //
translated: The power is the creation of the state of Great Vajradhara by the faults of harsh speech, etc.

original: rdo rje ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub ste de nyid rab tu ston pa ni gsung pa ste de bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub ste de nyid rab tu ston pa ni gsung pa ste de bzhin no //
translated: The vajra is the mundane power. Its teaching is speech.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni rang gi phyag rgya ma'i chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni rang gi phyag rgya ma'i chos 'byung ngo //
translated: The realm of space is the dharma source of one's own seal.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
translated: In the middle of that, the abode is the imagination of the pledge maṇḍala, the sun maṇḍala.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du de nyid du yi ge gsum gyi rim pas rin chen 'byung ldan phyag rgya ma dang dkyil 'khor pa rnams dang bcas pa bsams te /🔽khams gsum pa yang de nyid du zhugs nas dkyil 'khor pa'i rnam pas bsres la tshig rtsub mo la @129a * //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du de nyid du yi ge gsum gyi rim pas rin chen 'byung ldan phyag rgya ma dang dkyil 'khor pa rnams dang bcas pa bsams te / khams gsum pa yang de nyid du zhugs nas dkyil 'khor pa'i rnam pas bsres la tshig rtsub mo la @129a * //
translated: Then, as before, one should imagine Ratnasaṃbhava with consort and the mandala circle in that very place through the process of the three seed syllables.

original: sogs pa dang / slob dpon dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das pa la sogs pa las 'byung ba'i mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal /
analyzed: sogs pa dang / slob dpon dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das pa la sogs pa las 'byung ba'i mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal /
translated: Then, after the three realms have entered into that very place, one should mix them with the form of the mandala circle, and one should cause them to hear the words of the hell of Avīci and so on, which arise from harsh speech and so on, and from transgressing the words of the master and the Sugata.🔽Then, one should cause them to hear the words, “This is the water of the hells” and so on, for transgressing the commitments.

original: dam tshig las 'das pas 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyan du bcug la de'i nan tan gyis byang chub thob pa'i sems can rnams phyi rol du nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo spro ba ste /
analyzed: dam tshig las 'das pas 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyan du bcug la de'i nan tan gyis byang chub thob pa'i sems can rnams phyi rol du nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo spro ba ste /
translated: The beings who attain enlightenment through that practice emanate the essence of the tathāgatas into the external space.

original: ting nge 'dzin de nyid la brten nas ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de nyid la brten nas ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the power of that samādhi, one attains the gnosis of sameness.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
translated: The Blessed One, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor lnga ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor lnga ste /
translated: All the Tathagatas are the five mandalas.

original: de rnams rdo rje ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rdo rje 'chang nyid du byed pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams rdo rje ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rdo rje 'chang nyid du byed pa ste /
translated: Their vajra is the one who makes them into Vajradhara by the process of killing, etc.

original: de nyid kyi bkod pa ni tha dad pa'i bsgom pa'i tshogs gang las byung ba de ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos de ltar bka' stsal to zhes snga ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi bkod pa ni tha dad pa'i bsgom pa'i tshogs gang las byung ba de ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos de ltar bka' stsal to zhes snga ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: The array of that is the collection of meditations that are different.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
translated: That is the creation stage and the practice.

original: yang na nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas gsum ste /
analyzed: yang na nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas gsum ste /
translated: Or else, the realm of space is the three places.

original: spyi bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga rnams so //
analyzed: spyi bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga rnams so //
translated: The head, throat, and heart.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon rnams yi ge aom a'a:h'um bsgoms la /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon rnams yi ge aom a'a:h'um bsgoms la /
translated: In the middle of that, the mandala of the Buddhas is the seed syllables of the Tathagatas, meditating on the syllables Om, Ah, Hum.

original: rdo rje mi bskyod ni yi ge h'um ste /
analyzed: rdo rje mi bskyod ni yi ge h'um ste /
translated: The vajra Akshobhya is the syllable Hum.

original: gnyi ga zhugs pas de nyid gcig pu bsam zhing /
analyzed: gnyi ga zhugs pas de nyid gcig pu bsam zhing /
translated: Both enter into it, and one should imagine that alone.

original: yi ge h'um de nyid kyi lag pa ni cha gsum ste /
analyzed: yi ge h'um de nyid kyi lag pa ni cha gsum ste /
translated: That syllable hūṃ is the hand, which is threefold,

original: mgo bo dang mgo bo med pa dang dbyangs rnams so //
analyzed: mgo bo dang mgo bo med pa dang dbyangs rnams so //
translated: the head, the headless, and the vowels.

original: de rnams rdo rje ni thig le bsgom par bya'o//
analyzed: de rnams rdo rje ni thig le bsgom par bya'o//
translated: One should meditate on the vajra, the drop, of those.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How?

original: 'od 'phro ni 'od zer rnams kyis khyab pa'o //
analyzed: 'od 'phro ni 'od zer rnams kyis khyab pa'o //
translated: It is radiant, pervaded by light rays.

original: 'bar ba ni skar ma dang 'dra ba'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bar ba ni skar ma dang 'dra ba'o // de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is blazing, like a star.

original: 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang ba'o //
analyzed: 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang ba'o //
translated: It is filled with five-colored light rays, because it has the nature of the five tathāgatas.

original: de lta bu bsgoms nas dus gsum pa'i sangs rgyas ni nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug la /
analyzed: de lta bu bsgoms nas dus gsum pa'i sangs rgyas ni nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug la /
translated: Having meditated on that, one should summon the buddhas of the three times, the tathāgatas dwelling in space,

original: rdo rje ni thig le de nyid kyis phye mar brlag pa ni gcig tu bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni thig le de nyid kyis phye mar brlag pa ni gcig tu bya'o //
translated: and crush them to dust with that vajra, the drop, making them one.🔽Moreover, one should crush to dust with the vajra, the drop,

original: gzhan yang sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ces pa ni bdag nyid kyi lus la sogs pa yang /🔽rdo rje ni thig les phye mar brlag pa ni de nyid du thim @129b pa ro gcig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ces pa ni bdag nyid kyi lus la sogs pa yang /🔽rdo rje ni thig les phye mar brlag pa ni de nyid du thim @129b pa ro gcig par bya'o //
translated: one’s own body, speech, and mind, and make them one taste in that.

original: mchog de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid can gyi bsam gtan bsgoms na /
analyzed: mchog de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid can gyi bsam gtan bsgoms na /
translated: That supreme [state] is attained by the yoga of the subtle, which is the meditation of concentration.

original: thugs ni sems kyi spros pa'i rnam par rtog pa /
analyzed: thugs ni sems kyi spros pa'i rnam par rtog pa /
translated: The mind is the conceptual thoughts of the mind.

original: dag pa thob par gyur pa ni spyad par gyur to //
analyzed: dag pa thob par gyur pa ni spyad par gyur to //
translated: Having attained purity, one becomes engaged.

original: rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus zhes pa ni yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi thig le 'dis bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus zhes pa ni yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi thig le 'dis bsgom pa'o //
translated: With this kind of vajra secret means that one meditates with this bindu the size of a mustard seed.

original: sems can thams cad ni a'a li dang k'a li las 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad las /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ni a'a li dang k'a li las 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad las /
translated: All sentient beings are all conceptual thoughts that arise from the vowels and consonants.

original: bsad pa ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsad pa ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having killed them, one becomes victorious.

original: mi bskyod pa'i zhing ni snying ga'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i zhing ni snying ga'o //
translated: The realm of Akshobhya is the heart.

original: rgyal ba'i sras rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
translated: The bodhisattvas are the yogis.

original: skye bar gyur pa ni brtan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye bar gyur pa ni brtan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having been born there, they become stable.

original: zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig ni yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig ni yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The commitment of the family of anger is the syllable hūṃ.

original: de nyid kyi kho na nyid ni thig le tsam bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi kho na nyid ni thig le tsam bsgom pa'o //
translated: The reality of that is meditating on the mere bindu.

original: de yang don ji lta ba bzhin du bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang don ji lta ba bzhin du bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, one should understand the meaning just as it is from the guru's instruction.

original: lha mo bzhis ye shes zhus pa las kyang ji skad du /
analyzed: lha mo bzhis ye shes zhus pa las kyang ji skad du /
translated: The Questions of the Four Goddesses also says:

original: cha gnyis pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: cha gnyis pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: “The two parts” and so forth.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
translated: The treatise chapter also says:

original: dang po gcig dang bar du dgu //
analyzed: dang po gcig dang bar du dgu //
translated: “One in the beginning, nine in the middle,”

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: and so forth,

original: ngo bo dang ngo bo las skyes pa'i bar 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo dang ngo bo las skyes pa'i bar 'byung ngo //
translated: up to “the essence and what is born from the essence.”

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: don rtogs pa yi bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: don rtogs pa yi bzlas pa yis //
translated: “The recitation that realizes the meaning,”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'byung ngo //
translated: and so forth.

original: de ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of vajra recitation.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni rtsibs brgyad pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni rtsibs brgyad pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The “realm of space” is the dharma-realm wheel with eight spokes.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa 'khor lo ni zla ba dang / dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma dang / rnam par snang mdzad ni rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad ni tsheg drag bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa 'khor lo ni zla ba dang / dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma dang / rnam par snang mdzad ni rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad ni tsheg drag bsgoms te /
translated: In its center, the “place” is the moon, the “circle” is the sun, “Vairocana” is the following vowel, and “all buddhas” is the visarga.

original: rin chen kun ni rnam par shes pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rin chen kun ni rnam par shes pa gsum ste /
translated: “All jewels” are the three consciousnesses.

original: de rnams sbyor ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rdo rje gzugs ni 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams sbyor ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rdo rje gzugs ni 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: The union of those is the vajra form, which is clear light, by the sequence of appearance and so forth.

original: rab tu brtags pa ni bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu brtags pa ni bsgom par bya'o //
translated: That should be cultivated in meditative equipoise.

original: nor rnams thams cad ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu'o//
analyzed: nor rnams thams cad ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu'o//
translated: All wealth is the one hundred and sixty natures.

original: rdo rje gsum ni thabs dang shes rab dang ma rig pa'i ngo bos bsgom pa ni 'od gsal ba de nyid la zhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni thabs dang shes rab dang ma rig pa'i ngo bos bsgom pa ni 'od gsal ba de nyid la zhugs par bya'o //
translated: The cultivation of the three vajras by the nature of method, wisdom, and ignorance is the entry into just that clear light.

original: de ltar byas nas yid bzhin nor bu dang 'dra bar ni re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas nas yid bzhin nor bu dang 'dra bar ni re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Having done that, one becomes Vajrasattva, who is like a wish-fulfilling gem, fulfilling all hopes.

original: nor ni sa bcu dang / pha rol tu @130a * //🔽phyin pa rnams so //
analyzed: nor ni sa bcu dang / pha rol tu @130a * // phyin pa rnams so //
translated: Wealth is the ten grounds and the perfections.

original: de dag gis gang ba ni de rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gis gang ba ni de rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Being filled with those, they are perfected.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dang po las kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dang po las kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of the first action,

original: sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: one attains the eighth ground.

original: snang ba gsum ni mthong ba yis //🔽bcu pa la ni rab tu gnas //
analyzed: snang ba gsum ni mthong ba yis // bcu pa la ni rab tu gnas //
translated: By seeing the three appearances,

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: one is well-established on the tenth.

original: sangs rgyas kun ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i nang na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i nang na /
translated: All buddhas are the five Tathagatas.

original: sras ni thugs las skyes pa ste bya ba thams cad byed pas so //
analyzed: sras ni thugs las skyes pa ste bya ba thams cad byed pas so //
translated: The sons are born from the mind, because they perform all actions.

original: de nyid kyi phyir thub pa'i skyes bu ni ji srid rdo rje 'chang chen po yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thub pa'i skyes bu ni ji srid rdo rje 'chang chen po yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Sage is a person, and is also Great Vajradhara.

original: gti mug gi rigs ni de'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par shes pa gsum dang / rigs kyi rgya mtsho ni rang bzhin gyi tshogs te /
analyzed: gti mug gi rigs ni de'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par shes pa gsum dang / rigs kyi rgya mtsho ni rang bzhin gyi tshogs te /
translated: The family is the three consciousnesses of that nature, and the ocean of the family is the assembly of the nature.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni mi snang bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bsgom pa'i khyad par shes par bya ba ni bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni mi snang bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bsgom pa'i khyad par shes par bya ba ni bsgom par bya ste /
translated: The pledge of those is the meditation that is to be known as the special meditation that has the characteristic of making invisible.

original: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of the purification of the mind.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: The realm of space is luminosity by the stage of the purification of the mind.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni de nyid las cig car du ldang ba ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni de nyid las cig car du ldang ba ste /
translated: Abiding in the middle of that is rising up from that very [space] all at once.

original: padma bzhin du mi gos pa'i dkyil 'khor ni padma'i dkyil 'khor ste /
analyzed: padma bzhin du mi gos pa'i dkyil 'khor ni padma'i dkyil 'khor ste /
translated: The mandala that is not soiled like a lotus is the lotus mandala.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o //
translated: The body of Great Vajradhara.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /🔽'khor ba'i bar du sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na / 'khor ba'i bar du sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir /
translated: What is it like?

original: dpag med tshe ni yun ring bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: dpag med tshe ni yun ring bzhugs pa'o //
translated: It is the long life of immeasurable time, because it acts for the welfare of sentient beings until the end of cyclic existence.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad gang ba ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad gang ba ni //
translated: The entire world is filled with Buddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of all the Tathagatas.

original: bud med ni sgyu ma ste /
analyzed: bud med ni sgyu ma ste /
translated: Women are illusion,

original: de dang 'dra ba'i sbyor ba la ni de'i rang bzhin gyi sku'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i sbyor ba la ni de'i rang bzhin gyi sku'o //
translated: and the body of that nature is the union with her.

original: thams cad ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis ku de nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis ku de nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Everything should be meditated on as that reality by means of the twelve examples of illusion.

original: dam tshig bzhi ni phyag rgya bzhi ste /
analyzed: dam tshig bzhi ni phyag rgya bzhi ste /
translated: The four commitments are the four seals.

original: sku ni phyag rgya chen po dang gsung ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / thugs ni las kyi phyag rgya dang / lha mo ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //🔽sbyor ba de nyid kyis rdo rje tshul ni mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
analyzed: sku ni phyag rgya chen po dang gsung ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / thugs ni las kyi phyag rgya dang / lha mo ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o // sbyor ba de nyid kyis rdo rje tshul ni mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
translated: The body is the great seal, the speech is the commitment seal, the mind is the action seal, and the goddess is the wisdom seal.🔽By means of that union, one should meditate on the vajra way,

original: mchog ni dam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: mchog ni dam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: which is the supreme, the highest, the indivisible samadhi.

original: dbang po gnyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa ste /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa ste /
translated: The two faculties are the conventional and the ultimate.

original: bden pa gnyis so //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis so //
translated: The two truths.

original: rab tu sbyor ba ni de dag sgyu ma lta bur snang ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba ni de dag sgyu ma lta bur snang ba'o //
translated: The application is the appearance of those as like an illusion.

original: de nyid kyis de dag thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa nye bar spyad pa ni blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis de dag thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa nye bar spyad pa ni blta bar bya'o //
translated: By that very fact, all of those are to be viewed as the appropriated aggregates, etc.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
translated: And in the Prajfiiipiiramitii in eight thousand lines:

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
translated: One abides in the illusion-like meditative stabilization.

original: thams cad de dang 'dra ba'i @130b lha ;
analyzed: thams cad de dang 'dra ba'i @130b lha ;
translated: All is like that.🔽Form, and likewise feeling,🔽perception, and likewise volitional factors,🔽and the five consciousnesses,🔽and likewise the four elements,

original: / gzugs dang de bzhin tshor ba dang // 'du shes de bzhin 'du byed dang // rnam par shes pa lnga po dang // de bzhin khams ni bzhi po dang // dbang po de bzhin yul rnams dang // ye shes lnga ni de bzhin du //
analyzed: / gzugs dang de bzhin tshor ba dang // 'du shes de bzhin 'du byed dang // rnam par shes pa lnga po dang // de bzhin khams ni bzhi po dang // dbang po de bzhin yul rnams dang // ye shes lnga ni de bzhin du //
translated: the faculties and likewise the objects,🔽and likewise the five wisdoms,

original: phyi dang nang gi tha dad pa //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi tha dad pa //
translated: the external and the internal,

original: thams cad sgyu ma gzhan du min ;
analyzed: thams cad sgyu ma gzhan du min ;
translated: all are illusion, not otherwise.

original: / me long la ni gzugs brnyan bzhin //
analyzed: / me long la ni gzugs brnyan bzhin //
translated: Like a reflection in a mirror,

original: sgyu ma'i sku ni mtshon par bya //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i sku ni mtshon par bya //
translated: the illusory body is to be illustrated.

original: mdog ni 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ba //
analyzed: mdog ni 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ba //
translated: The color is like a rainbow.

original: khyab pa nyid kyi chu zla bzhin //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid kyi chu zla bzhin //
translated: like the moon in the water, which is all-pervading.

original: dri med gsal ba me long la //
analyzed: dri med gsal ba me long la //
translated: In the stainless, clear mirror

original: gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba ste //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba ste //
translated: the reflection appears clearly,

original: dngos dang dngos min dang bral ba //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos min dang bral ba //
translated: free from real and unreal.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' legs bris pa //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' legs bris pa //
translated: Vajrasattva is well-drawn,

original: rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan //
translated: endowed with the supreme of all aspects,

original: mchog ni mi shes sku mnga' ba //
analyzed: mchog ni mi shes sku mnga' ba //
translated: the supreme one with an unknowable body.

original: slob ma bzang la gang bstan pa //
analyzed: slob ma bzang la gang bstan pa //
translated: What is taught to the good disciple

original: de ni bdag byin brlab par bshad //
analyzed: de ni bdag byin brlab par bshad //
translated: is explained as self-consecration.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi //
translated: This is the vajra of all,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: thus it is said.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi /
translated: The vajra of all is the vajra of the body, speech, and mind of all buddhas.

original: mi phyed sku gsum ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: mi phyed sku gsum ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The indivisible three bodies are the illusion-like samadhi.

original: bsgom pa ni ldang ba'o zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni ldang ba'o zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: Meditation is arising, this is the remainder of the sentence.

original: 'dod chags ni snying rje ste de nyid kyi rigs ni sems can dang chos dang dmigs pa med pa'i dbye ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni snying rje ste de nyid kyi rigs ni sems can dang chos dang dmigs pa med pa'i dbye ba rnams so //
translated: Desire is compassion, and its family is the divisions of sentient beings, phenomena, and the absence of objects.

original: snying rje de lta bu rnam pa gsum gyis gang zhig dam tshig ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku blang ba ste /
analyzed: snying rje de lta bu rnam pa gsum gyis gang zhig dam tshig ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku blang ba ste /
translated: By means of such compassion, one should take up the pledge, i.e., the body which is like an illusion.

original: de nyid rnal 'byor bas bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid rnal 'byor bas bsgom par bya ste /
translated: That is what the yogin should cultivate.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: This is the self-consecration.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the realm of space, etc.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni 'od gsal ba'o //🔽de'i dbus su gnas pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni 'od gsal ba'o // de'i dbus su gnas pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
translated: The realm of space is clearlight transparency.

original: 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags bar ma rnams te /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags bar ma rnams te /
translated: The Buddha abiding in its center is the three: passion, the absence of passion, and the passion that is in between.

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni de dag gsum po bsgom par bya ba ni bzhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni de dag gsum po bsgom par bya ba ni bzhugs par bya'o //
translated: The mandala of those three is the cultivation of those three.

original: rdo rje thogs med ni bzhi pa ste lhan cig skyes pa bsgoms la /
analyzed: rdo rje thogs med ni bzhi pa ste lhan cig skyes pa bsgoms la /
translated: The vajra is the fourth, the innate.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ni smig rgyu la sogs pa'i mtshan ma lnga bsgom par bya ba ni mtshon par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ni smig rgyu la sogs pa'i mtshan ma lnga bsgom par bya ba ni mtshon par bya ba'o //
translated: All the Buddhas are the five signs, such as the mirage, which are to be cultivated, i.e., visualized.

original: de'i rjes la thams cad gzugs ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i ming du byas la dus mtshams dang mtshan mo dang nyin mo rnams te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la thams cad gzugs ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i ming du byas la dus mtshams dang mtshan mo dang nyin mo rnams te /
translated: Then, all forms are made into the names of desire and so on, and the times, nights, and days.

original: de dag rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra ba ni bden pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis stong pa nyid du bsgom par @131a * //
analyzed: de dag rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra ba ni bden pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis stong pa nyid du bsgom par @131a * //
translated: Those are the false speech of the vajra words, which should be meditated on as emptiness by the perception of untruth.

original: bya'o // de ltar byas nas rgyal ba ni phung po rnams dang / rgyal ba'i gnas ni khams dang skye mched rnams te /
analyzed: bya'o // de ltar byas nas rgyal ba ni phung po rnams dang / rgyal ba'i gnas ni khams dang skye mched rnams te /
translated: Having done that, the victors are the aggregates, and the abode of the victors is the elements and the sense bases.

original: de dag bslu bar bya ba ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag bslu bar bya ba ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs par bya'o //
translated: Those should be deceived, that is, entered into, by clear light.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: This is the speech of all buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i skad cig ma rnams kyi gsung ni man ngag gis thob pa'i nam mkha' ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i skad cig ma rnams kyi gsung ni man ngag gis thob pa'i nam mkha' ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: The speech of the moments of desire and so on is the fourth space obtained by instruction.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: dri ma med pa zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o //
analyzed: dri ma med pa zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o //
translated: Stainless means naturally pure.

original: de bzhin du sngags ni rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags ni rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
translated: Similarly, the mantra is the yogis.

original: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni bla na med pa'i mngon par byang chub pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni bla na med pa'i mngon par byang chub pa ste /
translated: Their spiritual attainment is the supreme manifest enlightenment.

original: de ster bas na sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa'o //
analyzed: de ster bas na sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa'o //
translated: Since he bestows that, he is the one who obtains the spiritual attainment of mantra.

original: ye shes blo can ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
analyzed: ye shes blo can ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
translated: Those who are wise in gnosis are the yogis of the stage of generation.

original: gsang ba ni de dag la sba bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni de dag la sba bar bya ba'o //
translated: The secret is to be concealed from them.

original: dam tshig ni phung po la sogs pa la 'gugs pa la /
analyzed: dam tshig ni phung po la sogs pa la 'gugs pa la /
translated: The pledge is the aggregate and so forth.

original: rigs ni phul du byung ba ste /
analyzed: rigs ni phul du byung ba ste /
translated: The family is the supreme.

original: ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The samadhi of the totalities.

original: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid ni rjes su 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid ni rjes su 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The reality of the pledge is the samadhi of the subsequent dissolution.

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag gi spro ba ni ril po 'di bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag gi spro ba ni ril po 'di bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The expansion of those samadhis is the meditation on the totality.

original: don ji bzhin du ni gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rim pas bstan par ma gyur na de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin gnyis pos bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: don ji bzhin du ni gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rim pas bstan par ma gyur na de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin gnyis pos bstan par bya ste /
translated: If the meaning is not taught by the sequence of passion and so forth, then it should be taught by the two samadhis.

original: mngon par byang chub ba'i rim pa'o ;
analyzed: mngon par byang chub ba'i rim pa'o ;
translated: This is the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: / nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: / nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the realm of space, and so forth.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas thob pa'i thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas thob pa'i thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go 'phang ngo //
translated: The realm of space is the state of the universal void, attained by the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni de las ldang ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsgom par bya'o//
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni de las ldang ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsgom par bya'o//
translated: In its center, one should meditate on the mandala of the commitment, the body of Great Vajradhara, who arises from that.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How?

original: dkon mchog ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa ste /
analyzed: dkon mchog ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa ste /
translated: The jewels are the conventional and the ultimate.

original: de dag gi dpal ni gnyis su med par byed pa'i rtags so //
analyzed: de dag gi dpal ni gnyis su med par byed pa'i rtags so //
translated: Their glory is the sign of their nonduality.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ni spro ba dang bsdu ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ni spro ba dang bsdu ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: All buddhas are the meditation on the emanation and gathering.

original: rtsub pa'i ngag ni khros pa'i tshig rnams dang / sogs pa'i sgras ni snyan pa'i tshig rnams te /
analyzed: rtsub pa'i ngag ni khros pa'i tshig rnams dang / sogs pa'i sgras ni snyan pa'i tshig rnams te /
translated: Harsh speech is angry words, and so on, which includes pleasant words.

original: de dag brten pa ni dbyer med pas blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag brten pa ni dbyer med pas blta bar bya'o //
translated: They are to be seen as inseparable, since they are based on that.

original: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin la /
analyzed: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin la /
translated: Moreover, this is just an illustration.

original: rnyed pa dang mi rnyed pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang / bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs dang / gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams mnyam par bltas nas /
analyzed: rnyed pa dang mi rnyed pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang / bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs dang / gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams mnyam par bltas nas /
translated: Having seen the equality of phenomena such as gain and loss, and of substances such as the castes beginning with brahmin and purity and impurity,

original: ye shes ni mi @131b gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa ni rnyed par 'gyur ba ste zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni mi @131b gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa ni rnyed par 'gyur ba ste zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
translated: one attains the gnosis, the meditative concentration of nonabiding nirvana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rim pa lngas thob pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rim pa lngas thob pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: All tathagatas is the enlightenment attained through the five stages.

original: de nyid mi slob pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid mi slob pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
translated: That itself is the vajra because it is beyond training.

original: de nyid dgod pa ni rim gyis bsgom pa gang las byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid dgod pa ni rim gyis bsgom pa gang las byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pa ste /
translated: The array of that is the gradual meditation that arises from it. That is the array of the vajras of all tathagatas.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes snga ma dang 'brel to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes snga ma dang 'brel to //
translated: The great Vajradhara spoke thus. This is connected to the previous verse.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
translated: Also in the chapter on the stages of yoga:

original: zung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas par //
analyzed: zung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas par //
translated: Abiding in the meditative concentration of union,

original: slar yang cung zad mi slob pa //
analyzed: slar yang cung zad mi slob pa //
translated: one does not train in the slightest.

original: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor grags //
analyzed: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor grags //
translated: This is the renowned perfect yoga.

original: de yang rdor 'chang chen po nyid //
analyzed: de yang rdor 'chang chen po nyid //
translated: And that is the Great Vajra Holder.

original: rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with the supreme of all aspects,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa de las skyes //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa de las skyes //
translated: Omniscience is born from that.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: And so on.

original: dam tshig lnga thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ci smra ba de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dam tshig lnga thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ci smra ba de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain just what the bodhisattvas said immediately upon hearing the five pledges,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the Bhagavān declares, “Then, ” and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs las byung ba'i dam tshig rdo rje'i dpal ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs las byung ba'i dam tshig rdo rje'i dpal ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
translated: The glory of the pledge vajra that arises from the family of all tathāgatas is Sarva­nīvaraṇa­viṣkambhin.

original: de dang po gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de dang po gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: He is just so, in that he has that [glory] from the beginning.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas are those endowed with the spirit of enlightenment.

original: de rnams srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sgra thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sgra thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
translated: They were amazed upon hearing the words “kill,” and so on.

original: de byas na yang byang chub thob ste rmad du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de byas na yang byang chub thob ste rmad du gyur pa'o //
translated: And yet, enlightenment is attained by doing that—how marvelous!

original: 'di ni ngag gi lam gyis rdo rje'i tshig ni khros pa gtso bor gyur pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: 'di ni ngag gi lam gyis rdo rje'i tshig ni khros pa gtso bor gyur pa'i tshig ste /
translated: This is the vajra speech, the speech of the wrathful one, the path of speech.

original: ma rtogs pas byas pa'i ku co smras so //
analyzed: ma rtogs pas byas pa'i ku co smras so //
translated: It is a meaningless sound made by one who does not understand.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i slad du gsung ba ni bstan par mi rigs so zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i slad du gsung ba ni bstan par mi rigs so zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: Why does the Lord of all Tathagatas, Vajrasattva, speak these vajra words, which are not proper to teach?

original: rdo rje'i tshig ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are the vajra words?

original: 'jig rten thams cad ni nyan thos pa la sogs pa nas bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i tshul la zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad ni nyan thos pa la sogs pa nas bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i tshul la zhugs pa ste /
translated: All worlds are those who have entered the way of the Sravakas and so forth, up to the way of the Kriya Tantra.

original: de las 'das pa ni de rnams kyis spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de las 'das pa ni de rnams kyis spangs pa'o //
translated: Beyond that is the abandonment by them.

original: de bzhin du khams gsum ni sku gsum gyi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khams gsum ni sku gsum gyi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang spangs pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the three realms are also abandoned by the Blessed One, who is the essence of the three bodies.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sa bon thob pa'i 'khor gyi nang du ngo mtshar ba ni sngar ma thos pa'i @132a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sa bon thob pa'i 'khor gyi nang du ngo mtshar ba ni sngar ma thos pa'i @132a * //
translated: All Bodhisattvas and Tathagatas, in the assembly of those who have attained the seed, are amazed, because they have not heard this before.

original: tshig gi lam ni nyid kyi zhal gyis gsung ba de ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: tshig gi lam ni nyid kyi zhal gyis gsung ba de ni mi rigs so //
translated: The path of words is not your own face.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dgongs pa rtogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ji bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi the tshom gcod pa de bzhin du bshad par bya ba'i phyir ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dgongs pa rtogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ji bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi the tshom gcod pa de bzhin du bshad par bya ba'i phyir ;
translated: Having realized the intention of Bhagavān Mahāvajradhara, the Tathāgatas, in order to explain just as they did the resolution of the doubts of the bodhisattvas,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: then, etc. is stated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All the Tathāgatas are Akṣhobhya and so forth.

original: brjod kyis mi lang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: brjod kyis mi lang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: Inconceivable, etc. has been explained previously.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsol te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsol te /
translated: Those Tathāgatas said to those bodhisattvas, Thus it is, etc.

original: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rigs kyi ni rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rigs kyi ni rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa ste /
translated: Sons of good family, etc. means family is the vajra family, etc.

original: de la bu ni de'i rigs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de la bu ni de'i rigs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: A son is one who possesses that family.

original: dman pa'i 'du shes ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa bzhin du chung ba'i yid dang smad pa'i 'du shes ni mi sdug pa bsgom pa bzhin du smod pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed cig ces pa ni skyed par ma byed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dman pa'i 'du shes ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa bzhin du chung ba'i yid dang smad pa'i 'du shes ni mi sdug pa bsgom pa bzhin du smod pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed cig ces pa ni skyed par ma byed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: What is the reason for that?

original: rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgya che ba rnams kyis mtshan nyid kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de nyid ni /
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgya che ba rnams kyis mtshan nyid kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de nyid ni /
translated: The conduct characterized by the vastness of the bodhisattvas endowed with the vajra family and so forth,

original: re zhig nyan thos la sogs pa la ltos nas spyod pa mchog go //
analyzed: re zhig nyan thos la sogs pa la ltos nas spyod pa mchog go //
translated: is, for the time being, the supreme conduct in relation to the śrāvakas and so forth.

original: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa rnams kyi gang zhig spyod pa ni spros pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa rnams kyi gang zhig spyod pa ni spros pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: After that, the Tathāgata is the one who realizes reality, and the conduct is the three types of elaborations and so forth.

original: de nyid sngags kyi tshul la de nyid spyod pa yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: de nyid sngags kyi tshul la de nyid spyod pa yin no zhes ston to //
translated: That itself is the conduct in the way of mantra.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa ste ;
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa ste ;
translated: Thus, the conduct of the bodhisattvas and the conduct of the tathāgatas

original: spyod pa gnyis kho na sngags kyi spyod pa bstan to //
analyzed: spyod pa gnyis kho na sngags kyi spyod pa bstan to //
translated: are the two conducts that are taught as the conduct of mantra.

original: nyan thos pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa des ni /
analyzed: nyan thos pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa des ni /
translated: By that conduct of the śrāvakas and so forth,

original: sngags kyi spyod pa ma yin no zhes tshig gi don to //
analyzed: sngags kyi spyod pa ma yin no zhes tshig gi don to //
translated: it is not the conduct of mantra.🔽This is the meaning of the words.

original: de ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: khyed rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' ste sa bcu'i dbang phyug go //
analyzed: khyed rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' ste sa bcu'i dbang phyug go //
translated: You are bodhisattvas, lords of the ten grounds.

original: de bas na khyed rnams kyi rigs ni spyod pas shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bas na khyed rnams kyi rigs ni spyod pas shes par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, your family is known by your conduct.

original: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir khyed rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir khyed rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, because you possess the family of the tathāgatas, whatever your conduct is, that is the intention of the tathāgatas.

original: lang kar gshegs pa las kyang /
analyzed: lang kar gshegs pa las kyang /
translated: In the Laṅkāvatāra Sūtra it says:

original: du ba la ni mer shes dang // chu skyar las @132b ni chur shes bzhin //
analyzed: du ba la ni mer shes dang // chu skyar las @132b ni chur shes bzhin //
translated: Just as smoke is known as fire and a water fowl is known as water,

original: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa'i //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa'i //
translated: the wise bodhisattvas

original: mtshan ma rnams ni rigs zhes 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan ma rnams ni rigs zhes 'gyur //
translated: know the signs as the family.

original: zhes 'byung ba ste sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba ste sgrub pa'o //
translated: This is the proof.

original: de bas na sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba gal te 'gal ba'i tshig gi sgo nas bstan na de tsam gyis dman pa dang / smod pa'i 'du shes skye ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de bas na sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba gal te 'gal ba'i tshig gi sgo nas bstan na de tsam gyis dman pa dang / smod pa'i 'du shes skye ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, if the so-called mantra conduct is taught by means of contradictory words, it is not right to generate a sense of inferiority and contempt merely by that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni zur gyi tshig gis sngags kyi spyod pa bstan gyi /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni zur gyi tshig gis sngags kyi spyod pa bstan gyi /
translated: The Tathāgatas teach the mantra conduct with indirect words,

original: rab tu grags pa'i sgra'i sgo nas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rab tu grags pa'i sgra'i sgo nas ni ma yin no //
translated: not with well-known sounds.🔽For example:🔽Killing one's father and mother,

original: dper na / pha dang ma ni bsad pa dang // rgyal po dang ni gtsang sbra gnyis //
analyzed: dper na / pha dang ma ni bsad pa dang // rgyal po dang ni gtsang sbra gnyis //
translated: and the king and the two pure ones,

original: yul 'khor bcas pa bsad na ni //🔽mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bshad //
analyzed: yul 'khor bcas pa bsad na ni // mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bshad //
translated: if one kills the country and its retinue,

original: ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces 'byung ngo //
translated: that person is said to be purified.

original: 'o na rnal mo'i don spangs nas gtso bo ma yin pa don ci'i phyir brten par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rnal mo'i don spangs nas gtso bo ma yin pa don ci'i phyir brten par bya zhe na /
translated: If one abandons the literal meaning, why should one rely on the non-primary meaning?

original: smras pa dgos pa'i dbang gis ni /
analyzed: smras pa dgos pa'i dbang gis ni /
translated: It is said: for the sake of necessity,

original: de la mtshon par byed pa'i sgra ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de la mtshon par byed pa'i sgra ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: there are three types of indicative sounds.

original: gtso bo'i don 'gal ba dang rgyu dang mtshan dang dgos pa'o //
analyzed: gtso bo'i don 'gal ba dang rgyu dang mtshan dang dgos pa'o //
translated: The principal meaning is contradictory, causal, characteristic, and necessary.

original: dper na mi'i seng ge bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mi'i seng ge bzhin no //
translated: For example, like a human lion.

original: sen mo la sogs pa dang ldan pa la mi mi 'jug na yang de'i ngo bo gzhi mthun pas brjod de /
analyzed: sen mo la sogs pa dang ldan pa la mi mi 'jug na yang de'i ngo bo gzhi mthun pas brjod de /
translated: Even though one does not engage with a human who possesses nails and so on, one expresses their common ground as the nature of that.

original: gtso bo mi de dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bo mi de dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: The principal meaning is contradictory with that human.

original: dpa' bo la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyis de'i ngo bo yin no zhes rgyu mtshan no //
analyzed: dpa' bo la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyis de'i ngo bo yin no zhes rgyu mtshan no //
translated: The nature of that is due to the special qualities of a hero and so on.

original: de'i gzugs seng ge bzhin du mthong nas gzhan rnams 'jigs par 'gyur ro zhes dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gzugs seng ge bzhin du mthong nas gzhan rnams 'jigs par 'gyur ro zhes dgos pa'o //
translated: Having seen the form of that, others will be frightened.

original: de ltar mtshon par byed pa'i sgra rnams ni rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: de ltar mtshon par byed pa'i sgra rnams ni rnam par gnas so //
translated: Thus, the words that illustrate are established.

original: 'dir sred pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de rnams ma ma la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis bstan to zhes gtso bo'i don dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir sred pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de rnams ma ma la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis bstan to zhes gtso bo'i don dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: Here, the afflictions such as craving are indicated by the words mother and so on.
