translated: All mantras are the transcendent ones.

original: / de rnams kyi snying po ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying po ste /
analyzed: / de rnams kyi snying po ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying po ste /
translated: Their essence is the essence of the knowledge being,

original: ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i sa bon rnams so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i sa bon rnams so //
translated: the seed syllables of the concentration being.

original: de skul bar byed pa ni de'i nus pa 'phrog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de skul bar byed pa ni de'i nus pa 'phrog par byed pa'o //
translated: To stimulate them is to take away their power.🔽Or else, the essence of all the mantras of Maheśvara, etc.

original: yang na sngags thams cad ni dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyi snying po ni nus pa de skul bar byed pa ni nus par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang na sngags thams cad ni dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyi snying po ni nus pa de skul bar byed pa ni nus par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: is the stimulation of their power.

original: drag shul gyi sngags rnams ni /
analyzed: drag shul gyi sngags rnams ni /
translated: To destroy the violent mantras

original: yi ge gsum gyis 'joms par byed //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis 'joms par byed //
translated: is with the three syllables.

original: ces man ngag go //
analyzed: ces man ngag go //
translated: This is the instruction.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rab tu gsang ba ni rig sngags dang / nye ba'i snying po dang / phreng sngags dang / gzungs sngags kyi nang na snying po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rab tu gsang ba ni rig sngags dang / nye ba'i snying po dang / phreng sngags dang / gzungs sngags kyi nang na snying po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, very secret means that the essence is the essence of the vidyā, the upaniṣad, the garland mantra, and the dhāraṇī mantra.

original: snying po la sogs pa'i dbye ba ni le'u bcu bzhi las bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying po la sogs pa'i dbye ba ni le'u bcu bzhi las bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The division of the essence, etc. will be explained in chapter fourteen.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: All the tathāgatas are Vairocana.

original: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa ni /
analyzed: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa ni /
translated: The focus on the commitments of his body, speech, and mind is

original: de'i sku skyed par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: de'i sku skyed par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa yi ge aom mo //
translated: the syllable Om, which is the cause of the creation of his body.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: All the Vajra-Holders are Akshobhya.

original: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa ni de'i longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku dag skyed pa yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa ni de'i longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku dag skyed pa yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The focus on the commitments of his body, speech, and mind is the syllable Hum, which is the cause of the creation of his Enjoyment and Transformation Bodies.

original: chos 'dzin pa thams cad ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'dzin pa thams cad ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: All the Dharma-Holders are Amitabha.

original: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa ni de'i dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rgyu ste yi ge a'a:'o //
analyzed: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa ni de'i dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rgyu ste yi ge a'a:'o //
translated: The focus on the commitments of his body, speech, and mind is the syllable Ah, which is the cause of his first union, and so forth.

original: nyid kyi sku gsung thugs ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gsung thugs dang thugs las so //
analyzed: nyid kyi sku gsung thugs ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gsung thugs dang thugs las so //
translated: His own body, speech, and mind are his body, speech, and mind, respectively.

original: tshig gi lam nges par brjod pa ni tshig gi lam nas te /
analyzed: tshig gi lam nges par brjod pa ni tshig gi lam nas te /
translated: The expression of the path of words is from the path of words.

original: sku la sogs pa dbyer med pa'i phyir dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa dbyer med pa'i phyir dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intention is because of the indivisibility of body, and so forth.

original: sems ni lus lta bu zhes le'u gnyis pa las bstan to //
analyzed: sems ni lus lta bu zhes le'u gnyis pa las bstan to //
translated: The mind is like the body, as is taught in the second chapter.

original: sngags bsdus pa ni snga ma bzhin du ma ning la sogs pa'i rim gyis sngags kyi snying po gsungs pa ni bstan to //
analyzed: sngags bsdus pa ni snga ma bzhin du ma ning la sogs pa'i rim gyis sngags kyi snying po gsungs pa ni bstan to //
translated: The condensed mantra is taught as the essence of the mantra, in the sequence of the neuter, etc., as before.

original: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi don ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi don ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of the mantra OṀ ĀḤ HŪṀ has been explained previously.

original: h'um ni dbus su bshad pa ste /
analyzed: h'um ni dbus su bshad pa ste /
translated: HŪṀ is explained as the center,

original: sems ni snying ga'i nang na gnas pa'i phyir dang / ngag dang lus ni phyi rol du kha bltas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems ni snying ga'i nang na gnas pa'i phyir dang / ngag dang lus ni phyi rol du kha bltas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mind is located in the heart, and because speech and body face outward.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis te rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa tsam gyis sangs @143a * //
analyzed: 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis te rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa tsam gyis sangs @143a * //
translated: By merely uttering this, by merely uttering it, Vajradhara,

original: rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: all the Buddhas with their sons, the Tathāgatas and Bodhisattvas,

original: 'dar bar gyur zhing brgyal gyur pa ni bskul bar 'gyur zhing sgrub pa po la mngon par phyogs par gyur to //
analyzed: 'dar bar gyur zhing brgyal gyur pa ni bskul bar 'gyur zhing sgrub pa po la mngon par phyogs par gyur to //
translated: trembled and fainted, were urged and turned toward the practitioner.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i rnal 'byor pa la spyan ras kyis gzigs pa dang / de nyid la rtse gcig par gyur pa dang / de nyid la dngos grub stsol to zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i rnal 'byor pa la spyan ras kyis gzigs pa dang / de nyid la rtse gcig par gyur pa dang / de nyid la dngos grub stsol to zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The phrase “recollection of Vajrasattva” is a remainder, meaning that the yogin who is intent on the state of Vajrasattva is looked upon with favor, becomes one-pointed, and is granted power.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the creation stage.

original: snying po bskul ba'i sngags bstan nas de'i thabs bskyed pa'i rim pa ston par byed pa ste /
analyzed: snying po bskul ba'i sngags bstan nas de'i thabs bskyed pa'i rim pa ston par byed pa ste /
translated: Having taught the essence-awakening mantra, he teaches the method of that, the creation stage.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: The “realm of space” is emptiness.

original: de'i dbus gnas dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /
analyzed: de'i dbus gnas dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /
translated: In the middle of that, the “arrayed maṇḍala”

original: yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i gdan bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i gdan bsgom par bya'o //
translated: is the meditation on the seats of the moon, sun, and so on, arisen from the transformation of the three syllables.

original: de'i steng du yang yi ge h'um ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir yi ge aom dang / a'a: dag kyang dgod cing de las byung ba rang gi gzugs ni mi bskyod pa'i sku rab tu brtag pa ni bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du yang yi ge h'um ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir yi ge aom dang / a'a: dag kyang dgod cing de las byung ba rang gi gzugs ni mi bskyod pa'i sku rab tu brtag pa ni bsgom par bya'o //
translated: On top of that, one should imagine the syllable hūṃ, which is the principal one, and also the syllables oṃ and āḥ, and one’s own form arisen from them, the body of Akṣobhya.

original: rdo rje ni phyag mtshan gtso bo 'od zer ni de'i sku las phyung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis cher 'bar ba ni shin tu 'bar ba dang / phyi rol du yang 'od zer de rnams spro bar byed pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni phyag mtshan gtso bo 'od zer ni de'i sku las phyung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis cher 'bar ba ni shin tu 'bar ba dang / phyi rol du yang 'od zer de rnams spro bar byed pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should visualize the great blazing of the light rays that are emitted from his body, the principal vajra, and also the emission of those light rays externally.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs ni ye shes sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs ni ye shes sems dpa' ste /
translated: The body, speech, and mind of the buddhas is the gnosis being.

original: drangs pa ni dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: drangs pa ni dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that it is drawn into the heart of the commitment being.

original: de nas snying gar yang sku gsung thugs rdo rje ni sku la sogs pa sa bon 'dzin pa'i dgod pa ste /
analyzed: de nas snying gar yang sku gsung thugs rdo rje ni sku la sogs pa sa bon 'dzin pa'i dgod pa ste /
translated: Then, at the heart, one should imagine the vajra of body, speech, and mind, which is the placement of the seed syllables of body and so forth.

original: de skad cig ma cig car du ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de skad cig ma cig car du ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' dgod par bya'o //
translated: One should instantly place the concentration being in the heart of the gnosis being.

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Then, Vajrasattva is Great Vajradhara.

original: rgyal po chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po //
translated: The great king is the lord of the Tathagatas.

original: kun gyi gtso bo ni lha la sogs pa 'gro ba ris drug dang / khams gsum gyi rab mchog go //
analyzed: kun gyi gtso bo ni lha la sogs pa 'gro ba ris drug dang / khams gsum gyi rab mchog go //
translated: The chief of all is the best of the six classes of migrating beings, such as gods, and the three realms.

original: dbang phyug mchog ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug mchog ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa mdzad pa'o //
translated: The supreme lord is the one who performs miracles and so forth.

original: de la rjes su zhugs shing rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid bsams pa ji srid rang gi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la @143b rjes su zhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de la rjes su zhugs shing rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid bsams pa ji srid rang gi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la @143b rjes su zhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Having entered into that, one should imagine oneself to be of the nature of Great Vajradhara for as long as one's own mandala, which is the Akshobhya mandala, has entered into Great Vajradhara.

original: rang sngags ni dzin dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams las skyed par byed pa'i tshul ni bskyed cing spros par bya'o //
analyzed: rang sngags ni dzin dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams las skyed par byed pa'i tshul ni bskyed cing spros par bya'o //
translated: One's own mantra is the mantras such as Jinjika and so forth. The mode of generation is to generate and emanate.

original: 'di ni sngar bshad pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dang / ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhugs pa dang dgod pa sngags thams cad ni dkyil 'khor rnams la yang bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni sngar bshad pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dang / ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhugs pa dang dgod pa sngags thams cad ni dkyil 'khor rnams la yang bya ste /
translated: This is the entry and placement of the gnosis being and concentration being explained above.

original: snying po ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang dang / rdo rje ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la /
analyzed: snying po ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang dang / rdo rje ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la /
translated: The heart is for the irreversible initiation, and the vajra is for the eye sense-faculty initiations, and so on.

original: bsdu ba ni thlim la sogs pa'i sa bon dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba ni thlim la sogs pa'i sa bon dgod par bya'o //
translated: The collection is the placement of the seed syllables, tliim, and so on.

original: de nas rang sngags skyes bu ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gnas bzhi dag ni phyogs bzhi dang nam mkha' la bsgoms te /
analyzed: de nas rang sngags skyes bu ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gnas bzhi dag ni phyogs bzhi dang nam mkha' la bsgoms te /
translated: Then, the person born from one's mantra is the body of Great Vajradhara, visualized in the four directions and the sky, in the four places.

original: zhal gsum lta bu dang sbyor ba'i tshig gis phyag drug pa dang / kha dog gsum ni dam tshig dang ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhal gsum lta bu dang sbyor ba'i tshig gis phyag drug pa dang / kha dog gsum ni dam tshig dang ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The three faces are connected with the six arms, and the three colors are the nature of the commitment being, gnosis being, and concentration being.

original: de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bka' stsal to //
translated: This was stated by the Bhagavān Great Vajradhara.

original: de ltar bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa po'i bskyed pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa po'i bskyed pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the creation of the practitioner and the object of practice,🔽now, in order to explain the creation of the deity, it says and so on.

original: sgrub pa'i sbyor ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i sbyor ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the application of practice,🔽he says, “There, the supreme of the pure essences,

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in the center of the heart,🔽the subtle, supreme mind,

original: de la ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: de la ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa po'o //
translated: is the supreme of the pure essences.

original: dag gi mchog ni snying po nus pa 'gugs pa dang / gsang ba'i bla ma'i man ngag gis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dag gi mchog ni snying po nus pa 'gugs pa dang / gsang ba'i bla ma'i man ngag gis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The supreme of the pure essences is the essence, the power, which is to be understood through the secret oral instructions of the guru.

original: snying ga ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying ga ste /
analyzed: snying ga ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying ga ste /
translated: The heart is the heart of the gnosis being.

original: de'i dbus gnas la phra mo ni yi ge h'um la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'i sa bon te ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya ba /
analyzed: de'i dbus gnas la phra mo ni yi ge h'um la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'i sa bon te ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya ba /
translated: In the center of that, the subtle is any seed syllable, such as hūṃ, and so on, which is called the concentration being.

original: dkyil 'khor rnams ni zla ba dang nyi ma rnams las gang yang rung ba'i gdan la bsams te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnams ni zla ba dang nyi ma rnams las gang yang rung ba'i gdan la bsams te /
translated: The maṇḍalas are imagined on the moon and sun seats of any of the deities.

original: phyi rol du gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya'i dbus su gnas pa ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar gnas pa /
analyzed: phyi rol du gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya'i dbus su gnas pa ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar gnas pa /
translated: The object of practice, such as the tathāgatas, and so on, abiding outside, is the gnosis being abiding in the heart of the gnosis being.

original: mchog ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mchog ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The supreme is the mind vajra, and so on, the syllables.

original: sa bon gnas ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la gnas par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: sa bon gnas ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la gnas par bsam par bya'o //
translated: The location of the seed is in the moon mandala, etc.

original: de'i rjes la bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed de dag gi sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed de dag gi sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should imagine the five-pronged vajra radiating a circle of light rays born from the complete transformation of those seeds of the object of attainment and the means of attainment.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽sbyor ba zhes pa ni nus @144a * //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / sbyor ba zhes pa ni nus @144a * //
translated: How?

original: pa 'gugs pa'i sbyor ba zhes ston to //
analyzed: pa 'gugs pa'i sbyor ba zhes ston to //
translated: The “application” is the application of summoning the power.

original: rdo rje gsum ni phyi rol gyi nam mkha' la gnas pa'i dam tshig dang ye shes sems dpa' dang / ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni phyi rol gyi nam mkha' la gnas pa'i dam tshig dang ye shes sems dpa' dang / ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: The “three vajras” are the pledge being, the wisdom being, and the concentration being, abiding in the external space.🔽Those also are like a blazing mass, similar to a very sharp hook, arisen from the five-pronged vajra, the nature of the concentration being, oneself.

original: de rnams kyang bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa las byung ba'i shin tu rno ba'i lcags kyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis de'i snying gar gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga
analyzed: de rnams kyang bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa las byung ba'i shin tu rno ba'i lcags kyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis de'i snying gar gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga
translated: The wisdom being’s heart, located in the heart of the object of attainment, is the five-pronged vajra, the nature of the concentration being, oneself.

original: pa'i 'bar ba'i 'od zer rnams phog ste drag shul gyis bkug la de'i zhal lam ba spu'i bu ga rnams las byung zhing rang gi kha'i lam la zhugs shing ye shes sems dpa'i zhal lam ba spu'i bu ga rnams las snying gar phyin te de'i ting nge 'dzin
analyzed: pa'i 'bar ba'i 'od zer rnams phog ste drag shul gyis bkug la de'i zhal lam ba spu'i bu ga rnams las byung zhing rang gi kha'i lam la zhugs shing ye shes sems dpa'i zhal lam ba spu'i bu ga rnams las snying gar phyin te de'i ting nge 'dzin
translated: The blazing light rays strike the heart of the gnosis being, and with great force they summon him, and he emerges from his mouth or pores, and enters the yogin’s mouth, and goes to his heart through the mouth or pores of the concentration being.

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i 'bar ba'i tshogs rdo rje la zhugs shing de nyid du thim par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i 'bar ba'i tshogs rdo rje la zhugs shing de nyid du thim par bsam par bya'o //
translated: The blazing mass of the five-pronged vajra of the concentration being enters the vajra, and one should imagine that it dissolves right there.

original: yang na rigs pa de nyid kyis dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi snying ga ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rdo rje 'bar bas /
analyzed: yang na rigs pa de nyid kyis dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi snying ga ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rdo rje 'bar bas /
translated: Or, by that very reasoning, the heart of the maṇḍala members is the vajra of the concentration being, blazing.

original: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i snying ga ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i snying ga ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ste /
translated: The heart in the sky is the concentration being.

original: de nyid brtan pa ni bskul zhing dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid brtan pa ni bskul zhing dgug par bya'o //
translated: That very one should be summoned and invoked.

original: de ltar byas nas khams gsum gyi bdag po nyid du 'khor dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas thob bo //
analyzed: de ltar byas nas khams gsum gyi bdag po nyid du 'khor dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas thob bo //
translated: Having done that, the yogin, together with his retinue, attains lordship over the three realms.

original: gal te de ltar rnal 'byor pas bya bar mi nus na /
